Content: When can I be assigned to Tiancheng...
You've been there? Is it as what they say? That people can find everything there?
So envious... I grew up in the mines, and almost became the family's third generation of miner.
Took me so much effort to get into the Squeaky Express, with the wish to see the world.
Didn't know I'd be assigned to the suburbs... my uncle keeps chanting every day, saying I might better off going back to mines!
Orders at the mine all delivered. So little work today? Strange...
Waoh! Peipei just sent another fifty orders over!
The work ethic of the younger generation is really overwhelming...
Wait, they all destined to the XXX, and passing across the exile camp.
I've given that annoying fly many tastes. I hope he'll read the air and leave me alone.
Sigh... I can take this no more! How long do I have to work like this?
The next order takes the mountain road. The terrain is quite treacherous...
Not at all!
On the contrary, it's just what I want, and I can exercise my climbing skills by the way.
See my muscles? It's all worked up by climbing.
You can also appreciate the difference between mountains after climbing for a long time.
For example, Mt. Firmament is sacred and silent. It cleanses the soul.
In comparison, the Desorock Highlands are more dangerous and suitable for refining the will.
Lost again, darn it, darn it... she's so good!
I'll whisper. I'll be doomed if she heard... The courier, Pijing.
The boss wants me to rob the packages of Squeaky Express, but so strange I bumped into her every time.
She can take me down in two or three moves, easier than fighting Gulpuff! So strong...
What are you talking about! Of course no! Who would enjoy being beaten...
That kid Fly is away again? Well... it's good!
This shows that he has grown up and is not as fearful of doing things as he used to be.
Before, I told him to go to the Squeaky Express and practice, and he was reluctant then.
Recently he's much more active, running out every now and then.
Humph, he probably found the trick. He beats the couriers so easily.
But I don't see him getting back anything useful...
What... do you... want... from me?
Vocal cord... injury... don't mind.
Go to me... for problems... always oblige!
Lingfeng...?
We are... like each other... get along...
Did you know? Each Tacetite has its own voice.
Yeah. This piece for example. It has a crisp, clear sound and excels at high notes.
That piece sounds much lower, resounding, and feels like a tough kid.
In my spare time, I would play music with them, and everyone in the survey group loves to listen.
It's said to... be relaxing when you listen to it. If you have a chance, you should try it too.
Hmm? A new face I've never seen before. If you're new to the area, you must need a guide, right?
Don't be so reluctant, I'll help you! Where should I start with the introduction...
By the way, when you come to Central Plains, you must go to see the ancient trees. You know the Qichi village, it's right under the tree.
I was born there, although now there is only a ruin. However, I still can not let go...
Oh yes! The view towards the Night Slope is very good. If you have time, you can also visit there. Although there are MOs out there...
But judging from your capabilities, you should solve them in no time. You'd also stretch your body by the way.
If you're hungry or tired, feel free to find me. Recently I'm catching game for barbecue. You'll have a treat!
Another attack on my blood pressure...
Gets me irritated every time. The list of repairs reported recently is getting longer and longer.
These researchers are too accustomed to do the academic on paper to know anything about cherishing the equipment and instruments!
If only they could follow Zhaoyang.
Despite being a freshman, he works quickly and carefully...
Plus knows a lot about practice. He has a promising future.
Worked so hard to get into the Academy, I couldn't let up.
There are still a few samples left to be taken. Let me come back again tonight.
Ha ha, doing the work you love is never tiring.
For geniuses, it may be easy as a piece of cake to become a researcher.
But for me, this is a hard-won opportunity. I'll cherish it....
I spent many years in the refinery building a foundation in order to become a researcher.
The air in the mining area is so terrible...
Alas, lately my skin is getting drier, and two fine lines are added at the corners of my eyes.
Of course no!
I am responsible for this batch of samples from the mine, which I must follow up the observation. Cannot be careless with my duties.
And... Tianyu still needs some assistance.
As for the fine lines, I'll find time to take care of it.
Any business?
Then excuse me, I have works to do.
Goodbye.
Don't know if Nighty is sleeping properly...
My sister. She hasn't slept for a long time.
Better when I'm with her, though she still can't sleep completely.
She was attacked by TDs when she's young, left with trauma.
Fortunately, I awakened in time to save her, which was somewhat blessing among misfortunes.
I heard that many people have similar trauma, with symptoms not only limited to insomnia, but also monosyllabicity...
Gets me so anxious...
You've seen that two researchers, right? Qimeng and Tianyu.
That little girl is so good at being peevish to others, but whenever she's with Tianyu she becomes shy.
That boy, Tianyu is equally foolish. Reluctant to say anything. Feels like he never knows how to talk.
The last time when I was on the mine, I saw the two of them observing samples together.
For TWO WHOLE HOURS, they spoke not a single word to each other.
Isn't that making you anxious?
Maybe I'm not fit for this job...
I thought Central Plains was perfect for a newbie like me to investigate.
Turns out full of MOs and TDs...
Can't beat them so I had to run. Caused trouble for juniors. What a shame...
Sob, sob, you're such a nice guy to stop and listen to me complain.
With your kind words... I hope that one day, I can become stronger and braver.
Everybody says Central Plains are safe. I say it's just another place filled with punks.
First it was the exiles, a bunch of bad, stealthy guys who pried my supply boxes...
I was going for revenge, but then I ran into another group of suspicious people who didn't feel benign at first glance.
Fine... If you see the exiles, tell me.
I'm going to beat the crap out of them and get the supplies back.
Or Yujin and I would have to starve.
…Oh, it's you.
Ever since that incident… I was reassigned here. They say I'm better suited for field research.
There's some Tacetite related studies, and I'm also responsible for monitoring the Tacet Field of Qichi Village.
Wait! Please. Were you involved in this? Did you help with my reassignment?
I'm fully aware that after doing those kinds of things, I couldn't have been allowed to stay at the Academy... I could've even been exiled…
Are you not allowed to say anything? Yeah… I shouldn't have asked. Anyway, I wish to thank you, and that person.
If it's possible, please let him know that I'm grateful to be a researcher.
I'll keep on walking this way, all thanks to him.
Also, I owe Ms. Bai… Bailian an apology. I hope she meets someone more trustworthy.
Rover, we meet again! It's good to see you in perfect shape!
Well, happy is a bit of an overstatement, but it's true that there's enough work here to keep me busy.
Let me tell you something interesting. This place used to be a hotel, where the owners published a magazine called the "Peace of Mind".
It has this section, "A Moment of Happiness", which is so good. We've been searching for every volume to read!
Err… Nothing new, really. It's research, same old, same old. Waiting for the moment that something would change.
I'm really good at waiting! You know that, right?
Byebye! Next time when we meet, tell me more about some other places!
Also, I owe Ms. Bai… Bailian an apology. I hope she meets someone more trustworthy.
You want to go there?
Not that good.
Are you alright?
Looks you're busy. I'll leave you now.
Have you encountered any difficulties?
Who?
It sounds like you adore her.
Good?
Are you alright?
You remind me of someone.
Can you hear them?
How's that?
Aren't you tired?
How's that?
Can you apply to be transferred?
Nothing special.
Nighty?
What happened?
What?
Take your time. It'll get better.
What punks?
Why are you here?
What are you doing here?
You seem very happy.
Anything new lately?
Goodbye.
Hey Rover, do you want to try out the Side Sprint Challenge?
Let me be clear, this is an extreme sport of considerable danger. Many of our people at the Pioneer Association were hurt because of this...
Answer me when you have thought through.
I'd like to try.
I'll pass.
Sunset, darkening the sky. Oh-oh, Oh-oh…
Xiaoshu, are we all set?
Great job, Rover!
Plead the black sky, before you plead the Celestial. Oh-oh, Oh-oh…
No, no. You're singing is the wrong way.
What are you two doing?
A song for the gods. If they think it's good, then they will come to our aid.
My brother's singing is pretty good, but he's got the pitch wrong.
We were planning to invoke the Black Sky Lord.- Greater, but the pitch he sang was used for the Black Sky Lord - Minor.
Does something like that really exist?
Is there a difference?
It seems that Rover doesn't know of the story of the Black Sky Lord. Allow me to explain it to you.
Black Sky Lord is a god who watches over Huanglong, he has many incarnations, with the larger one being the Black Sky Lord - Greater and the smaller one the Black Sky Lord - Minor.
Oh, I know of this one. It is during the Battle of Tiancheng, the adults were able to bring Black Sky Lord - Greater to our aid in the end, leading to our victory in that battle.
It participated in the Battle of Tiancheng?
That's right! The Greater Lord was formidable force, very large in size, even larger than Tiancheng! The moment it showed up, it chewed up all the TDs.

It is said that it was originally a god with striking appearance with a rainbow-colored haze on its head, but since it devoured too many TDs, its body became very dark, which is why we call it the Black Sky Lord - Greater.
Are you referring to the Divinity Sui'guang?
Lingfeng from the Rangers was the one that told us about it. Our good friends' also know of the Lord, Yangming, Doudou…
But, Greater or Minor, we really never succeeded in invocating the Black Sky Lord…
Could it be we're doing it the wrong way? Dad did mention that the Sky Lord feeds on TDs, there's no TDs in Tiancheng. Maybe that's why it's not coming.
Our dad took part in the Battle of Tiancheng, so we know he's telling the truth.
So we came here to find TDs!
Rover, there's a Tacet Field over there, can you help us out with it?
No, we can't! I already promised Xiaoshu yesterday that'll become a Ranger when I grow up and protect everyone.
Dad's a cheapskate, I can't believe he said we weren't made for it and all we could manage is cause more troubles for the Rangers…
Urrrghhh, Xiaoshu. That makes me so mad!
So that's why we have to call in the Sable Celestial, to prove to dad that we aren't just some drag.
Well, would be great if only the Minor Celestial came at least…
Pleeeassse, Rover, please help us out.
Oh, yes, we'll pay for your help! I'll give you all of my allowances…
Mine too…
You two are good boys. I'll do it free of charge.
Yippee! I knew we could count on Rover!
All we need to do is defeat those TDs! Use them as tributes! And the smell they give off might attract the Sable Celestial's attention.
What exactly do I need to do?
Defeat those TDs! We'll use them as tributes!
After that, Xiaoshu and I will start singing, and then the Sable Celestial might come afterwards.
*Weeps *Weeps
What do we do if it doesn't come?
Don't get your hopes up.
Cut it out with the crying already, Xiaohuan! How are you suppose to become a Ranger like that when you grow up!
Good, I'll start it off. Make sure you use the right pitch this time.
OK!
Sunset, darkening the sky. Oh-oh, Oh-oh…
Plead the black sky, before you plead the Celestial. Oh-oh, Oh-oh…
Set up camp, stars shine bright, ears and cheeks, listen carefully. Oh-oh, Oh-oh…
Phantom guards up high, Tacetite soldiers down low. Oh-oh, Oh-oh…
Evil devil don't you dare, I plead the master's golden words. Oh-oh, Oh-oh…
The world don't you panic, the Celestial light descends to protect the peace. Oh-oh…
Xiaoshu, Xiaoshu! Did something just happen?
I think so, yeah…
But the Celestial didn't show up…
Let's give it another go! More effort this time!
Are you sure its working?
Are you sure it's not inviting something unpleasant?
Exactly. But why is the Celestial not here yet… Did we get the lyrics wrong?
Let me see… Xiaohuan, do you still remember that piece you sang a few months ago?
Red Censer, Purple Censer. That one? Yeah, I still remember it! I remember all of it!
Perfect, since we're outside the city already, might as well give it a try!
For sure. The one that we just used, I remember people saying it was about the part when the Sable Celestial - Greater was eating up all the TDs and monsters during the Battle of Tiancheng.
There are other lyrics?
The one we're about to sing right now, is when the Celestial was still in its formal grace.
Back when it was still handsome with a rainbow-colored haze!
Here we go!
I'm prepared for the unexpected.
I'm sure there won't be accidents. Ready, Xiaohuan?
Red Censer, Purple Censer, leaving behind the Blue sea, falling to the ground. Oh-oh…
Orange Tai Sui, indigo Tai Sui, line up the yellow incense whip, worship the old master. Oh-oh…
The golden light shines, the silver light opens, it's the end of noon the seven-colored heavenly soldiers all descends to Tiancheng. Oh-oh…
Before the gates I call on the warriors. Oh-oh…
Behind the gates transfer orders. Oh-oh…
Rover?
Hey… It's Uncle Lingfeng and Uncle Debiao. What brings you here?
Everyone's been looking for you two, Xiaoshu! Someone told us they saw you and your brother being abducted by someone in a weird dress, so we rushed over here!
Didn't expect it was Rover.
No, we weren't abducted. We asked Rover to help us with the Sable Celestial's ritual… Please don't blame {TA}…
Sable Celestial? You were trying to call on the the Sable Celestial?
I'm sorry. The grownups usually don't let us come out into the wilds, so I didn't tell anyone. It's all my fault…
We'll take about that later. You're all safe, that's what's important.
Debiao, why don't we take the brothers back to Tiancheng first.
No, wait. We still haven't seen the Celestial yet.
That's right. If it weren't for the song stopping halfway, it would've definitely came!
So you're saying we're the ones that messed it up.
Xiaoshu, the Sable Celestial possesses power beyond imagination. With you two being here, it won't show up no matter what you do.
It's too afraid to put any of you in danger because of that power.
Did your dad not tell you about this?
Aww… No way…
Dad never mentioned anything like that! He lied to us!
There you go. So for now, how about the two of you go back to Tiancheng with me? As for the Sable Celestial, we'll leave it to Lingfeng.
If we find the Sable Celestial we'll take pictures for you. What do you think of that?
Really?
Mm-hmm. I promise. Don't you forget that I've seen the Sable Celestial - Greater myself during the Battle of Tiancheng, you know?
Since you've put it that way, I guess we'll go home… Promise you'll send us those pictures, Uncle Lingfeng!
Well… Goodbye, Uncle Lingfeng. Goodbye, Rover!
If we'd known if was you, Rover, we wouldn't need to be so worried.
The brothers were raised by the Rangers, and both of their parents… Were also former Rangers.
The two of you know the young brothers?
During the Battle of Tiancheng, their mother lost her life in battle, and their father, also suffered the price of an arm and leg.
While I understand their father's reluctance to let them join the Rangers when they grow up. I just didn't expect them to be so obsessed with the story of the Sable Celestial.
"Want to be like your parents?" It's good to have such faith.
So the stories about the Celestial is true?
Not entirely. A few simple songs won't summon it, at least.
Come with me.
If you have seen the original Sable Celestial, which is the "Sable Celestial - Greater" the kids were saying, you may come to a different view.
Countless blood and sweat rested on hot soil which began to steam, blood-filled vapor mixed with Wutherons dispersed within the air…
And just like that rainbow earlier, a huge, bizarre rainbow appeared across Tiancheng.
I've never seen anything like it… Under the mixture of Wutherons and blood, what was supposed to be a gorgeous rainbow, was then filled of darkness and decay.
But the strange thing is that the surface of that darkness, presented a polluted seven-colored glow…
It is as if there are newly formed red flesh, trying to grow under the rotten flesh of a necrotic wound.
That was the original Sable Celestial - Greater. A rainbow mixed of darkness and brightness, death and renewal.
I couldn't look at it straight on for a while, but then I forced myself to do so because I knew there was something transcendent in it.
Perhaps it is the will of the warriors to guard their homes, or of their souls unwillingness to leave.
Even without their bodies perish, they will draw the final drop of blood in their bodies to face the enemy.
As the faith of the deceased lives on, how can the living not face up to their sacrifice?
So after the battle, we changed the story a little, and repeated it to children like Xiaoshu and Xiaohuan.
We told them that their mother and father had fought heroically against the enemies, which called upon the powerful Sable Celestial help protect their homes.
But once they are a little older, they will know that the real Celestials are their mother and father.
Oh, yes, you still have to record this image of the Sable Celestial for the children, right? You may want to do it quick, as it won't be around for long.
No, I've changed my mind.
It's better to have them find out for themselves when they've grown up.
That may be the best.
I am also looking forward to what they will become when they grow up, and what Huanglong would become.
Alright, I still have a lot of work to do back in the city, so I'll be taking my leave.
Rover, be careful out in the wilds, and if you get into any troubles, don't forget you can always call us for help.
I want to be alone for a little while longer. Until we meet again.
Did you and Uncel Lingfeng find the Sable Celestial?
We did.
Oh, I see it now...
Xiaoshu… How could this be?
So there wasn't a Sable Celestial after all? Waah…
No, Xiaoheng, there is one!
Eh?
What are you planning to do?
Keep it.
If you insist.
To say sorry to dad. I called him a cheapskate earlier, but he isn't one…
That's because, he's the Sable Celestial that's protected everyone in the past!
I have to apologize to dad…
You've grown up.
But once we're really grown up, we still want to join the Rangers! Even if he doesn't say agree. We'll go ask Uncle Lingfeng for it. Right? Brother?
Y…yup!
We used to have everyone protect us, but in the future it'll be our turn to protect everyone!
Oh… No, no! Sui'guang is Sui'guang, and the Black Lord is the Black Lord!
Yes, they're not the same! Sui'guang is also powerful and all, yet the Black Sky Lord seems to be more powerful!
Xiaohen and Xiaoshu began singing the peculiar ritual song once more. You carefully stand guard of the surroundings
Without warning, a stream of air crashes from behind, you look towards its origin, finding two unknown shadows approaching you. You quietly rest your hand on the hilt of your blade.
The shadows quickly arrived in front of you… You took you hand off your blade. They were Rangers.
Didn't expect the ritual was meant to summon Rangers.
Why don't the two of you head on home with me first?
How did the two of you end up here?
After that, Xiaoshu and I will start singing, and then the Sable Celestial might come afterwards.
Rover, you can do it!
Lingfeng stood at the riverside. He fires a few rounds into the water with his rife, water vapor began to steam, and shortly afterwards, a strange black sky bow appeared in the sky.
Lingfeng gazed longingly at the bizarre black-colored bow in the sky. \nAs rainbow gradually dispersed, he also turned away and left.
Hey, watch out. You hurt me!
Calm, calm. Would you put away your weapon first?
Ahhh, don't do that!
... dull ache, familiar.
Don't you have eyes? Be careful, you'll be in trouble!
Those who abuses violence shall one day be devoured in violence.
Wa-wa-wa-what do you want? Help! Robbery! Harassment!
Ho ho... daring, aren't you?
Don't you go! Pay for the treatment!
How dare you to hit me? You know who I am?
Cut it a bit. I'm so full I'm gonna throw up.
Hic... You drank more than I did? What tea was so fine?
Oh my wuth. You are messing up my dress.
You got vigor, young one. Why don't you save it for Huanglong.
Baiju... No, wait, Qingru, save me!
If you want to hit someone, hit me. Let Pinwen go.
Be nice and try to talk. Don't be so anxious.
If you continue to commit misconducts, you might be included in a blacklist of the Pioneer Association.
I will hold you accountable when I become a great explorer.
... Don't you find it hard or rubbing?
Sob sob, I will call my sister to throw you a rock!
I, I will not back donw! For Maqi!
Hey, I'm working. Keep away!
Don't hit one in his face... My life depends on it.
Why didn't you knock me out, so I'd get some rest.
Eh, wa-was it a new way of saying hello?
Aww, I see stars... Hey wait... there is fairyland!
Waaa! Pandary save me!
Youth, play no game.
Don't you judge me with this, I play military characters in the opera! Were it not for the prohibition to beat audience... hum!
Ho ho... don't flame yourself so much, young one. Some herbal tea to cool you down?
You little brat, you dare to hit me!
I was hit by the well-known Rover... Was it the legendary Return Me Pretty Face fist?
You are bullying children. I will call sister Chixia to teach you!
Sigh. Hit me as you like. I've lost my son. I will live neither.
You got strength in your arms, young one. Teach this disobedient girl a lesson for me!
Sob sob, Mama...
My mother is a Morn Guard! She's super tough! You'll have a fit when she's back!
bo, body contact with the Rover...
Hm, another form of pain... eureka.
No matter what happens, I will not part with Lulu.
As long as Qixian's by my side, I am not afraid of anything.
It's darkness... I, the nightbringer, has smelled darkness!
Just keep smiling, and you won't feel the pain.
Get away! I don't want to treat anyone with violence.
Audacious! You want to try my new-learned wrestle skill?
If that makes you feel better, be at will.
Yo, don't you think I won't get tough.
Hey, show your respect and leave some XXX, and I can pretend nothing happened.
Threatening national property, that's not something you can get away with with just some damages.
Hey hey hey! A rare opportunity of training!
This time, I will not be careless!
Showing off in front of an expert like me, bold of you, isn't it?
You have good manner. A trained fighter, aren't you? Interested in a few rounds?
Challenge me? You are not qualified.
Warning, warning, under unidentified attack.
Anyone who abuses violence shall be held accountable before Huanglong's laws.
Hm, don't run! When my father is back from work you will see!
Surely I am not having yet another competitor?
Can I quit researching if I get hurt?
I am no suspect. I, I just passed by!
Sob sob, I just want to see my Huaijin again.
Mama, someone is bullying me!
If blood has to be spilled, I hope it will be for Huanglong.
Eh eh, don't touch my interview script!
Don't make me tarnish the sacred place!
Bad guys here? Hm... Tuanjin will not back down!
Trespassing on Long Zhu's residence? Only across my body!
Even if I die along with you, I will not let you in!
Though you saved our lives, you are still not allowed to make noise in Long Zhu's residence.
Rescuer, why do you have to do this?
Hss... What terrible power, even more terrible than grave, distant guardian.
Don't do that. If she doesn't see me when she's back, it will break her heart.
What happened to you today? Don't make strange jokes.
No actions shall escape my watch!
Don't go for the stomach. If I throw up on you, I won't pay for your clothes.
Accept
I'm coming with you.
I accept your request.
Xuanyin installs frog language translation module onto your Resonance Terminal
You are always accidentally showing up at important places, aren't you...
Hey, {PlayerName}, why are you here?
Run, run, run! Run, run, run!
Just wandering.
I see nothing special.
Alwa, alwa, alwa.
Doesn't that sound like "always"? Lovers think that means "always and forever", and wish this will bless their love.
They even give the Black-Striped Frogs a trivial name, "Alwa Frogs".
There have been similar customs before, such as love locks and the like...
No. They only add to the clutter that needs to be cleaned up when lovers break up.
Did them work?
Anyway, back to the business. Let's load the module first.
Footsteps come and a couple arrive at the pool, seemingly surprised by your presence.
Huh? How come someone gets here first...
We booked this time slot. Could you be mistaking something?
Sorry sorry. We are here only for some researching. Leaving soon.
Wait a moment. Are you... Xuanyin? I'm Pushen, working at the lab next to yours. I heard your interest was in animal lauguage translation. Are you here to look into the Black-Striped Frogs?
Hm, yes.
Then do you know what they are saying? Are they blessing us?
(Looking at you questioningly)
(Nod)
(Shake head)
The truth is they are surprised by human, and making alerting sounds to inform their kind of danger and the chance to run.
Such bad luck. Let's find another place to date.
Hmm... maybe another day? I'd take some time to reconsider our relationship.
Ha?
Oh... actually they were saying "wish you be together for a century".
What a strange thing to say, though true it's good omen.
So you're selling souvenirs for the next step? No thanks. Let's get out of here.
The couples leave in a haste. Some part of their relationship seem to have changed.
The couple is disinterested and leave in a hurry.
What a dramatic night... sometimes knowing the truth is kind of a burden.
Ha ha, save me some face. Let's go back. I'll meet you next time.
Though that might not be the truth too.
Xuanyin uninstalled frog language translation module from your Resonance Terminal, and cleared related data.
We meet again, {PlayerName}. Some milk tea?
Well... recently milk tea is indeed very popular in Tiancheng, and the mainstream flavor is salted milk tea, which I love to drink too. But why has this rare and odd taste been derived anyway?
Moo, moo... moo!
Just a joke. Don't kick me!
This is our interviewee today?
Yes, and as per our convention...
Here, Resonance Terminal.
Xuanyin installs artiodactyla language translation module onto your Resonance Terminal
Hey, hey. We work fine together!
None... none...
None what? Still not so accurate to make clear of what they mean solely with translation modules...
Animals' intelligence doesn't allow them to say coherent sentences, after all.
Can I ask you to scan the surroundings? Maybe there are other useful clues.
You finally found out.
Not reflecting on yourself at all.
One drop, another drop... all moo moo *gibberish*
Error again... let me uninstall the module.
Xuanyin uninstalled artiodactyla language translation module from your Resonance Terminal, and cleared related data.
Wait, wasn't that a bull? It suffered from that too... poor animal. Hope the frenzy for specialty milk tea could fade away soon.
Didn't expect to meet you in this kind of wild field, {PlayerName}.
Xuanyin installs bird language translation module onto your Resonance Terminal
They sound like laughing at us...
Guess what animal translation module I brought this time?
Heard greyhead jaegers screech from afar.
Nice guess. It's bird language translation module. Huanglong's waters are necessary path for greyhead jaegers' migration, but they are regularly fed around Huanglong.
Moreover, responding to the increasingly worsening environment in the wild, most greyhead jaegers have given up their instinct and become resident birds.
According to my observation, the language of the residents have changed. Apart from the communication among their kind, they have developed some special cries that they only make to human.
Maybe that's their effort to communicate with human... let's collect some language samples for analysis.
Greyhead jaegers plunder the Stir-Fried 'Tacecrux' when you are not paying attention and leave. Then they hover over your heads in a provoking manner.
Come! Come! Come! Come come come...
What come?
I heard greyhead jaegers has a taste for human food, especially Stir-Fried 'Tacecrux'. Could they be asking for food?
From the last time I already knew that you are an excellent chef holding back. I'll rely on you this time!
Take some Stir-Fried 'Tacecrux' and we'll see.
By the way, greyhead jaeger is a kind of lazy and violent bird, they prefer robbing people of their food to waiting to be fed. We'll have to cooperate with them in a while.
A-choo... Sorry, I stayed all night at the water last night. Wanted to cultivate the relations with greyhead jaegers...
But at last I was not only robbed of my food, but caught a cold. Haha.

Now then, having tasted these Xiao Loong Buns, I'll be heading out soon.
Oh. One last thing, can I have Rover's contact information?
You're just like that lady who gave me these clothes, you all so kind.
I forgot to ask for her contacts last time, so I won't forget it this time.
I'll be there.
Sure, but no harassment calls.
I won't! I just want to make a friend with you.
Well, alright.
Alrighty then, I believe it's time for us to say goodbye!
Wait! I should've said in a Huanglong way…
So, Rover. Until we meet again!
The two of you exchanged contact information.
You seem really like a local.
Did something happen to him?
Uh-huh...
Rover, are you there?
Az?
That's right, hehe. I've wanting to give you a call, but at the same time didn't want to disturb you.
My very own Xiao Loong Buns are still in the works… However, Ms. Panhua has taught me something that's even more simple to make, Garlic Sauce Bird! It has great flavors, and just as delicious!
I managed to get my hands on some top quality poultry meat today at Central Plains, and I thought I would make one for you to try it out.
Do you have time for a picnic?
Already on my way.
Fantastic! Oh… One more thing.
The spices that was planning on using got soaked with rain, the Baizhi in particular…
They're usable, but it'll affect the flavors for sure.
So if you've got the time, can you help me get some more along the way…
Of course not! I just want Rover to enjoy some delicious Garlic Sauce Bird.
I'm guessing you only thought of me because you're missing spices.
The rest of the ingredients that I prepared are the best, hehe.
Understood.
I'll wait for you next to the abandoned hotel at Central Plains.
Rover, it's good to see you again!
Why did you pick here for a picnic, of all places?
Here? It's mostly a ruin now, but I did clear up the place a bit before you came, so we have somewhere to sit at least.
There's a phrase for a situation like this, what was it again? Oh!
It's called "The footpath strewn with fallen blooms is not swept clean; My wicket gate is opened but for you today!"
You sure learned of Huanglong sayings.
It sounds interesting, but what does it mean?
Why, thank you!
It's a saying from Huanglong. Meaning, in order to welcome you, I purposely cleaned the yard that has not been cleaned for a long time!
It's not my own yard per se, but you get the point.
Right. Rover, did you manage to get us some Baizhi?
Awesome! Now we can make the perfect Garlic Sauce Bird! Wait right here, one delicious Garlic Sauce Bird, coming right up!
After a short while, Az presented you with a plate of fragrant Garlic Sauce Bird. The two of you enjoyed a wonderful meal.
*Burp… That filled me up really good…
A Garlic Sauce Bird with Baizhi, really does make the best Garlic Sauce Bird. Rover, how's that for culinary skills, hehe.
Always eating out alone, can sometimes make you feel a little lonely.
It feels much better with Rover having a meal together with me.
As a thank you, here, take this Garlic Sauce Bird recipe.
You're always busy and all, but don't forget to have your meals on time.
Otherwise, even for a Resonator like you, you still might get sick from lack of nutrition.
I wouldn't mind if you want me as your meal buddy, hehe.
Ok. On to my next stop. See you around, Rover.
I wonder whose striking that bell…
Come here, it's too dangerous up there.
It's no biggie, Rover, I've climbed cliffs steeper than this before. Easy-peasy!
I came here to look at Sui'guang's statue when I heard the bell.
What are you doing here?
I followed the sound until I found this place, the sound seems to be coming from that lake. I wanted to go down and check it out…
But the closer I got, the stronger the sense of danger became.
There must be something incredible inside that lake!
With a powerful Resonator as Rover beside me, why would I!
You don't seem scared at all.
You seem really excited about it.
Hehe, that's wall adventuring's all about!
Wait, don't say it yet!
If you say it now… It would be like you've only just read the beginning of the story, and now the ending's revealed.
I'd rather solve the mystery myself than hear about it.
Huzzah! I'll look after myself so I won't cause any trouble.
That bell is actually…
That bell is actually…
Then you should come with me.
It's too dangerous for you.
Well, that's too bad… Rover, can you go find the origin of the bell instead, I'll stay right here and watch over you.
OK.
Rover, did you manage to take a picture of Mr. Turtle?
Wow! So this is how it look up close…
What would I do without you, Rover!
Also, you really do spoil me.
I'm really glad you helped me in solving this mystery today.
I know I could just look up the information of Gorges of Spirit, or even ask everyone in Tiancheng about the origin of the bell, but what's the fun it that?
I understand how you feel.
Yup!
Until next time.
Phew… That was close, I better get going.
Az? What happened?
What a coincidence, Rover. You're here as well.
I saw a few people being surrounded by TDs just now.
They were all Resonators, wearing uniforms from the Pioneer Association. But it didn't seem like they could handle them.
I… I was scared, but I went up to help anyway!
Hehehe, sort of. Although I'm no where powerful enough to fight TDs…
But I managed to lure them away and led the others to safety.
You chased off the TDs?
It seems like you've already taken care of them.
That's a clever way of doing it.
Rover I know you are very, very powerful Resonator, but it's really dangerous here.
I can feel the high concentration of Wutherons in the Loong's Tears and the lake is turning red, which could also be the cause…
You must also be careful, too.
Before I came here, I prepared some extra things, here, take it.
Do you have enough for yourself?
Well, I'll be right back. My brother taught me that last time... The rich dare not sit right under the eaves!
You're quick on the uptake.
Hehe… The more I learn about Huanglong, the more interesting it feels around here.
Especially after learning Huanglong sayings!
Take care, Rover!
Sis, my classes are giving me a headache as it is, stop making me go through these boring stuffs.
Why don't we just go to the theater and hire a comedian to write for us?
How many times have I told you, writing a publication is a very serious matter, even if it's an extracurricular one.
Huh? I guess that explains why you don't have much friends, with all that seriousness and stubbornness of yours.
Oh, with all the hard work that was put into it, what would happen if "Yinxing Commentary" end up not being cared by anyone just like sis… *Sobs.
Hey, what are you babbling about again?
I just don't want to participate in ineffective social interactions, the efforts are better off used in looking up writing materials.
Does that mean, if it's an effective one, then you'll be interested?
What… what do you mean?
Hehehe, get into a chat with someone and have them comment on the publications, of course!
Please excuse me, friend that's passing by. My name is Xingzhu, and you?
My name's {PlayerName}.
Oh! I've heard of the name. The incredible Rover.
With your skills, can I ask you a favor in lending my sister a hand?
Don't worry, it won't take you long. It's really just a small favor, please!
Ahem. Hello, {PlayerName}. I beg your pardon for my sister's lack of manners.
My name is Yingzhu, I work for the Ministry's Bureau of General Affairs, and I'm currently in charge of writing an extracurricular publication.
It's called the "Yinxing Commentary", with the aim of widening students' scope and enlighten their thirst for knowledge.
But after my sister had read the initial drafts, she found it to be too uninteresting to draw any attention from the students at all.
{PlayerName}, do you mind cooperating with us in taking a small test?
It's just a simple quiz, it wouldn't matter if you answer them correctly or not.
I just wish to confirm whether the learning points are really that uncommon and difficult to understand or not.
I'm pretty confident with my know-how.
I hope I won't make a fool of myself.
I can’t thank you enough!
I look forward to your performance.
If that really does happen, then it's all sis' fault for sure.
The test results will be kept strictly confidential, and will only be used as a reference for furture writing changes.
So you don't need to worry too much, {PlayerName}.
No. 1. This question concerns the history of Huanglong having once battled against the Threnodians with the Divine Loong's aid.
Question. What was the code name for the counteroffensive used during that time?
Sui'guang
True Loong
The Divinity
Your answer is correct!
Notice the difference in attitude between you and Rover, Xingzhu?
The event marks a very important milestone in the history of Huanglong. You should remember is by heart.
Oh, enough already, sis. There are more questions to come. Let's just move on.
That is the incorrect answer, Rover. The correct name of the code name should be "True Loong".
This should've been common sense to you…
Don't say that, sis. You'll hurt Rover's feelings!
Don't mind her, {PlayerName}. How about we check out the next question?
Question No. 2 is about a technology that is now being widely used, the Tacet Discord absorber.
Question. What field of Wutherlogy does this absorbing technology's main theoretical basis fall within?
The answer is correct. This truly is a field you excel in!
Xingzhu, Wutherlogy is the foundation of today's society, thus a lack of understanding is not acceptable.
We don't even get the opportunity to use the absorber in our daily lives, anyway. So what's the point in knowing about it so much.
Tadistry
Wutheriumistry
Remmetry
Answering the question correctly has nothing to do with how your questions are set up, it just proves how wise Rover is.
If you don't believe me, I have my own set of questions we can't try. I bet it'll bring even better results!
That is the incorrect response. As you can tell from its name, the Tacet Discord absorber is most certainly belongs to the field of Tadistry.
Having the answer to the question with the question itself, really makes it feel like a trap!
I can relate to Rover's mentality, if it was me, I would've also guessed the other direction.
Why would you need to guess? You and your clever little tricks…
Why don't you let me give {PlayerName} a really interesting question!
Well, alright. If it works well, then I'll give it a consideration.
This next question will be about a cold appetizer dish, specialty of Tiancheng.
What is the main ingredient of the renowned "Shredded Crownless"?
Bravo! The correct answer!
You see, sis. Everyone's more interested in the average daily titbits, right?
Perhaps… I did overlook the reader's experience in the past.
It may not be a bad idea to add some interesting tips inside while keeping the content accurate.
Tee-hee. You're finally starting to get it, sis!
Actually, the dish is made with a rooster with its comb cut off.
I can't believe you haven't tried Tiancheng's specialty yet. What a shame.
Mutant Organism
Crownless
Rooster
Would you like me to take you to try it out?
Hey, enough playing around.
Regardless, thank you for your cooperation, {PlayerName}.
With these questions and answers as a reference, I now have new ideas for the writing of the "Yinxing Commentary".
I guess I did miss out on many aspects while writing my with head down in the past…
Please take these reward, you deserve it.
Oh, please, sis. Just admit that you can't keep up with the changing time.
Rover, can I ask you to help us with more testings in the future?
Have some modesty, Xingzhu. We've caused Rover enough inconvenience as it is…
Once I have "Yinxing Commentary" finalized, I'll be sure to put your name on the dedication page!
Well, then. I look forward to our future cooperations.
Be sure to have yourself well-prepared for questions the next time we meet.
Of course. Whether from my personal standpoint or as a Ministry staff, I wouldn't want to have your efforts be in vain.
It's nothing to worry about.
Receiving your payment counts as equal exchange in itself.
As a token of my gratitude, I'll also be putting your name on the dedication page!
Can't you think of something better as a reward? Sis!
Rover, I'll be preparing more questions for you next time as well. They'll definitely be more interesting than Yingzhu's.
I look forward to our future cooperations.
