First, the most impossible option ruled out. Hm, surely not sounds produced naturally.
Sound sample recorded. Thank you, Rover.
Must be someone trying to trick others...
Hello.
Who's that?
Oh, what a surprise. It's you, {PlayerName}...
A Dreadmane party? They got together and yowled...
Judging from their behaviors, they seem like being in their courtship.
That should be the truth about Midnight Yowling.
Midnight Rangers shouldn't be surprised to see this, given they've seen a lot of weird things.
After extinguishing them, those strange rumors should go away with them.
But if only people can muster the courage to take a look here in person, it wouldn't have made such a mess.
This might even provide an opportunity for the study of the association between wolf pack behavior and Resonators' Concerto Effects.
Why do you have to investigate these?
Because I had an experience when I was so scared by these horror stories I couldn't sleep.
If I hadn't found out the truth by accident, I am afraid it would leave a psychological trauma on me.
Since then, I have realized that staying close to science is the only way to stay away from fear.
Underneath the seemingly perverse and bizarre appearances, there is often a logic that fits common sense.
They could be as small as the weird rumors on the street, or as large as Lament, which felt like the end of the world...
Our purpose at Huanglong National Geographic is to discover the truth behind it all!
Er... because it has not yet been officially recognized, and it has only one member for the time being, that is me.
I haven't heard of such an organization.
Regardless, Rover, I appreciate your potential!
Would you like to be considered as our guest fellow?
With regard to the funding, it's all paid by me personally, so your compensation may not be so generous...
If that's a paid job.
If it involves more than investigating strange rumors.
But wouldn't it be a great reward to find out the truth for yourself?
Don't worry, sooner or later, Huanglong National Geographic will become the most popular organization!
The next time you encounter an abnormal event, you should still make every effort to find out the truth.
I've met you back at Pioneer Association. Are you also here to investigate the Midnight Yowling event?
We received complaints recently about constant, weird yowling being heard on midnight, but couldn't find its source.
What is the Midnight Yowling?
The rumors were spread wider and wider and finally reached Midnight Rangers. They sent a special force to investigate whether it was TD.
Though it wasn't, people remained disturbed and they kept questioning things.
So, as an investigator from the HNG, I am duty-bound to find out the truth.
Hey, what do you think about sitting here with me and finding what's really behind all this?
Sure.
Right, deal then!
I'm Shouye, a Huanglong National Geographic Society member dedicated to investigating abnormal events.
Greetings, guest fellow.
Summoning TD monsters of higher ranks through the act of dancing, it's unbelievable.
Murmurs in hordes, dancing and singing here?
Recently, have you heard the widely circulated rumor of crop circles?
In fact, not only crop fields, ground surfaces at many places are showing strange patterns and markings which weren't there the night before.
Some say it is a trace of a mysterious civilization, while others say it is a ritual of some cults.
I don't believe these claims. What kind of cults would engage in such a make-believe-game ritual?
We have to figure out what the strange circles represent.
Well, based on the pattern of those marks, I surmised the possible location of the next circles.
Are you going on the investigation with me this time?
I'll be there.
Execellent, let's go.
It should be the traces they leave behind that form the so-called strange circles.
It makes sense if it's Murmur, given their appearances showing little intelligence.
Wait, they summoned a Devourer!
Is this their spontaneous move, or is it dictated by the Devourer?
Or maybe the dancing wasn't necessary at all, and they are just imitating certain human behaviors...
Hm, true!
We're not even familiar with the ecology of our old friend Murmurs. Mysterious civilization is nonsense.
At that proves it's not some mysterious civilization.
We meet again, guest fellow.
Most of these plundered materials are processed Tacetreite products.
You should know much about Hoochieves, don't you?
A little.
From an evolutionary point of view, the Hoochief is considered the MO who has the closest relationship with human.
Though such a "relative"... hm, is kind of unapproachable.
They are as obstinate and mischievous as street punks who make scenes and pilfer people.
Vivid comparison.
Sigh, some time ago, they stopped making the mess for the Hierarch's sake, but recently they began to plunder supplies frequently.
Guest fellow, let's go and find what these "street punks" are really after.
With their primate intelligence after the mutation, do they really know how to utilize the energy stored in Tacetreite?
Unlikely.
I think so. That's why maybe they loot the Tacetreite for its... appearance.
Perhaps, this species of ape with social awareness already developed a primitive concept of tribal property.
They may be collecting crystalline and shimmering processed Tacetreite to be used as currency.
However, maybe one day they will really learn to use Tacetreite energy too...
So street punks also grow up?
Heh, maybe by that time, it's the Hoochief's turn to investigate human beings.
Here you come, guest fellow. Have you seen any strange traces lately?
Down the traces, this should be the place that attracted the Spearback Ursas.
I mean Ursus spelaeus sagispina, a.k.a. Spearback Ursa's claw prints.
Their theoretical habitat is not nearby, yet sightings have been reported recently.
The sudden migration of large predators may be a harbinger of some kind of ecological change.
Shall we investigate that?
I only saw your footprints.
If we can find the relevant traces, we might well find out the reason of the migration.
Is this a... spawning egg of the fish?
However, this kind of fish has long been recognized as extinct due to geological changes.
Have the cake and eat it... that's possible, though.
Good thing to have the cake and eat it, too.
When the dam was built back then, some underground rivers and caves were artificially connected.
Perhaps with the help of these passages, the fish could escape and flourish.
The ecological impact of human activity is not always negative yet.
Take close care. Don't overlook Spearback Ursa's aggressiveness.
Hello, guest fellow. Today we got a new rumor to be made clear.
Were you gazed by the Geohide Saurians during that fight?
To start with, do you know the origin of the species name Geohide Saurian?
Was it because of the Tacetite crystal spikes?
Not necessarily. Witness say, it's because they will petrify their prey through their gaze.
Whether being stared at by them, or accidentally glancing at them, one might be reduced to a statue...
Oops, you found the blind spot. Why don't we investigate and debunk the rumors ourselves?
If that were true, how come the witnesses?
A group of feeding adult Geohide Saurian... with debris and pieces of rubble scattered around.
Are they really consuming their preys petrified by their gazes?
Then don't move, let me give you a good treatment...
I'll be serious. I want to check their gastric content.
...This smells really stimulating, one'd quit eating meat for months if one should smell this.
Well, there are food remnants covered with digestive juices, and fragments of active Tacetite inside.
This is not some kind of pica. In fact many avian species have similar behavior.
As for the motive, I presume it is to promote the development of Tacetite crystal spikes on their body surface.
These mixtures are wrapped in lipid clusters in a particulate state and transported to the epidermal cells via blood.
I, seem, petrified.
Surprised me that you actually got out the medical tools.
Feeding on raw Tacetite minerals. Curious diet.
Is that "you are what you eat"?
Good interpretation, but don't bite Tacetite the way they do.
Greetings, guest fellow.
Than, thank you for the back and forth with those rampant creatures.
I've been thinking about the curve of the tusks of Sabyr Boar. Have you noticed that?
I haven't paid attention to boar's appearance...
You words made it strange for me to have interest in boars.
Let's first investigate the reasons why they retain this trait.
No wonder these boars keep their body fat percentage so low. They are really good at running.
Their charges are more nimble than imagined.
Maybe I know the reason now.
Look, their tusks have fresh sharpening marks.
Taking into consideration the surroundings, they must have a habit to sharpen teeth with Tacetite.
It's not wearing. It should be called hardening instead.
Look, once the attack is dodged, what if the tusk pierce into the tree trunk mud or something like that?
Wearing teeth? Are they not giving up their advantage by doing that?
With their brute strength, it would be a problem if they couldn't pull it out.
However, if they make a curve on the teeth, it can be pulled out by simply applying pressure in the direction of the development of the teeth.
These boars don't even spare themselves, do they...
They are not only ruthless, but smart. They are using the self-sharpening character of Wutherium Fluid coating.
It seems that human really underestimated Sabyr Boars.
Good day, guest fellow. Our investigation subject for this time is Ardea cinerea bipenna.
Thanks to you, guest fellow. We've got a chance!
And our purpose is to study the nurturing of poultry creatures with multiple pairs of wings in order to raise the production of chicken wings.
What a ridiculous research interest.
How can you say it's ridiculous. Think about it, one serving of Garlic Sauce Bird with seven or eight extra pairs of wings attached...
Then, leave that to me!
You're quite motivated for works like this.
Though I might let you down.
Ardea cinerea bipenna, which is not good at flying, not only failed to degenerate, but grew an extra pair of wings.
According to the principle that structure fits function, there must be something fishy about these two pairs of wings.
Don't think about the fried wings, I'll treat you to as much as you want after the investigation is completed.
I am reminded of an old world bird called Black Heron.
When Black Herons fish, they will form a circle with their wings to create a shade of cover.
Whereas Feathered Herons, which prey on Cluster Prism, use the same method to confuse the enemy.
Yes, they tried to use their wings to disrupt your attention during the battle just now.
Though you weren't disrupted at all due to your skills.
Hope for increased production of fried wings?
Are the wings an aid to their hunting?
Lucky Impermanence Heron only had one pair of wings.
Hm, that's what I'll study later...
Turtle... Land Turtle... Water Turtle... Snapping Turtle... Frostbite Tertoise...
As poikilotherms, they are much more active than me...
Oh? You are here, guest fellow.
If only I could coax myself into sleeping with such simple method.
Actually, I'm preparing for the ecological research for Frostbite Tertoise.
Obviously terrestrial, they have a streamlined dorsal armor and a flat head which are adapted to aquatic life...
Are you trying to sleep by counting turtles?
I'm really losing sleep if I can't be crystal clear about the answer to this.
Judging from their tendency to bite and attack, it's obviously not the time for hibernation.
Other environmental conditions... dormancy... activeness.
You reminded me! The back armor and head of Frostbite Tertoise should be the result of adaptation to the Wuthering Waves environment.
The increased area facilitates the targeted collection of Wutherons and is more sensitive to environmental changes.
Right. For them, the Choral System should be the most annoying creation in the world, right?
The Choral System impacts the distribution of Wutherons reversely, thus interfering their behaviors.
Fluctuations and changes in Wutheron density, which are imperceptible to humans, are also very obvious to them.
With that "panle" on their back, no wonder they become extraordinarily annoyed whenever they approach the Choral System.
Maybe they become dormant for other environmental conditions.
Like solar panels?
Turtles... neither have easy lives.
Yes, with that kind of back armor, they are still forced to stay away because of the Choral System.
The subtlety and complexity of nature is inherently no less than any human invention.
Human modification of nature, however, has led to many unpredictable results.
Guest fellow, have you prepared emergency medicines?
Well done, guest fellow! You defeated Cyrscorpion so cleanly and neatly.
Our next research subject is Cyrscorpion, especially the structures of their tails.
This arthropod is not only good at stinging, but also capable of spewing deadly venom.
Which do you find more dangerous?
Of course when both are combined.
An answer only adults will give.
Although we do need to examine how these two functions are combined.
Only by dissecting specimens, I am afraid that it is not enough to draw any conclusions.
However, the capture process could be intense and might damage the tail structure of Cyrscorpions...
I can cope.
Don't push yourself too hard.
Collecting samples is secondary to your own safety!
Sure enough, the composition of the sprayed venom is very different from that of the injected venom.
This so-called toxin is not secreted by the poison glands... it’s a quasi-picric acid compound.
A new organ using the end of the intestinal tract's mutations that concentrates Wutheride-nitro compounds in food?
The intermediate product is stored by Cyrscorpion and then ejected in a small detonation when needed.
Sounds dangerous.
True. Such an unstable compound could never be collected with me alone.
Thank you, guest fellow. You helped a lot!
Guest fellow, you will definitely be interested in this investigation!
It seems that these hoarding enthusiasts are not just storing food.
How about a survey of the burrowing behavior of the relatively low-risk Myospalax actinoaftia?
Hey, don't you think their large ears look particularly interesting?
Ahem, that's not the point. The point is, what exactly are they hoarding in the caves.
Maybe not everyone like rodents.
After all, their usual favorite, small invertebrates, are not so suitable for storage.
Alright, You just need to lure out those Excarats, and then leave the rest of the work to me!
People who resent bugs are even more...
Keep an eye on these scurrying little guys, for their nest must be not far away.
Follow the trails and we'll have a thorough sweep!
Mechanical parts, Tacetite fragments, and so many chamber bitter fruits... so that's why.
Yes, but like humans, they have discovered the medicinal effects of these plants.
Perhaps they deliberately collected these plants for emergencies such as injuries and poisoning.
Excarats don't usually feed on chamber bitter.
Though from past records, not all Excarats are diligent in managing their nests either.
It may even be forgotten by the owner along with the chamber bitter fruits inside until it takes root.
Ha ha, next time you pass through dense chamber bitter bushes, be careful.
Perhaps there would a nest of Excarats hiding underneath.
Guest fellow, you're here. I've got a question for you.
Guest fellow. It's my hypothesis that went wrong this time, surprisingly.
Well done, guest fellow. Now the evidence is sufficient.
What do you call that MO insect with golden tentacles and two pairs of wings?
No way, you really think they look like butterflies?
And apart from that, they share nothing else.
Why do people refuse to call them their binomial name, Acanthacorydalis squapenna?
You mean Cruisewing?
Their wings do.
The naming of a creature should first describe it accurately, and whether it sounds good or not is less relevant.
Maybe because it's so hard to pronounce?
Let's go investigate. We must get to the root of the matter!
What evidence?
Molecular-biological evidence, of course.
Genetic sequencing of these debris samples allows comparison of affinities between species.
I'll take them back for experiments. When I have conclusion I'll immediately notify you.
Cruisewing really has many of the physiological characteristics of Lepidoptera.
However, they reproduce more frequently, have a high number of offspring individuals, so they can accumulate mutations on a particular direction quickly.
The expression of the trait is very different from the previous due to the increased intensity of natural selection in the Wuthering Waves ecology.
Thus, it's not wrong they are called butterflies given these species follow convergent evolution...
Faced with the complexity of nature, who can claim to understand it?
Though to rule out a wrong answer counts as a significant result of the research.
I don't quite follow...
I don't expect to figure out all the world's unsolved mysteries on my own.
Maybe I'll keep making mistakes, but Huanglong National Geographic will always seek truths.
Guest fellow, meet you here again.
My Hierarch, I'm getting killed by these stupid fish with their coo-coo sounds.
I'd like to know, have you been ambushed by Gulpuffs hiding in the water?
But that doesn't make sense...
As passive ambushers with poor locomotion, how do they get the incentive to hunt in packs?
Especially when hunting alone allows them to hide themselves better, isn't it?
Then, we have to investigate to find out what kind of teamwork they have.
I'd be surprised if a shoal suddenly show.
Maybe they need cooperation.
Can you see how many Gulpuff there are in the water?
As far as I can see, there doesn't seem to be much interaction between them...
Safety first, guest fellow.
It's impossible to tell what they are doing to each other!
In order to... annoy?
It's getting clear. Is it like zebras of the old world?
Groups of zebras with their stripes mixed together can disturb the attention of predators.
And shoals of Tetraodon lateo can form a mimesis within an area to distract the enemy.
Thank you for the inspiration, guest fellow!
Maybe they deliberately do so.
Each time when we're about to hand over the export orders, I always get the feeling that there's not enough shipping containers.
There's plenty of small containers in reserve that we can use, or maybe just load them separately?
Nah, the lead linings and the isolator pads come in different dimensions.
Good enough for a short term trip, but a long one, whoo, Tacetite radiation is no joke.
They're a long-time customer now, how about we ask them to come pick up the goods themselves?
You can't be serious, not everyone has ocean shipping capabilities you know.
Let's just contact some of our other plants, have them temporarily spare us a batch of containers for now.
How's the new Resonant Film Arrays after tweaking its alloy ratio?
Don't even get me started, it's even worse than the previous model in purifying Wutherium Radiation.
How come? The statistics showed it doubled in filtering efficiency during trials.
The trial only went on for a couple of hours, you can barely see anything wrong with it yet.
But, these devices for us here runs for days, even months, none stop. Now that's a whole another level.
Could it be metal fatigue... No, variation in temperature might've let to resistance changes...
Here, how about you come to the production floor and feel it for yourself.
Daily pipeline inspection completed. The support pumps are still taking the most wear and tear.
I'm thinking it's those Exiles who call themselves the Chelations that are sabotaging the pumps.
Possible, they are growing rampantly in numbers.
But, why sabotage pipelines, instead of going after Tacetite goods?
I've heard rumors that their boss is Resonator who knows a thing or two about Tacetite research.
Maybe they found a new way of underground trade?
Regardless of what their planning, we should take precautions.
I'll report it to the higher-ups right away, otherwise it'll be too costly in the long term.
I don't want to see one of those four-legged snakes ever again.
You mean the Geohide Saurians? They shouldn't be a problem for someone like you, right?
I mean, I can beat 'em, but I can't guarantee I won't get hurt every time.
Just looking at their Tacetite-chewing teeth can't help but gives me the creeps.
Gotta agree with you there. Having them jump out of nowhere is pretty scary even if they missed you with that chomper.
I've placed a request for a nighttime operation, when the weather gets cold enough we'll thin out their numbers.
Hit these coldblooded lizards when they're at their weakest.
Excellent, I'm in, that's for sure!
*Sigh. It's finally my turn to make a trip to the Desorock Highland...
I've heard that they used to have plans to start a mining site over there as well.
It'll be one helluva a trip.
Good thing that it's just a business trip instead of having you stationed there.
*Sigh. If I don't spend more time with my daughter, she won't even recognize her daddy anymore.
Jeez... The amount of work this week is gonna kill me.
And the weird thing is that, when you're working you really want to have a break, but after you're finally on vacation you don't know what to do anymore.
How about... Going back and visit Qi'chi Village.
It's really close to here, yet it feels so far far away.
I wanna say "Nostophobia"... But I don't think that's the right way to put it?
*Sigh. When you're bored you start to think about all kinds of weird stuff.
The workpiece you've ordered has been delivered, please check and confirm your package.
Wait, they took it apart and mailed it separately...?
After evaluations by the sender, it was considered that there would be potential risks of damage, if the workpiece was to be shipped in an assembled state.
Thus, we have dismantled and packaged the parts separately in order to avoid such risks as much a possible.
If you would like, we can provide you with installation services for the workpiece.
Since the parts and the blueprint are all accounted for, I guess this should be fine.
Thank you for your hard work, a team of professionals really does make a difference!
Ever since we've been posted here, I've seen more Counterfall than my past life combined.
I heard it's got something to do with that gizmo in the cave. You know anything about it?
Well, you asked just the right person, I happened to have done a research or two on it.
The Academy did some makeover of the cave's interior, covered the entire inside walls with an Acoustic Barrier.
The Wutherium Fluid in our storage were mostly sent to fill the Wutheron density inside.
What does that have to do with the Counterfall?
Think about it. High density Wutheron, in such a small and tight space.
Each time when they're done, the release some Wutherons into the outside...
And that's causing all the Counterfall? That makes sense!
Next time there's a Resonator rising in Choral Rank, I'm gonna go take a good look at it.
*Yawn... I'm beat.
What's wrong? You're looking kinda pale, pulled an all-nighter again?
Well, it's all thanks to this "perfectly" designed workshop, I can't even work or sleep right.
It came with a full set of installations, didn't it? If you need anything, just send in an application.
That I can't deny, but I don't get why this place is structured like a bunker.
Once you're in here, there's not even a source for natural lighting. You can't even tell between night and day.
So once you've started working you can't get a sense of when to stop. I get it now.
In your case, I suggest you go outside and have little walk when you have some free time.
We humans are not Excarats after all.
You still remember how old this veteran tree is?
You mean Longwang? It should at least be 60 years old by now if we're counting from the Threnodian War alone.
It's hard to imagine how it maintained such good shape till this day, after going through all those wars over the years.
Well, "maintain" isn't quite the right word for it. It did have some rough times 13 yrs ago.
My professor and I took part in its restoration project at the time, and we would take care of it regularly.
And now... *Sigh, the tree's still here, but the Doc's gone forever.
Sorry for bringing up your sad memories.
Trees have their flourish and wilt, and humans have life and death. It's life.
The Doc taught me everything he knew, so it's now up to me to carry on his legacy.
There's a package for you from the Academy, please check for any damage and place your signature here.
*Sigh, I'll spare myself the hassle, I can already tell its materials from that last project.
I can't believe they still managed to find me of all places.
If you wish to remain undisturbed, you can choose to not accept this package.
Never mind, I didn't say I would reject it.
The materials are from my colleague.
He and I had fundamental disagreements on the understanding of Tacetite mineral, and we couldn't convince each other otherwise.
That's why I came here specifically, so that I find new evidence for my research.
And when the time comes, you make sure he receives 𝘮𝘺 𝘱𝘢𝘤𝘬𝘢𝘨𝘦 in front of every one!
The two of you seem to get along well.
Should we dispose of this Tacetite Cluster according to the treatment procedures?
Yeah, I don't think setting a security perimeter around it alone is enough to keep people safe.
For something that came directly after the Lament, we barely know anything about these Clusters.
And that's one of the reasons why we're here, to collect enough data from the samples.
Once we analyze and receive some results, it'll be of great contribution to the development of Desorock Highland as well.
And the amount of Clusters to be treated... Just got bigger.
Where have you been for the last couple of days? What, you don't want your attendance bonuses anymore?
Relax, I was on leave after coming back from an overseas business trip, huge contract.
Phew, well good for you then, you must be exhausted.
How did it go, got a good taste of the local customs?
I wasn't there on a holiday trip, y’know...
But, now that you've mentioned it, their food is quite special, very different from what we have.
Very special... Ahem.
Hey, next time, how 'bout we change shifts?
I'm not gonna lie, after worked for so many years, I haven't even gone outside Huanglong once.
Boy, It feels so much better going down the Northern Highway, at least it has streetlights.
Unlike the Western Highway, it's still in a rough state after that landslide 3 yrs ago.
On top of that, the cliff section collapsed this year as well. Makes me want to pull my hair out just looking at it.
Well, I actually prefer the Western Highway, you usually don't see anyone along the way.
Plus you have little cute animals scurrying out from side of the road, makes it even more interesting.
Speak for yourself, I really can't stand climbing highs and lows all day long.
I'm hoping to set a new record on delivery time.
Well, If put in the old days, one's good at road racing, while the other off-roading.
We have been patrolling and safeguarding around for long enough, but haven't seen even a trace of the Exiles.
Isn't that a good thing?
It's never a good thing!How can I prepare myself if there is no work the whole day!
Sigh, what a young man.
Those underdogs of Exile don't dare to confront us directly.
But they are much more good at pilferage and assaults on civilians. You will have chances to showcase yourself with those.
Tell you what, why don't you call me tutor and I will teach you these insider tricks step by step?
These parts are freshly taken from a scrap Rectifier. Do they really work?
Of course. It's called XXX. It stabilizes the status of Wutherons.
We can remold it a little and install it at the muzzle. It will work fine!
I didn't expect you're an expert at this?
I worked at the Ministry of Development. You didn't expect that, too, did you?
These arms are valuable. Got to make good use of them.
If I may comment, we should build this sculpture with bulk Tacetite.
Then we can spare the effort of coming all the way here to dig.
A sculpture made of Tacetite? You are creating a brand new Tacet Field, aren't you?
This kind of XXX has a fine finish and a vivid texture. Plus it does not weather easily.
It's so much better than Tacetite, except it cannot be extracted into Tacetreite.
Do we have other observation records for the abnormal turbulence of Wutherons?
No we don't. The last time we had a set of data at this size was 157 A. L..
157 A.L.... an unforgettable year for both the Rangers and the Ministry.
Yes. That retreat was such a regret.
No matter how many times we are interrupted, we will finish what needs to be done.
Whether it's a canal, a sculpture, or to excavate this mountain, we will make it!
I asked senior people before coming here. They all don't know what it was like in Gorges of Spirit.
Even the veterans who discovered here during the Threnodian war cannot provide anything valuable.
Why are you into this? What value can a remote gorge provide.
True. There are nothing but TDs and rocks here. Nothing lively.
That's not the case. What do you think we're building the sculpture for? Memory.
If we don't know enough about the history of this land, how can we keep things in memory?
The water here moves in an interesting direction. It seems nothing of a natural creation.
However, judging from the erosion traces, it's even older than when Huanglong started the construction.
A work of TD? No, should be MO, some strong kind of MO...
Could it be some ancestor of Frostbite Tertoise?
Is your body all right?
I'm fine. We are not deep yet. I can withstand.
OK. Keep a close watch on the reading of Wutheron density. The environment is not stable here.
If you experience anything uncomfortable, retreat and rest. Don't push yourself.
The TD wave of 154 A. L. in the records seems a little different from those elsewhere.
Sure. TDs evolve in an unpredictable way.
They bred themselves independently in a relatively closed environment. They are bound to become different.
Is that how TDs of Threnodian level came to be?
Threnodian? Even more unpredictable.
To be honest. I don't want to see the birth of a Threnodian in my life.
Like I've said, this is a routine research. There's no need to follow and protect me.
I hardly agree, sir. You are one of the top researchers. We cannot afford any accident happening to you, sir.
I'm fit, you see? Nothing's gonna happen even if I stay all day in the wild.
Should you not presume the presence of a TD, sir?
Suppose we don't meet TDs, we have to take into account earthquakes or other events. You could need attention, sir.
Humph, even so, it's my attention for you!
If this canal is built, do we have to return?
How can that be possible? When the trunk is done, we still need the branches.
And let's not forget the supporting bridges, ports and docks. They are all huge projects.
If you are willing to stay. There are works you can do!
That's assuring. I've worked so long here I don't want to leave.
Sigh, the rock faces are too steep up there. We couldn't find a spot to step on.
If we can't climb up to there, how can we collect research data on the vertical direction.
Maybe we can think another way. Why don't we make it to the top first, then drop the sensors from up there. Wouldn't that work?
You can't even negotiate the rock faces, how can you make it to the top?
Then let's find a Resonator for help. They can use paragliders and Gravity Streams. They go very high.
If you already find a Resonator for help, why bother? Why don't we collect the samples right away?
Hmm, that's true...
More people are signing up for the project than I expected, surprisingly.
All the credit goes to our Hierarch. She has such a good reputation, that people want to work out things for her.
I anticipate there's more reason?
Hahaha, then I'll tell you the truth.
The work here offers generous pay, and it's close to Tiancheng. A very ideal job to do.
If there wasn't this rumor of TDs, the number of people signing up could double.
I wonder why the building of the Sui'Guang sculpture has not been restarted...
The report clearly lists only small problems!
The structure of the rocks unstable... TD frequent... MO unusually active.
Alas, you don't understand. Now people are all afraid, fearing those disasters coming back...
If we can complete the Sui'Guang sculpture, we can surely inspire everyone.
After all, we all grew up listening to the stories about Sui'Guang saving Huanglong.
Will the report to Yirou just now be too blunt? Will she be unhappy when she reads it...
I disagree with her about the restart of building of Sui'Guang sculpture.
She is a very optimistic and idealistic person who insists on restarting the project, and I appreciate that...
Not that kind of appreaciation. Don't get me wrong!
But I don't think restarting the sculpture works is our top priority; there are other uses for the resources.
How do I convince her in a less annoying way...
This rock wall is so loose, I haven't used much strength yet, and it broke off.
Haobai will have a hard time writing that report. I wonder what reaction Yirou will show when she reads this...
Ha ha, not entirely because of the strength...
As long as you find the right way to exert the strength, you will be able to lift heavy things easily, and do a lot of seemingly impossible things.
It's kind of my Forte. Doesn't it sound a little too unimpressive? Haha.
Although it's very useful. I saved a lot of people trapped in the mountains.
If you encounter any difficulties, especially if you need to clear roadblocks or something like that, you can call me.
Did you know that water has voices?
I'm not referring to that...
For example, the little raindrops in the clouds can tell me when they are coming and how long they will stay...
Does that Forte sound... weak?
I used to have a sense of inferiority because of this, but after I came to explore the canal, my Forte helped my colleagues a lot.
I realized then that Forte doesn't differ in terms of strong or weak, what matters is how it is used.
I have to be worthy of my name... can't be discouraged!
It's actually my father's expectation of me. Excavate the mountains, create canals and lead them into the sea.
I'm like him. I'm a member at the Ministry of Development like him. We both do water resource projects.
He had been staying at Yunling Valley to open the canal until the TD wave...
It's alright. Now I carry on his legacy and try to advance his unfinished work.
And this is exactly where my personal interest lies.
When dad watches from heaven, he will be happy, right?
Hmm? We can't excavate this area. It will affect the biological community structure here...
Is it? Oh, right... There are surely more who focus on Tacetite in Huanglong Academy.
There's few like me who's devoted to biology, right?
I just want to minimize the ecological impact of research and development, after all...
Our world is very fragile now.
Speaking of which, according to my expectation, there should be giant Mutant Organism present in the water system of Gorges of Spirit.
But I haven't seen any report of it. So strange...
What are the problems?
They're not small problems actually.
How's that?
You are very strong.
Water can transmit voices, sure.
What's the history of your name?
May he rest in peace.
Your research seem to be different.
If only I can make some of my signature herbal tea for everyone...
Still so many goods yet to be carried...
How I want to have something refreshing...
All day's hard work, all exhaustion over.
Hss... the alarm hasn't sounded for years. Is there any failure?
How can there be so many failures? You look drowsy. You didn't make any mistakes when you did the packaging?
Brother, I became a miner like you. Going forward, I will chisel the Tacetite mine you have chiseled, and see the scenes you have seen.
All right all right. Let's calm down and fix the problem first.
How can there be so many failures? You look drowsy. You didn't make any mistakes when you did the packaging?
All right all right. Let's calm down and fix the problem first.
Cough, is that you... is that you coming back?
"Through border of clear and even, until you touch heaven..." If it's not for the words I said, you should have been singing freely, shouldn't you?
Cough, however things are already... what else may I do for you?
…Oh, it's you.
Why are you here?
What are you doing here?
Ever since that incident… I was reassigned here. They say I'm better suited for field research.
There's some Tacetite related studies, and I'm also responsible for monitoring the Tacet Field of Qichi Village.
Wait! Please. Were you involved in this? Did you help with my reassignment?
Are you not allowed to say anything? Yeah… I shouldn't have asked. Anyway, I wish to thank you, and that person.
If you get the chance, please tell him, I'm very grateful for able to continue being a researcher. I will keep going on this path. Thank you.
Also, I owe Ms. Bai… Bailian an apology. I hope she meets someone more trustworthy.
Rover, we meet again! It's good to see you in perfect shape!
Well, happy is a bit of an overstatement, but it's true that there's enough work here to keep me busy.
You seem very happy.
Let me tell you something interesting. This place used to be a hotel, where the owners published a magazine called the "Peace of Mind".
It has this section, "A Moment of Happiness", which is so good. We've been searching for every volume to read!
Err… Nothing new, really. It's research, same old, same old. Waiting for the moment that something would change.
I'm really good at waiting! You know that, right?
Byebye! Next time when we meet, tell me more about some other places!
Anything new lately?
Goodbye.
Pain born in the wake of explosion makes the most exquisite masterpiece of them all.
Oh, such joyous sensation... It has been a long time coming!
Where can I go to find more supply crates?
I feel like I'm missing out on so much if I go through a whole day without opening one...
Hey, what are you sniffing around at? You want to get in on those crates, too?
For real? You're not trying to scam me, are you?
I heard some crates have optical camouflage that can't be seen by the naked eye.
If you know how to find these kinds of crates, you've got to show me the tricks!
Well, well. We have a customer. Please, come inside.
This hot sauce of ours is a real treat. No matter how old or young you are, you're sure to give it the thumbs up after you've tried it out.
Or if you feel that the place is lacking in liveliness, Yihu can come to your side for some chatter.
Haha. Please, the pleasure is mine. If you're curious for some interesting stories, I'm always available.
From streets to alleyways, and tea houses to restaurants, there's plenty of tales for us to talk about!
Ah, perfect, this meal really hits the spot.
Nah, I'm getting old, having three meals a day is the best I can do nowadays.
When on a good day, I can take on six meals, counting morning tea, afternoon tea, and late night meals.
Every dish and cooking in Tiancheng, I've got them all under my belt.
Well, Panhua's Kitchen requires no further introduction. Everyone's favorite.
But I have to break it to you, back when the two were still together, the flavors were pure perfection.
Mahe's carefully selected ingredients, paired with Panghua's exceptional culinary skills. My, oh, my.
You give your mouth a little wipe, take a stroll down to Nightingale's, and have boss Yuanwu set you up for some tea...
I can guarantee you, there's nothing better than this in the entire world!
Those ignorant fools, they'll never find it, never!
That place, I know of it... Hehe, only I know.
You've asked the right man, only I know of it, hahaha!
They don't want me telling, but I'm saying it anyway. I'll, I'll only tell it to you!
It's an island that cannot be seen, where a lady, as beautiful as a fairy resides there...
I know, because I've seen it, that's why I know!
You don't believe me? I've all the proof saved up, you know. Just you wait, I'll show you...
Huh, where did my tablet go? It's not here.
I've must've left it somewhere. Curses!
That shirt's really nice, not sure if it'll look good on me though...
You sure people won't make a big deal out of it?
I mean, my sister's this valiant and cool Mornguard, and I'm just a guy who likes fancy clothes.
I appreciate it. Not everyone thinks this way...
That Xiaoyu, such shy of a child that he is, always trying to hide his feelings.
It's not like he's up to no good. Is he taking me for a fuddy-duddy?
Shh, quiet now. Don't let the child hear us.
Oh, he's never good at keeping secrets from me. I'm the one who tidied up his wardrobe after all.
You know what they say, "firm in matters of honour". There's no need to be ashamed of such small matters.
Wherever he goes, Mortefi is always so attractive.
That elegant demeanor, elaborate clothes, gorgeous accessories...
This is what the life of an elite should be.
How can you get elite treatment without being an elite yourself?
If Qingru was considerate enough, he would've also bought me some of the same ones as Mortefi.
A good girl like Pinwen is hard to come by these days.
She doesn't care about the world's prejudices, only about a person's heart.
Although those people in the Academy have a skill or two, but they are just hypocrites hiding their true colors.
Although I am not a very capable person, but I can be 100% good to her. This, she can see.
Bah! Don't use that vulgar terminology to define our relationship!
We are soulmates who are in love, you know?
It's the greatest thing in the world to be on duty in a commercial area, and it's not in vain that I wrote an application for so long.
Of course, I don't ask for much, I just hope to live a few extra days of peace and quiet.
Take a look for yourself, it's so prosperous in the business district, but also thanks to the first-class security!
If you get into any trouble, refrain from getting into fisticuffs, no need in making it into a big deal.
Just say my name and everything will be settled.
Don't worry, I can handle myself.
What's the point of being a "Pioneer" if all the places we venture are safe areas?
To stand up to the name of the Pioneer Association, we need to explore places where others can't.
What's wrong with danger, there's so many Resonators that had their powers awaken during danger.
If I ever become a Resonator, I will definitely be as powerful as Xingyuan.
Hehehe, by then, I'll show you the true value of the name “Pioneer” bears!
Till this day, the Pioneer Association has developed quite a reputation for itself.
Seeing new recruits joining use, I'm not sure if I should be happy or worried.
Well, yes, take Zhu Yi for example, he only cares about becoming a Resonator from dangers all day long.
It's not like I didn't tell him about what happened to me in the past.
I did end up becoming a Resonator, but I almost didn't make it from a TD attack that one time. Took quite a lot from me.
And now, he just wouldn't listen to my warnings. How can you not be worried?
Do you know? Ms. Qianchen is as powerful as a Geohide Saurian!
That's because she can straight out chew Tacetite just like the Saurian.
I heard the adults say... It's got something to do with her stomach function?
Why should I? Ms. Qianchen is still Ms. Qianchen. It's not like she's turned into a Saurian or anything.
When I grow up, I wanna be just like her. If she can chew Tacetite, then so can I!
Ms. Ma Qi sure is a popular receptionist of the Pioneer Association.
Especially her eyes, which are simply more luminous than the purest Tacetreite.
I... Uhh, I did think about it at one point.
But I heard the Pioneer Association is notoriously busy, even if I do join, I may not be able to get closer to her.
It's probably better to watch her quietly from here...
The Express' coverage is getting wider and wider, with more stations been built every day, I have to double my efforts as well!
We shall honor our motto "You send it, we'll deliver it!" No matter what!
Hehe, that's for sure. Making deliveries is harder than it looks.
From sender to recipient, they all have great trust in us.
As the link between them, The Express can't afford to be sloppy!
Hey, I really don't get what's there to be busy about all day.
Peipei, what a girl, it's like she's filled with inexhaustible energy. I dunno how she's maintaining that enthusiasm of hers.
Just looking at her go is tiring. That's it, I'm taking a rest...
Who, me? Heck no. I'm simply conserving my strength.
We station staffs need to have enough energy at all times in order to deal with any unexpected situations that may occur any time.
Did you think my calm and collected face is only here for the looks?
It's all for the good of creating a reliable brand image, so the customers can feel at ease when they see it.
I guess I'm really not as physically capable as before now...
The job of a delivery worker is great and all, but the intensity of the work is too exhausting.
I sure want to take a few weeks off to loosen up my joints a little bit.
Nah, that's just me grumbling. A day's work is a lot of money, I don't wanna miss out on that.
Plus, my baby girl's got her father to look up to, can't let her down!
Umm, did, did you... Need anything?
No, nothing, I was just... Too nervous.
I, I'm... Usually not good with people.
It's, it's... Alright, the hat can block my eyesight, which is reassuring.
If, if... That's all, then I'll, I'll be on my way!
Hmph, Squeak Express, what a bunch of liars.
I told them I wanted to pack and send myself out to sea, and they straight out refused, not even negotiable.
Well, yes, it's a shame they claim to have some kind of rule about not mailing live humans.
The way I see it, it's all excuses, they just simply can't find where the rumored Black Shores is located at.
Since they have the audacity to brag about it, then I shall fight till the end!
The Squeak uniform is so adorable, they have these little markings on them, I love it.
I know, I know, daddy told me they would come over and send good things to children that behave.
Say, do you think daddy's inside one of those Squeak uniforms?
He brings me goodies every day as well.
Really? Hurray!
When I first switched to comedy crosstalk, I really wasn't sure if people would like it.
It's nice to have so many people willing to support the show every time after so many years.
Please, I started off as an opera performer, I guess you can say I was in the melodious art business.
I've walked the many drifting roads of life, and also encountered the unpredictable natures of veracity and falsity.
Through the many seasons, days, and literature. How much more?
As I look back today, I've ventured them all!
You're too kind. I'll be so fortunate if I'll ever have the opportunity to be on stage again.
All I do is stand behind the table and be the "support role". When will it come to an end.
Nah. I'll be honest with you, I actually want to act as a female warrior in the opera.
But of course, I've always tried to find time to exercise every day over the years, gotten a grasp of the basics for now.
In the end, I wasn't fortunate enough to get the opportunity to performe, rather the Pioneer Association came to me first.
Ugh, there's no way I'm going out into the wilds and become Sabyr Boar food!
You old fool, you haven't been on stage for so many years, you know nothing about theatrics now.
That's no way to speak that part, what's there to applaud about it?
Oh, pipe it down will you. These young folks' put in a ton of effort as it is, we should encourage them more.
If one day I won't be here anymore, it's up to them to take care of the opera.
Bah, I've heard enough from you. Maybe by the time I'm buried into the ground your probably still not showing signs of aging.
Still, I'm not fond of living so long like you did.
What's there to look forward to with so many of my family and old friends passing before me?
In the past I could comfort myself with some opera, but, now look at what they have become.
I'd have to say, not only do you have sharp eyes, so is your mouth!
Don't worry, I'll be sure to pass your remarks on to those youngsters. They'll improve sure enough.
I wonder when the Academy will develop a special anti-aging technology...
I may not seem like it all, but I'll get old sooner or later!
No, wait. Qinghe is an exception, she never gets old.
I have admired Qinghe ever since I was a child, she is so beautiful and graceful.
I'm all grown up now, but Qinghe's appearance hasn't changed at all, there's not even a wrinkle on her face.
And she even said she didn't spend time caring for it, and it just came by nature.
I have to think of a way to become as beautiful as her!
Boo, boo!
What's the point of staring at two people yammering at each other? How come they're not fighting?
Have you ever watched any of the hero plays? They always end up in fights.
Chixia once said the bad guys will always be defeated, and the ones defeating them are the real heroes.
If I could beat the bad guys and become a hero, my mom wouldn't have to worry about me being bullied anymore.
Plus, no one would ever laugh at a hero, or an "Exile rascal".
I wonder how things are going over at the Desorock Highlands, my son hasn't been in touch for a long time.
I'm aware that being a Ranger is busy and full of responsibilities, but can't he squeeze in a bit of time to call his old man?
Don't you agree?
Well, aren't you a thoughtful child. Unlike that boy Gaoshan, all he knows is fooling his old man all day long.
Say, can you do Uncle Ming a favor, if you ever come across my son, tell him to give home a call, would you?
Very well, please accept my thanks in advance!
You stay where you are, young lady. You're going nowhere.
Oh, daddy, I know you care about me, but this is war.
War or no war, you're just a small girl!
You see Uncle Ming? His son's name's already carved in Knell Square, and he's still not willing to accept reality.
You want me to end up crying in front of your grave, too?
I've already passed training and graduation. I can very much protect myself.
I won't change my mind, no matter what you say!
Who..
Mingming's trying to look for mommy again, but I know that she's never coming back.
A lot of Mornguards showed up at our house the other day. They were all mommy's friends from work.
They were whispering, but I overheard everything... That mommy lost her life in battle.
Daddy even lied that mommy went on a long long trip. Only Mingming believes it.
I pretended to believe it, otherwise daddy and Mingming would get even sadder.
I'm still little, the best I can do is cause less trouble to daddy.
When I grow up, I'll catch those Fractsidus myself. For mommy!
Doudou's always have her head down with mommy not around.
I miss mommy, too, but I know she's on a long trip. I can wait.
Well-behaved? Both of us?
Well, then I'll just to keep waiting. Mommy once said, a good child cannot be impatient.
I can take care of myself, and so can Doudou!
The lost heart is like a flower blooming alone in the Dim Forest, its scarlet color remains, but fragile and indistinct, all over its body.
Aah! You scared me! Oh... It's you.
Through fading thorns, has the hero finally arrived to rescue the maiden wounded by the spikes?
Is that so? It seems that the dusty memories cannot be awakened by a single sentiment after all.
You and I are like two meteors flying off in opposite directions, only til we fall should we redeem the sins of convergence...
The scattered Tacetites are the black tears that flow from the torn sores...
The sound chord piercing the skies are the pale inscriptions of mourning before silence descends...
That's it, that's the pain I was looking for!
What's that suppose to mean? My poetic mood is in full motion, I couldn't be better.
To think that the blood I once spilled from the piercing of Tacetite, have now reshaped into my overflowing literary talent!
You are a great person in every aspect and all, but you just put too much pressure on yourself.
Who said we can only go shopping in the commercial area, and not wander around outside or go sightseeing on our date?
I am a night emissary, those who attempt to pry into my secrets shall be swallowed by the endless night!
Hmph, "May victory prevail the lasting night". It is all due to my training.
I offer prayers to the nights, may it bless the warriors return home safely.
It's, it's not that I can't sleep because of fears! Daily practice is a must for the night emissary!
Of, of course! Should you ever meet my elder brother, be sure to pass him these words!
The writer by the name of "Huafei" is truly a genius, always able to hit the softest spot of my heart.
Even the most relentless rain is no match for the words that penetrate the heart.
Hmph, very well. Before it is forgotten forever, I may as well share with you my faded love and loneliness.
Twas a mist-shrouded underground, the whispers of a charmed mind, the beginning of a hazy and ambiguous story.
Yet, what awaited me was merely decaying bones, and the story comes to a sudden tragical end!
Can you understand the pain of being left with nothing but bone-chilling coldness prior to meeting your love?
Never mind, then, if you failed to understand, it may be a blessing in a way...
Hello, how can I be of assistance?
No need to be reserved, if you are ever in the seek of assistance, you can always call for us Mornguards.
With the many households in Tiancheng, everyone will need a helping hand at some point.
Why, yes. That's the consciousness of being a Mornguard after all.
I used to live at Qichi Village when I was young. If it weren't for the Mornguards' help, me and my brother would've been...
That's why I joined the Mornguards, to help others in need, and my way of repaying their kindness.
You better not stand too close to me, or they will start hating on you too.
Well... I'm in charge of communications, and no one likes to hear the "messages" that I bring.
Yes, death notifications.
I won't be welcomed by the family members of my deceased comrades, as I can only bring them with sorrow.
Yet, I must bring my comrades home no matter what.
It is our tradition, as well as my duty.
I've noticed from a distance. Well, out with it, what's your business here at the military zone?
Hmph, is that so? Just to avoid any future misunderstandings, I shall warn you in advance.
No touching around, no asking around, and no looking around, or else you will be held liable for any consequences.
But then again, you don't seem like the type to be spying on military secrets.
You remind me of that gorgeous little sister of mine, bearing no bad intentions.
I believe in these eyes of mine, so don't disappoint my trust in you.
Of all the Mornguard positions, why am I in charge of logistics?
Lucky for you, you get to roam around places and have fun whenever you like.
The only time I get to go outside is for transporting supplies, its part of the job, how can I have fun during that?
But, I do get to find some interesting stuffs along the way.
Such as... There's two species of puffers!
When you defeat them, they give out two different kinds of sound....
You there, not a step closer. This is a military restricted area. No trespassing beyond this point!
Oh? You're also into those little crates?
When I'm off duty, how about we exchange experiences, learn from each other. Whaddya say?
Yes, very nice, that's more like it. Commonwealth.
But I will warn you beforehand, if you get any bright ideas on Huanglong public property...
Don't go blaming me for taking you on for some "Awu Special" with the Commander!
One fifteen, and another fourteen, all heroes at young age!
Don't you know the stories? I'm talking about our two legendary heroes of course!
Chixia was already on the battlefields at fifteen, and Awu a Commander at fourteen. They're both the pride of the Mornguards!
Unlike me... I'm just a warehouse guard, can't do anything.
That's what all my seniors say as well, but can I really be like them someday...?
Commander Awu is so adorable, I don't want to leave his side even a single step!
How about I apply to be his personal bodyguard and be on call 24/7.
Oh, please, I can pull a few all-nighters and still manage to take down a Dreadmane with a single shot.
To be honest, I'm just afraid of not having anything to do.
If I don't pack myself with work, I won't help to begin thinking about Commander Xuguan.
Yes, Commander Xuguan used to be my formal superior who looked after me a lot.
If I hadn't been on a mission that day and stay at his side...
Anyway, I will never allow myself to make the same mistake again!
I wonder if this level of training intensity is enough for them?
It should meet Mornguard standards, but the world is full of unknowns.
What if someone reacted too late in case of an emergency, or pulled a muscle due to wrong posture...
Yes, I should add in a few obstacle courses.
I have to break it to you, watching all these new recruits reminds me of my two boys at home.
Since they're put under my care, then I have to take responsibility and make sure that they can return to their homes in one piece.
If anything is to happen to them, how am I to face their mothers and fathers?
What? You want somethin'?
Oh, right, I should be saying "do you require any assistance?"
Why can't I be? I did use to be an Exile, if that's what you're trying to ask.
But that's well in the past. They've got a whole bunch of tough people here at the Rangers, I'll give 'em that.
You seem quite young and capable yourself. Wanna... Wanna go a few rounds some time?
Hmm, Debiao does have some skills.
In a fair fight? Nope.
If I snuck up on him, I might have a chance, though.
Not in the slightest. Remember, situational awareness is more important than combat skills.
Never let your foes gain the upper hand, Rover.
I happen to know a couple of hidden supply crates.
That won't be necessary.
You have quite an appetite.
Do you have any recommendations?
What place?
So, where is it?
If you like it, just buy it.
It is not wrong to pursue what you like.
So you know how he thinks?
What does all of this have to do with being an elite?
Why?
Are you two in a relationship?
You were transferred here on your own will?
Indeed.
You're not afraid of running into dangers?
Worried?
Why?
Are you not afraid of her?
Why don't you join the Pioneer Association?
You feel quite at home at Squeak Express.
Sleeping on the job now, are we?
Taking a break once in a while is good for you.
Please excuse me, did I startle you?
It must be hard being a delivery person.
Why is that?
Pack yourself?
It's their symbol.
It's because Xuanxuan's a good girl.
You were not a crosstalk performer before?
Bravo.
So you wish to play as the "main role"?
That'll require quite an effort.
You don't seem old at all.
Why?
Why would they be fighting?
I agree.
I'll do my best.
Did you not believe it?
You're both well-behaved.
Are you reading a poem?
You must've gotten the wrong person.
Are you alright?
Sorry, I'm a bit broke lately... Thank you for being so considerate.
Oh, I know you're not the stingy kind, let alone treat me unkindly.
You've spent all your money on making commissions to investigative what happened, didn't you?
I didn't mean to mistreat you, it's just that I can't live without knowing what happened to my parents!
Now, with a heart of yours like that, how can I ever feel mistreated?
Rather, this is exactly the reason why I like about you.
Are you pretending to be a Ranger?
Do not sleep at night?
Good for you.
Do you mind telling me about your experience?
I don't quite follow.
Nothing at the moment.
Good point.
Why is that?
"Messages"?
Nothing in particular.
I thank you for your trust in me.
You're not allowed outside the city?
I'm just looking for some supply crates.
Sure.
What do you mean?
You are no worse than anyone else.
I reckon you'd be worn-out before you even realize.
Is it really worth working so hard?
Commander Xuguan?
You work very hard.
Are you really a Ranger?
Ever won a fight against him?
Would you give him such chance?
Haven't seen you up here lately.
Alas, supplies of XXX always come as urgent orders.
The whole workshop worked in shifts for accelerated production to only fulfill the order in time.
No wonder. A theatrical fan like yourself won't miss a chance as long as you are free.
All right for me. It's tiring, but the hustle will end one day.
But, to be sure, those who will use this batch of XXX won't see their work ends, will they?
Huff... I get so afraid when I think of going on the stage.
Don't be. The teacher said you were the best at the rehearsal. It will be fine!
But so many people are watching. It's different.
I have an idea. Imagine the audience is something, then you won't be afraid.
Boohoo, stop it! I'm quitting!
Eh? Why are you even more afraid...
How are you comforting another like that, dumb!
The latest gowns by XXX for this season are just fantastic. I'm dying for one of them.
No way. Their latest collection is not for sale yet. Where did you see it?
Well, for a person who's following haute couture and fashion trends every minute like me, of course I saw them...
At my brother's place. He cares nothing about fashion, but works at the united exchanges.
Cough cough, does his organization need another trier for new dress?
Hey, what's the tea you're drinking? It smells so aromatic.
Chinese angelica tea, mixed with some XXX and XXX. It's refreshing.
Refreshing? Does it work the same way as XXX?
That thing is too bitter for me to swallow...
If you are worried about bitterness, an option with less XXX added is provided.
Please be confirm the receipt quickly, guest. I have other packages to deliver.
Wait, I forgot from which... friend this present is sent.
If I sign it randomly, unwanted illusion might arise.
But if I refuse to sign and it happens to be sent from the few priority objects...
By the way, do you know what it is inside, because I may sign for it if it is valuable?
Out of the question. We have a strict confidentiality policy.
Then... maybe you can report that you failed to find me, or that the package was lost?
Equally impossible. Please do not insult us.
Sign or refuse, thank you.
Quite troublesome and that's why I don't consider to marry any one of Squeaky Express.
I wonder, how long can the biggest fish in the pool grow to?
Not taught in the textbooks. Why?
I am trying to work out what pan size I would need to boil the largest gulpuff.
Which one is the food? It or you...
What do you want to be when you are grown up?
I want to be a super mighty Midnight Ranger, and I will be flying across walls and roofs and deep into dangers!
I want to be a doctor saving people.
I... want to be a cook.
Oh, why is that?
Because when I am grown up, the world could be already much safer.
No more Midnight Rangers taking risks, and no more doctors saving lives.
By then, we can all just relax and have meals.
Oh, what a kid. You will be a good cook.
Is Long Zhu's body OK?
Why the question?
I heard from Ying Da, who is concerning, that Long Zhu always works until daylight and never takes rest.
Besides, I heard she was adding even more chili in desserts.
So many tumults for such a young age, Long Zhu has a hard time.
Nevertheless, it just bothers me so much... to mix dessert with chili.
Mutant Organisms are so ferocious. Will it be dangerous if we meet them?

Sometimes the question I just asked incur misunderstandings and hostility.
I know, the pain of the past is like gloom that never goes away...
But some of us has to come up and record things, so we can relive those heroes, they were alive just like us! So they go on to live in our heart.
Hello. Do you know some fun places to go to around here?
Sop... then why does mum stick here and not go home?
She was here just now, got nowhere in a blink.
It has been such a long time mum hasn't been home. The leaves she used to attend have yellowed and dropped their heads.
Does she not like me anymore? I have been as good as gold lately.
If we meet mum next time, please help me to convince her! Prove that I've been really a good boy!
What of earth has happened to Huaijin...
Yes, it's been a long time I don't hear from Huaijin. He was never like this.
He promised me that he would tell me everything.
I don't know where to find him, so I just come around here every day.
I kind of expect his name read aloud here, but I'm afraid at the same time.
But really, what indeed is this feeling... I've never felt this way before...
Humph, don't know how much time I'm left with. Just want to see those villains wiped out!
Young one, you don't know my hatred towards those things.
The TDs... the Exiles... or that... monster locked away.
Anything that cost my brothers their lives, I hate with welling animosity.
Pity my leg was broken by that locked monster. I had to retire and gave up my chance to avenge them!
A dozen years have passed now. Don't know if they still remember me...
I hope he can see my effort...
The civilians devastated by wars, the warriors died of defending home... and a very special one beside them.
When I was young, the TD waves once impended over my home. It was a brave mister from Mornguards that saved me from the collapsed house.
Since then, I have had this idea that I will protect others just like him.
That mister from Mornguards passed in the battle against TD waves years ago. I heard his daughter became a fighter after that.
Maybe there are still many that drew from his inspiration.
She's being smiling less recently, there must be something on her mind...
Ah, Ahem. No, nothing.
This is the Hierarch Quarters. Seeking audience with Hierarch Loong requires permission. Please state your business.
Hierarch Loong is the backbone of Tiancheng. Not only is she wise and decisive in her decision-making, but also extraordinarily kind to her people.
I had witnessed her from afar during Hierarch Loong's inauguration ceremony, it was from then on I was determined to become the Lady Loong's guard.
Although the assessment process was quite harsh, but I made it through nonetheless... Being able to silently protect her is my greatest wish.
Uhh, I've said too much... No ones else knows about this, so don't tell anyone about this!
Hello, are you here to see the Hierarch?
The Hierarch is like the very existence of Huanglong itself.
You can see the undaunted spirit in her, as well as the courage to not back down, and not give up no matter when.
Even on the battlefield, the ferocious enemy only made her even more determined... I have seen that, luckily!
Precisely because of that, she could guide everyone in Huanglong to move forward!
Hm, who is that? Oh, it's you. I've heard of you.
You have to expect dangers. I don't let pass any suspicious persons.
It's a matter of the Hierarch's security. We can't afford any risks.
It's not peaceful in Huanglong these days. Mysterious forces are constantly active. You should take care of yourself too.
These freshmen Mornguards are too much indulged in sloth. They are far behind what we were.
Instructor Yingda keeps saying I'm under-capable in all aspects, and that I'm far behind him when he escorted the Hierarch.
But at the same time he sends me for all kinds of quests. Isn't that contradictory...
Eh? Rea.. really?
Instructor Yingda is the one that I admire the most. We were honored together for battles when we followed the Hierarch in her campaign in person.
It was the only time he spoke highly of me. He became even stricter with me after that.
Sigh. I think I'm responsible enough... I really hope he can appreciate me more.
Hm... I can sense no hostility in you. Security confirmed.
I can sense goodwill and hostility. That's my Forte.
It relieves much of the effort of Mournguard duty to be capable of identifying security risks in advance.
Hm... though it's not always so accurate.
For example, the Hierarch's guard feels kind of... eh, I don't know how to put it, somehow frightening.
Hey, what are you doing here? I see that you have quite a physique, how about you come to work here?
Tsk, what a shame. We offer good pay, not too much to do, and it's not far from home either.
For sure, you can get the hang of it real quick. See? Even I can handle it.
I don't have many skills, the only thing I'm proud of is my inexhaustible strength!
I can't imagine anything else I'd be doing instead of being a miner.
It's all thanks to the Tacetite industries that I can put some food on the tale... Phew! I'm getting pumped up just by thinking about it!
Feels like the more I save up on Tacetite Coins, the more I'm spending...
Emergency funds. If one day we lose our source of income, it'll be enough to support me and my sister for a few months.
I am not like Huaijin, his family is so well-off. He doesn't have any stress in life...
It's just that I've spent too much, from watching plays at the theater, to buying new releases of Rhythmic Syrup. In the end, I didn't have much saved at all.
Novelties appear in Huanglong all the time, I just couldn't resist!
If you have any tricks in saving money, be sure to let me know... Spending my salaries like this isn't the way to go in the long run.
I can't have me and sis go back those Exile days again, no matter what...
Zzz... Zzz.. Ah! I'm awake, I wasn't slacking off.
Hey, it ain't a crime doing it just once in a while, right?
My parents would always say, "Today's hard work, is for a well-earned rest tomorrow." But I just want to get straight to the resting part.
Plus, from what I can see, from mining to refinement, there's so much that needs optimizing in the Tacetite industry to achieve complete automation.
It's just a thought, too much work anyway, I might as well take a break while I can.
Oh, dear... These legs are getting rusty...
A old problem of mine, didn't take extra care of my body when I was young, so now it's biting me in the butt. Can't walk too much on a cloudy or rainy day.
Good thing Yinxing's looking out for me so I can still work this job...
She's my younger sister. We used to be Exiles, couldn't even make ends meet back then.
Luckily Huanglong was willing to accept us and let us work together here, especially with my physical conditions... *Cough.
Otherwise... I don't know what would become of my child who's just seven-years old.
Please keep quiet around the warehouse area.
Warehouse security, checking inventory, and looking out for anyone suspicious entering and leaving the area...
Wait. Why are you asking me this? Are you trying to distract me?
Unauthorized personnel must leave the premises at once. No loitering.
Hi, are you here to tour the industrial area? How about it, it's a beaut isn't it?
That's right. I am a "guardian of the heart of Huanglong" after all, so I should hold my head high!
Also, I remember every single face that goes in and out of the industrial area on a daily basis, if I do say so myself.
You see that miner over there by the name Rock? We consider each other as brothers!
If you have any questions, you can ask any one of us anytime.
The previous batch of Tacetite refinement efficiency was a bit low, did something go wrong... Too many impurities in the ore?
Say no more, my friend. It appears that you have much interest in conducting scientific research as well!
I'm in charge of the Refinement Tower... In my spare time, I would analyze its operation data, and hope to find a way to further enhance the Tacetite refining process.
The techniques of the people prior to us is like a mountain that is difficult to climb... I have to say, with my current abilities, I am still far from reaching the half point of it.
I started off later than other around me, and I'm also not the sharpest tool in the shed. I really envy those who come from academic families, who's able to get into the field of research so early.
Yet, as the senior I admire once said, "There is no shortcut in research!" As long as you put in the effort each day, one day you shall see the results!
Conducting research isn't just about putting in the effort!
What matters more is the brain! You have to think fast! Take me for example, I was born with higher I.Q. than anyone else. Do you get it?
Developing Tacetite weapons of course! Hehe, it's not a profession you get to see every day.
Ever heard of the Chief Researcher Mortefi? My expertise has received his personal recognition, he was the one who appointed me to this position as well!
While I hold the title of being Huanglong's second to best, only he can be considered as number one.
Many things can be washed away by time, but there are some even time can not be helped...
I'm waiting for her... She's a member of the Ranger's Vanguard Battalion, on a mission to Incineranur.
I can't. I made a promise with her that on the day of her return, I would greet her at the gates of Tiancheng.
I don't feel like doing anything fearing that I may miss the moment. I also quit my job at the Academy.
I just simply did what I'm supposed to do... I man should'n't go against his words.
Salutations, Tiancheng welcomes you!
Of course. Everyone refers me as the "Cornet of the Gates of Tiancheng", anyone who has been to Tiancheng is able to firmly keep me in their minds.
Perhaps it may be due to my enthusiasm and always offering greetings to others?
I can't help myself but to say a few extra words when I meet fresh faces...
Please... Please excuse me, I seem to have said too much again! Enjoy your stay in Tiancheng!
Tiancheng is open to all walks of life. However, the potential risks hidden within cannot be ignored.
Well, yes. You bear exceptional skills, I've noticed you from the crowd straight away.
If I'm not mistaken, you are a very capable Resonator.
From an optimistic point of view, I hope that you are a friend of Huanglong, not an enemy.
How could you tell I was nervous... I prefer to observe others, not the other way around.
Tianhu, that's me. What do you want with the Cruising Drakes?
I am deeply disappointed that you are unaware of our organization.
This is where the finest creators and inventors of Huanglong come together, the epicenter of a storm that is about to set off the world's second energy reform.
After a rigorous screening process by myself, we currently have five members in total.
Although our current force is still relatively weak... But sooner or later the name "Cruising Drakes" will become a scandalous existence, just you wait and see.
Hello, friend, interested in our Cruising Drakes' inventions? Check this out, it's so cool!
Hehe, I haven't officially joined yet, but at least a 'supernumerary staff"!
I'm really jealous of Tianhu for being able to handle a customized Carrier like that, just look him go!
*Sigh, unlike me... I was born with a poor sense of balance, too bad I can't ride any kind of vehicle.
Yeah, I know I can't drive one myself, but I just love it! It bit self-contradicting, isn't it?
I dunno if you've heard about it before, of the "legendary motorcycle", Tianhu said he always wanted to get his hands on one and have a look inside.
Some say it's actually a TD. I don't know for sure, but I sure really want to see it for myself someday...
What are you up to?
Quite good for you.
Why don't you simply ask her?
You want to join the Academy?
What are you doing here?
Not for now.
What problems?
No problems for now...
You dad works at the Ministry of Development?

Yangming?

Only walking around.
This is not a place for fun.
Where is your mum?
Are you waiting for someone?
What do you suggest?
Who are you condoling with?
What's on your mind?
About Hierarch Loong...
About Hierarch Loong...
You seem alerted.

You can sense it?

How about you start by optimizing yourself?
What's the matter?
Are you and Yinxing related?
What are you doing here?
You seem very passionate about it.
What are you researching on?
What are you doing here?
What are you doing here?

Wouldn't that be too high of a price?
Are you always here?
Are you standing guard?
No need to be nervous.
The Cruising Drakes?
You're a member of the Cruising Drakes?
You're interested in developing vehicles?
Please respect the deceased and refrain from treading!
Final warning. REFRAIN, FROM, TREADING!
Refra... incorrigible! Morn Guards have been called.
About the walls of Tiancheng...
You mean the surrounding infrastructure?
When the enemies approach the opening, they will immediately trigger the automatic defense grid, making it easy for Mornguards to focus fire.
Those were intentionally left there to lure enemies into attacking.
If you look closely, you should notice there are some openings on the wall.
So, you should be watchful not to get too close and trigger it by mistake.
Are you prepared and ready to launch? Please come back safe and sound...
So the rumor is true. Yin Lin brings pressure to people...
This is the old Ji Ting site? It seems to really have something remained inside.
It's here. Let's scan and see.
Is the ultimate purpose of your academic research here to reproduce "Yuan"'s sounds?
It seems the access is blocked by molten Tacetite. We have it find a way...
We cannot let TD disturb the catcher!
Er ahhhh...
There seems like some unusual frequencies around here. Maybe we can find something if we scan them.
Who, who are you! Wait... my research!
Hm hm... stop being sad... the woman before you is about to become a champion!
Let's move!
I need more preparations.
Aix's sound mark can really be preserved for this long... We should get the another one and return to the scholar.
We've got all the Sound Marks, let's head back to the scholar.

The direction she pointed, there!
TDs! Don't let them get near the device!

Setting Up...
We are surrounded. Resist the TD from damaging the equipment!
The Mourning Aix is injured, let's follow!
Shall we take him to the memorial cemetery....
Are you prepared and ready to launch? Please come back safe and sound...
Let's move!
I need more preparations.

Monstrous bird! I will fight it till the end!
Hold your position! Standing our defense and maintaining supplies, don't you forget what your duty is!
I know... with what I can do, I'll be just another life claimed, but I just can't resist the rage.
He was thinking this way too, right? The fighter who got missing... to put down the bird, he did not hesitate to get overfrequent...
I admire his courage... It's just, everyone who gets overfrequent will be secretly...
Shh! Say no more!
If the resonators, who have access to all that power, fail to stay sober, there will be only one end down their road.
Rover, it is your first time here, right?
It is said that before the Lament, this place was a plain with a landscape, a land suitable for human habitation and agriculture development.
After the Lament, Ji Ting laboratories and temporary settlements were built in turn, but they all came to... It's a long story. I shall tell you when we are free.
See that dome? It was the first Research Lab, but then was destroy over night.
That gate is still seal tight, no one knows what happened exactly.
Not trapped by Tacet Discords, and no signals of overfrequency.
Good, you are not making it difficult for me.

Finally someone!

Sure, sure! You have to help me!
If you'll excuse me, I am a researching scholar at Ji Ting, and I am on great ecological research of the TD. Call me Guangyun, if you will.

True it is Ji Ting's 1st research area here, but with respect, you do not look like one of them.
Ho! Little girl, then you define how a Ji Ting person should look like, Hm?
Em, eh... I...
I heard the Midnight Rangers were adept at coping with Tacetite. Fetch the equipment for me.

Oh, and the equipment of your interest, we are right off to it.
