Apart from us, the Hukou Mines have also been a frequent record breaker of production.
I don't know if you have noticed. It seems we haven't seen big waves a lot in our port.
Isn't it supposed to be that way? How can the Tacetite be properly shipped with all that jolt?
Nothing is supposed to be. It's all our dam's credit.
If we don't have the specially designed dam to resist the washing and scouring of the sea, none of the Tacetite can ever make it to the cargo hold.
Mark my words. In our business, you never say something is supposed to be.
Finally, the basic measurement is done. It wore me out.
But as soon as I think of the long-term monitor of water levels, it's even more exhausting.
How I wish I could be a Gulpuff, so I could use myself as a buoy...
It's little hard to adapt to this clammy environment as a newcomer from the Chengxiao Mountain.
Would be fine if I'm just walking with bare hands. But with so many loads to carry, it's almost torture.
I wonder how the people from forty years ago handle the relocation...
Please fill out this form before claiming equipment and supplies. You can find a template on the notice board over there.
Management in an orderly fashion, and
Otherwise, some will be fed, while others starve.
It's in everyone's interest to make things equal.
Unless there are difficulties that must be considered...
This batch of food is stored well. I'll keep using this method in the future...
Hello, you spent a lot of time coming down here, right? Hungry? I make good food.
Hey, I'm not bragging about my cooking skills, but I have a reputation for it!
Yes. Though he is kind of a martinet, he's actually caring and warm.
Yunyan always lets me cook for everyone. They say I cook as well as Panhua does.
He'd even use his own supplies to cook for those physically unwell.
Count's Nest Harbor, I hope it stays like this forever...
It's been so many years, the harbor was officially completed right around when I was joining the Morguards.
I would stand here every day, so does the harbor. Everything's quiet, we both stay quiet, kinda like twins.
Eventually, I'll get old and leave this place, but the harbor won't.
Even if one day, I won't be able to move my legs and arms, not being able to safeguard it, but my heart will always remember it.
What is the use of being stationed here all day... should strike first.
No. I mean, we're being passive by only waiting here all day long for the supplies to be delivered.
Look at the climate at Whining Aix's Mire. Ingredients won't survive the foggy days.
My idea is we go to explore at the Plateau Ruins. Maybe we could find unexpected gains.
Like those mechanical wrecks, and abandoned military facilities...
Let me make a detailed plan and we'll head off soon!
That two letters. I see nightmares whenever I say them... They are, TD.
Ahhhhhhhhh...
Sigh... it's all because when the TD waves broke out, I was once attacked by TDs when repairing lorries...
Although my life wasn't lost then, what I saw was something I will never forget.
So terrible... really terrible. I won't step out of this supply depot anymore for the whole of my life!
Check dispatch against list. Make sure numbers right fit. Handover transship goods clear. Consign wrong for bad credit.
It's a patter I wrote for dispatch checking. How does it sound?
Haha, though I didn't go to school, I like reading and writing poems for my leisure time.
Lately I've thinking about more serious works.
What are you doing here?
Maybe next time.
Yunyan?
How long have you been a Mornguard?
Have you considered becoming a Midnight Ranger?
Yes.
Simple and easy to understand.
Don't ever hope you'll get even one grain from me.
Have you seen that... that thing!
Looks like you fear TDs very much.
Shadows that came out from nowhere... hideous, absurd humanoid monsters... and screeches of complaining birds!
What do you think about drawing some inspirations from the whining aix?
Whining aixes depart their nest, fall down for wings can't extend...
Maybe they didn't want to scare or deter human with their sad songs, they were just calling partners.
That sounds reasonable.
They should harbor materials available or recyclable.
Accept
I'll be there.
Hello… Can you hear me?
Hello, is this Rover?
Yes, it is.
My name is Ge'xi, First Company, Medical Battalion, Midnight Rangers.
I have something important that I wish to confirm with you in person. This is an urgent matter, so please come visit me at the regiment building.
Got it, I'll be there in a bit.
Oh? Rover, you've arrived.
I'll save the formalities and shall get straight to the point. You were involved in the previous investigation of the Wasted Metropolis Subway Station, weren't you?
I agree.
Not long after your investigation, yet another problem emerged.
Well… It's hard to explain verbally, so more on that later.
What problems?
Before that, can you help with me in a cognitive test?
Thank you for your understanding. Please wear this optic device. The cognitive test requires blocking of your vision in order for you to concentrate on your thoughts.
OK.
I will ask a few simple questions and you just need to answer them truthfully.
I am ready.
You put on the device Ge'xi gave you. Everything became dark.
Can you hear me?
OK
Can you tell me your name?
How many participants were there in total during the investigation of the subway station?
Besides yourself, do you still remember their names?
Can you tell me your name?
{PlayerName}。
There were four of us.
Dianma, Humibo, and Yanlei.
{PlayerName}。
Besides yourself, do you still remember their names?
Can you tell me your name?
How many participants were there in total during the investigation of the subway station?
Can you tell me your name?
Can you hear me?
Alright, I promise this would be the final question. I appreciate your cooperation.
Dianma, Humibo, and Yanlei.
{PlayerName}。
There are more questions?
There were four of us.
Are we done yet…
{PlayerName}。
How many more questions?
I refuse to answer more questions.
Have you heard any strange calls recently?
Can you hear me?
Can you hear me?
No.
You took of Ge'xi's device and noticed her with her head down recording the test results.

No deviation in self-perception, exhibits normal speech recognition and understanding of semantics… Also, the ability to arrive at the regiment building on their own. Normal body movement skills and emotional stability.
It seems that you are not under its affect.
Can I leave now?
Did something happen to the others?
Huhh… Wait.
You've guessed correctly.
I withheld some information in order to minimize interference to your testing. I believe now is a good time to inform you of the details.
Something happened to Yanlei, one of the researchers.

Since he returned, his mental state has been deteriorating, with him always claiming that he could hear the subway station calling out to him, and that there were many people waiting for him to "return".
And return he did… Fortunately, his colleagues found out just in time and managed to stop him.
Later on, Yanlei underwent cognitive tests which showed that he had fallen into a very severe delirium, his thoughts were confused and he couldn't even remember his own name.
What about Dianma and Humibo?
There is nothing unusual about them for the time being, and in comparison with your situation… We presume that Resonators bears some resistance to such bizarre summoning.
Other than that, we have no further information on this issue and if we are to break its deadlock… another investigation of the subway station should be put in place.
In order to find a cure for Yanlei, and to prevent it occurring on others.
Right now, the only Resonator who are familiar with the situation in the station are you, Dianma, and Humibo.
Rover, I would like to ask you to assist us in another investigation. The rewards might only be a slight more than the last time though.
Dianma and Humibo are already at the location. Based on the information they've just reported, there appeared to be another easier access to the station.
I'll be there.
We will arrange someone to accompany you to collect your personal data during your investigation.
I would like to call it an escort.
Are you trying to monitor me?
The Ranger escorted you to the alternate entrance of the subway station.
It feels as thought it's been an eternity since we last met, Rover!
Put your serious face on, did you check your equipments yet?
Captain, we checked three times yesterday and five times today, we'd be going into prime numbers tomorrow!
There has been a steep rise in Wutheron density within this area today, even surpassing that of you average Tacet Field… As for Yanlei, I take you already heard what happened.
I agree.
What's happening now, shows that last time was just a beginning. We need to be mentally prepared for the crisis that will follow.
Hey, hey, why so serious? Come on guys, easy with the long faces!

I'm the weakest one here, so if anything is to happen, it won't be for you two. If something bad happens to me, remember to put up a cool gravestone for me and write "Wang Daniu's soul lives on forever" on it!
Stop it. That's not a good thing to say.
Let's get going.
My goodness… Look at all these TDs. Look like they made themselves feel right home?
Let's get rid of them first… Hop to it before we attract more of them our way.
Good thing Rover came along with us, otherwise the all the Capt and I would do is to run for our lives.
Looks like we need to investigate the place deeper in. Let's split up.
Maintain contacts.
Cut it out, Humibo.
Alright, Capt, I'll do my best to hold it in!
Can you hear me?
Rover, Humibo. Do you copy? Give me a sitrep.
Everything's normal here.
Humibo, report.
Humibo? Do you read me?
This doesn't look good… Rover, sit tight, I'll be coming your way shortly.
Sure.
Dianma, with a serious look on his face, rushed back to the waiting hall to meet up with you.
Humibo's gone missing.
I can scan for his Wutheron Ripple.
I already tried that, there's nothing.
However… I have another way of tracking him.
What is it?
By using the Resonance ability that we have, "Radio Prison".
It was Humibo's idea. It's a long story.
Quite a special name.
"Radio Prison" establishes a mental connection between people… or creatures, similar to Modulation but far less precise and safe.
In addition to making contacts, it can also be used to locate each other, just like sonar in water.
It's more that it meets the eye.
Sounds more like a radio chat room.
Moving along. The key to enabling this ability are the users' true names. For people, names are an important part of self-perception and are also strongly linked to Resonance Frequency.
But that's just a backwards guess after my accidental awakening.
The ability isn't very useful, doesn't help much in combat, even with the added dangers in trying to use it.
Dangers?
Well, the spirit world is as deep and unpredictable as the deep seas. While there are odds that you'll find the person you're looking for, and… you might also end up finding something else.
But…now the situation is critical, even with the dangers, I still need to give it a shot.
That boy Humibo won't last long on his own.
Using "Radio Prison" requires my complete concentration and I will lose my senses in the meantime. The fluctuations of Forte might also attract some buggers our way, so keep your eyes peeled.
Leave it to me.
Dianma closed his eyes before reading out Humibo's true name, "Wang Da Niu". Once his ability was activated, the Tacet Discords started to appear.
The expressions on Dianma's face becomes painful, and the words that came out of his mouth sounded confused and strange.
Can you hear me…
How is this…
Don't leave us behind…
Stay where you are!
Humibo, why in the world…
You… Rover?
Can you hear me?
I can't, I can't see where I'm going… I didn't even reveal my true name, so how could…
Almost… Almost got it, just a little bit more.
Got ya! Wang Daniu, snap out of it!
That's enough for now.
Dianma opened his eyes fiercely.
Humibo, Humibo! Can you hear me…
He's still stuck within the spirit world, it looks like.
Is he still out?
But… Since he was able to play the piano to call for help, which means that part of his consciousness has been awakened.
Why did he choose this piano of all things?
Regardless, let's double-check.
Maybe because there's nothing else here to make sounds.
It might also be hinting something.
Something seems to be carved into the hidden part of the piano's body, after some careful identification, you determine that it is a note that you have never seen before.
Crap, I've gotten it all wrong…
It didn't just summon any ordinary person, its…
It?
The people who revealed their true names.
Lanlei let out his true name the last time we were here, and Humibo just did the same with his at the entrance. So they've been summoned by the symbol.
But why would the symbol show up here…
What does this symbol mean?
We call it the "Collective Factor". It might of came from ancient times, maybe before the Lament, or maybe even before that…
Have you seen this symbol before?
Yes… We call it the "Collective Factor". I thought I would never see it again.
You know of the Cortem Veritatis, right?
Well, that'll make explaining things easier.
To a certain extent.
When Humibo and I first saw the "Collective Factor", it was in the abandoned C.V. laboratory, and what happened afterwards… still haunts me to this day.

Precisely. At the time, the information within the institute were too minimal for us to understand the origin and use of this "Collective Factor, and before we had time to look into it, we were infected by its power.
I was caught in a strange dimension, called out to Humibo by his true name a few times, therefore linked him up with all of this by mistake.

But what happened next was even more terrifying… Out of nowhere, many blurred shapes started to appeared around us. They were converging like ghostly shadows, peering and calling out to the both of us… "Go back".
Is this the strange incident you were talking about earlier?
I have no clue… Definitely not human that's for sure.
Good thing Humibo and I kept our acts together and severed the link to pull out in time. As a result, we awakened as Resonators.
What were they?

Those things… No, it's more like a chaotic behemoth that traps those who stray into its territory. As soon as you reveal your true name you become its target, with no way to escape until you are one with it.
So that's why you called the dimension a "Prison".
Correct
Ever since then, we erased our true names.
"Dianma" and "Humibo" are terms that we've found in data related to the "Collective Factor". Perhaps it's safer for us to hide in its shadow.
I thought the attack had destroyed everything at C.V. lab, I never expected the "Collective Factor" to show up again, in an complete unrelated subway station…
I see.
Rover, can you help me investigate our surroundings? There should be other clues. Humibo's in bad shape, I need to stay here and look after him.
Will do.
The group of C.V. researchers did come through here, but suffered great losses… The worlds linked by the "Collective Factor" here are even more dangerous than the one I visited.
Following the destruction of the C.V., the "Collective Factor" also went out of control…
That being said, the report mentions ways to appease it.
By playing the piano?
Exactly, but the stakes are high. The C.V. researcher mentioned here was saved, yet didn't last long before passing away.
You're right. I'll leave you to play the piano while I transfer it into that world.
We don't have much choice.
Let's give it our best shot.
I'll be there.
We haven't got much time… I want to check with you again.
What we are about to do is very dangerous and you will also be connected to the spirit link. If the piano fails to appease it, or if I end up being fused by it, you won't make it out either.
I couldn't sit this one out a long time ago.
How's that?
I revealed my true name the first time I entered the subway station.
The question that has been repeated a million times comes to your mind: "Can you hear me?"
You mean… You could hear its callings, too?
Always.
In that case, then I won't regret in dragging you into all of this.
See you on the other side, Rover.
We should leave.
Can you hear me?
No, don't go! Please, help us!
I'm beyond saving, please, take my child with you at least!
I really want to live on…
Don't just leave me here, I'm so scared.
Get me out of here!
Are you saying your lives worth more? Is human life even measurable?
How dare you live an ignoble life.
The clamorous bickering gradually subsided, seemingly soothed by the sound of the piano.
Very well, it might be better if they live on…
How could this be… It will have to do, I guess.
So no one can escape, very well then…
As the piano piece almost coming to an end, the voices gradually faded out of hearing.
You almost bought it back there, and you still have the energy to get all excited.
Well, that's because I've always had faith in the captain and Rover, of course. The three of us… we're all blessed with great fortunes!
The concentration of Wutherons has dropped within safety range. Then it pretty much means we've dealt with the crisis.

Humibo, you are to return to your duties in Tiancheng, and inform the researchers in charge of processing the information to take over the rest. As for the leftover C.V. data… they should be enough to restart the investigation into the "Collective Factor".
You two aren't leaving?
I've used too much "Radio Prison". I need to take a breather…
Alright then. Catch you two later!
*Cough… *Cough… Phoo.
Nothing serious, I just need to rest up a bit that's all. Stick around and have a little chat with me.
Are you alright?
Please tell me you're curious about what that thing really is, right?
There might also be some accumulation of Wutherons. That's why when the Crownless resurrected, it was able to awaken it.
Yep. That's why when the Crownless was resurrected it got affected by it, with some left-over information added into the mix, you get one distorted body consciousness.
As for the "Collective Factor", it acts as its catalyst…
It's some left-over information.
It's an accumulation of Wutherons.
A TD that only exists inside a spirit world? That is unheard of, but not entirely impossible.
I feel much better now, let's go. I'm kind of worried about that kid Humibo.
It sounds a lot like a TD.
Just when you were about to leave, Dianma called out to you once again.
Rover, I, uh…
My true name is Wa'te.
How's that?
I said, Wa'te is my name.
Is what?
Your name's Dianma.
What?
Never mind, forget what I said. Let's just go.
Rover, hello, can you hear me?
Relax! Don't worry, it really is me, Wang Da'niu.
Thanks to your help, all the information on the Wasted Metropolis Subway Station has been successfully gathered.
The "Collective Factor" has also been taken over by the Academy and won't cause any further risks. Yanlei is also recovering well and will be up on his feet in no time.
Yet, I bring grave news as well… The captain has passed away due to overuse of his Forte, be became fused by it.
Top shape, full of energy and spirit! As for other words, just keep them to yourself.
My condolences, how are you doing?
Also, we plan to place a monument for the captain, we don't know what we should write on it…
Everyone says I know the captain best, but I can't decide, do you have any suggestions?
Wa'te Lasts Forever.
Wa'te Will Be Forever Remembered… What will be forever remembered? Gives people something to think about. Your suggestion it is, then!
Humibo disappears in the distance, leaving just you and an exhausted Dianma inside the subway station.
After telling Humibo the events that happened, he immediately cheered in excitement.
Humibo disappears in the distance, leaving just you and an exhausted Dianma inside the subway station.
Got his location. All we need to do is follow the sound of the piano and we'll find Humibo. Let's hustle.
Rover, you've returned.
Yes, it went smoother than I expected.
Haha, you are truly worthy of your name… Let's go check on Humibo.
*Exhale… *inhale, *gasp. How am I still breathing? I'm still alive? How come I hear the captain laughing. I'm so lost…
That mouth of his is still running, guess he's in one piece.
Rover, let me update you on the situation.
A rare, unfamiliar face... are you here for a visit?
Thanks to your effort of making tea for everyone. They're all feeling better after drinking it.
You can make it for yourself if you will, though please keep secret of the recipe.
Off work and resting. We just managed to put all the stocks into place, so we called it a day in advance.
A senior worker couldn't stand the hardness and got home for rest. I'm helping him finish the business here.
So long we haven't seen an accident. The alarm feels kind of unfamiliar...
This is the leak alarm by the detection program. Some container wasn't properly packaged. We must find the leak source now.
Oh right... Rover, you Resonators have this terminal with you, don't you?
I'll see the work journal first. So much information has been entered lately. It will take some effort to go through it. Might not end soon.
Oh, Shuyun. To what do we owe the pleasure?
Xiebo, I have something to talk about with you...
Shuyun tells Xiebo, the containers he is responsible for went wrong.
I've been working here for decades and packaged thousands of containers. How could it possibly go wrong?
Could it be you mistook something?

Xiebo, we ran through everything from container serial number, batch number to anyone responsible... the batch that went wrong was yours to be responsible to, and the appratus was left in here for sure.
Nice background, just the right lighting... Rover, come on, just take a photo of me here!
Nice view from this angle... Rover, let's take one here!

Oh, so you don't know this is a port for industrial purposes? We primarily deal with the import and export of Tacetite products, so most of the time it is Mornguard and us here, occasionally visiting residents.
Judging from your dressing, you don't look like a Tiancheng resident, nor a delegate from the Pioneer Association... suspicious.
I am {PlayerName}.
{PlayerName}... you're the Rover who emerged recently!
No one could be vigorous after a day's stock porting work...
I have other co-workers who are working harder than me. I'm worried about them to be honest.
I used to make some herbal tea for us to refresh, but I don't have time today to buy the ingredients. Bothers me a lot...
In exchange, I will teach you my home recipe for the herbal tea. How does that sound?
Not available now.
We are all exhausted here. Rover, would you help me make some herbal tea for everyone?
Got other things to do.
Have some herbal tea.
Thank you! Feeling much better now. I'd definitely get things done in a while.
Try this herbal tea.
This taste... Shuyun's herbal tea! She keeps secret of her recipe. How did you get this.
Blech... good medicine tastes bad... don't mind me. It's just me not used to drinking herbal tea. Thank you anyway.
You can trust me.
Where are others?
Are you busy like this every day?
Every three or five days. So many Tacetite product orders. We often get too hectic.
In case you don't know, it's a well-known fact that Tacetite products made in Huanglong are of the best quality and condition. Most of the countries import from us in quantity.
Looks like you're proud of your work.
Haha, that's for sure. We learned no less than the researchers. Each and every one of us is seasoned talent.
Then the work must be hard.
It is, but the compensation is fine, and the atmosphere is welcoming, so it's worth it.
When there's trouble, we will work together to cope with it!

Correct

We found a broken train carriage here. And "FUTURE" seems to be the name of it.

A mistake? Side Sprint's been in our training course for how many years now? I've never seen anyone throw up like you just did!
Kid, if you haven't got the talent, it's best that you cut yourself some slack. At this rate, even if you made it in the Mornguards, you'd still be having others babysit you.
Wait! Don't go yet, come a bit closer, I've something to tell you…
I've got the feeling that, Chief Senfu, is very much Master Spiral.
What is it?
When he came close to me earlier, the way how he felt disgusted, must have been some smell that made him really uncomfortable.
Let me think… There's gotta be a way to make sure… Got it!
You know what they say, a good person till the end, bad guys to the west. I owe you one!
I smelt it too.
That's because you threw up.
What's all this about?
Withered vine powder mixed with wood chips in hot water… Did you smell something just now?
What? How can… That's too bad…
No, sir! I didn't mean it like that! I, I just thought you were Master Spiral…
That's not what I meant! Master Spiral is no ordinary person, he can smell danger!
Oh, it's you. What else do you want?
Great weather today.
Are you angry?
Is it? I didn't really feel anything about the weather in the Dim Forest. The giant trees covered the sky so tightly that it always feels like overcast.
If I have to say, maybe not having rains counts as good weather?
Angry? Not really.
If kids like him without a bit of sense of his own abilities were to get into some accident on the battlefields, the whole company'll go down with em'. It's better to teach him a lesson early on.
Side Sprinting is a training of the reflexes, but it also includes dashing and evasive maneuvers.
Platforming, directional steering, grapple cords. You need to have a good grasp of the basic skills.
Very impressive, is this due to the complete absence of training? Each and every movement is beyond my imagination…
I'm very much obliged. Your aid is unimaginable. If my captain was still around, he would probably be at about the same level as you.
Of course! The last time I witnessed such over-the-top Side Sprinting was when the captain saving everyone's lives during the Beast Tide.
When I was little… No, not that small, when I first joined up, the captain was already a famous Side Sprinter of Tiancheng amongst the Rangers and Mornguards.

His self-invented maneuver technique was widely received within the entire battalion, and has now become the standard maneuver known as the "deflection and emergency stop" in the evaluations, with a difficulty score of 3.

Not only that, our entire squad's gotten tougher under his guidance, one senior of mine is the record holder of three Side Sprint Championships, with another holding the record of the round trip on the Tiancheng wall…
You are too kind.
Is that a compliment?
What about me? Let's just say I had a longer life…
Maybe it's because the people around me were too strong as it is, and I always feel that it's better to leave it to them.
When the Beast Tide came, when they were on rescue missions, I would go help with the transfer of civilians, when they stood guard on the wall, I would do logistics in the city…
But, that's how I've managed to avoid dangerous jobs every time and here I am still standing.
What about you?
Could it be… You're the real Master Spiral?
I say this again. There's no such thing as a Master Spiral, don't be putting me together with that name.
The captain said that everyone has something they are good at, instead of chasing legends…
(Shouts loudly) "Become the legend yourself!"
Boy's got good ears, I'll give him that alright.
You called Chenchi over.
Sir, you've got to be the real Master Spiral! Or is your captain the one?
Wait… I get it… you inherited your captain's title of and has become the new Master Spiral!
Huh? Wait, ok, ok, I'll just leave!
When you hear my word, make a few moves to give it a test. Dash, grapple cord, you know all of them, right?
Sure, but… Woah!
Stand still, you'll easily fell off if you don't
O-ok…
On your mark. Go.
Did I do it… Did I finally make it?
Better than last time.
You tend to lose your balance with then grapple cord during acceleration, I assume it's because your not used to sudden rotations caused by dizziness.
Has there been a similar situation in the past?
Oh… It may just be a repercussion. A repercussion! Similar to the way you hate vomit.
It's a bit embarrassing to say this… But I had a Mornguard save me when I was a child.
I was lying on the back of his shoulders and felt really uncomfortable because it was so bumpy, so I threw up over him. Then he got more anxious, and it got even more bumpy.
The more bumpy he got, the more I threw up…
The more I threw up, the more uncomfortable he became.
Probably that Mornguard became just like your captain, had a repercussion.
You might find him through this way if you passed the evaluation!
Ahem!
Pretend to be a Mornguard?
Pretend to be a Hoochief climbing and jumping to feel the rhythm of the Side Sprinting to solve your dizziness problem.
Didn't you pretend to be a Morn…
I can't agree more, Master Spiral… I would never think of something like that. But he was the reason why I wanted to join the Mornguards!
So, dizziness or not, I will overcome it. I have to get at least a D minus before evaluations!
D minus…?
A plus! Please teach me more!
*Sigh… Let's just start with practicing controlling your field of view.
Yessir! Master Spiral!
Also, don't call me that.
Yessir!
Hello again, Rover. The Dim Forest is still in a relatively dangerous state, so you must be more careful when you one alone.
My name is Sensu, you haven't forgotton it, right? I'm part of the Rangers' field squad to the Dim Forest. I've been tasked with guarding the Side Sprint training ground lately.
Thank you for your help with the demonstrations last time. I've only witnessed swift and precise techniques such as yours twice in the past.
Before setting itself within the basic evaluations… No, it was much earlier during the eras of peace, Side Sprint used to be an extreme sport.
About yourself.
About Side Sprint
About the Conservation Zone
Leave
Meaning, a challenge that threatens life.
After the Conservation Zone was occupied by the Hoochiefs, it has since been the site which they used to acclimatize their young to the vertical environment.
Before that, I believe it used to be a children's playground within the zoo. Well… Perhaps commonality between the young?
Senfu waves his hand as he leaves with an angry face.
The Rangers recovered a Side Sprint training base not far from here, and sent their strongest instructor to do some demonstration teaching.
This site has just been recovered not too long ago, the threats have not been completely ruled out yet, with those more active MOs… Huh?
Did you hear anything?
I don't think so.
I don't hear anything.
Don't be so modest. Hoochiefs are known to be agile, and inside this complex terrain of the Dim Forest they move around like crazy. They're a pain in the butt to deal with.
This used to be the place where the Hoochiefs nurtured its young, the reason why we made it into a Side Sprint facility is also due to its flexible routes.
I do.
Very well, let's go back to the training grounds.
Can I learn a thing or two…
Then I'll put up a show for you.
I'll do my best.
No, sir! Absolutely not!
How come you're still here… Whatever, just watch from a distance. You can't possibly throw up just by watching, could you?
Alright, what I actually wanted to say is that I have something to ask of you…
What I meant to say is, if you don't have your hands tied right now, can you do me a favor…
I was going to go there for a special training, but I just can't find the way…
I know, right? As the saying goes, once you're in the forest you can't help getting lost. Sometimes there's just places you can't find.
If you count me, there's plenty.
Please, please help me meet my life-saving mentor! It's really important to me!
If you don't mind, how about we get started now?
Wait… You mean now?
It's ok if Master Spiral's not here yet, I can train on my own! Can I use the sprint track for some training?
The track which the Mornguards have was designed based on a defensive terrain, while this one here, was designed to specialize in three-dimensional maneuverability within a forest terrain.
Its best that you start training from the basics.
*Cough… *Cough… *Blargh… *Blargh!
Don't lean over, this is fine.
I need to get ready, you go talk to the chief and buy me some time.
Thank you, sir! I didn't expect you would personally come to help. I thought you had mysophobia. I'm deeply sorry!
No. But the smell from you throwing up earlier is still there.
Too bad? What do you mean?
I just heard rumors that Master Spiral has very sensitive nose, and very picky with cleanness… That's why he loves being high in the air, to breathe fresh air.
What a bunch of nonsense. Besides, who would enjoy the smell of vomit!
Especially with that stinky kid who threw up all over me that one time. Urgh…
It's even more disgusting than having twenty Hoochiefs dancing in front of you!
Twenty? Unbelievable! Not bad, chief!
Tch. That's it, you go back to where you came from, boy. You hear me?
Huh?
Did you mean by one man against twenty? Or was it with your squad?
That's Master Spiral famous quote!
"Don't let the limitations of scores, hamper your will to imagine and endeavor."
A professional Side Sprinter once said, Side Sprint was originally a sport for challenging the limits, these standards only came to being because of the inclusion into the evaluations.
Why don't you give the demo recording a try? With your experience, you might be able to show off more creative moves than that person we picked for the job.
If you're ready, just open the mechanism beside the starting point and you're ready to go.

He always said that once it becomes a part of the evaluations, people would start making shortcuts in the standards. By the time when people really need to use it in practice, they won't know anything anymore.
You have to feel and think with your body, so when in combat…
How does he know every word?
So your captain is… Master Spiral?
The captain was a known proficient Side Sprinter. His famous words spread far, of course.
I've said there's no such thing as a Master Spiral. Where did all these stories come from?

One time I was on a rescue mission, I gave the folks a really bumpy ride and they ended up throwing up nonstop. I was too embarrassed to admit I was a Ranger, so I lied I was a Mornguard and high tailed it.
Why don't we let hime come over…
Forgive me, I got too excited, I hope I didn't offend you. It's just, I… I'm so excited…
No, you hold your horses, son. I don't know where exactly these rumors of yours came from, but for the last time…
Well… Come to think of it, my captain's name is Qunluo. There were these rascals, who would refer to those that served under him, including us, as the "Qunluo Disciples"
So… You're all… Master Spirals?
No idea, maybe. I don't know what you young people are into these days.
So, sir, can you help me with my special training? I know you may not be in a good mood right now, we can do this at another date, as long as its before the evaluations…
*Sigh… Come here, take this, cover your eyes.
I'll transfer the demonstration materials to the company afterwards, thank you.
If you're in need of another challenge, you're welcome anytime.
The coordinates' are already in your Terminal. To be honest, when I first I saw you I just get the feeling that… you're really good at finding your way, aren't you?
Goodbye.
(Shouts loudly) "You can react based on your instincts!"
Help!!
Over there!
You called Chenchi over.
What happened?
What happened?
"Light will never fade at the lighthouse. Welcome home, friend."
Got other things to do.
What's this?
What happened?
Ook-ook...
Anyone...
Help me... help me...
Oh hi! It's the one Rover! I wasn't there when you're taking out those gangs, it was quite a pity.
Ready when you are.
Not available now.
*Sigh*... Greetings, Rover. You know, we've been getting a lot of new folks signing up for the Pioneer Association lately. It's thanks to your excellent performance.
Eventually, I'm gonna be the strongest one around here! And you better believe I'll live up to the name 'Pioneer'!
There you are, Instructor.
Qinghong, Rover's here now. You still don't want to talk to anybody? I know you've been looking forward to this course, right?
Rover? How can I help you?
I'm here to settle your complaint.
Oh, I see. You're a lobbyist for the Pioneer Association.
Woah!
The sound mark shows that there are traces of the Blue Crown Pigeon activity nearby.
The core was placed by the Blue Crown Pigeon in its nest.
You're so fast! No one knows better than you where the pigeon hid the core! Your mind is completely in sync with the pigeon's!
What is he talking about...
*Sighs*

I'm also reflecting on myself. I should have assessed the difference in strength before engaging in combat, and we didn't fully utilize the combat skills you taught us. We're really sorry, Instructor!
Please don't be angry with us. You look really upset and it scares Luoze so much that he's too afraid to say anything.
Instructor... Thank you for coming to save us. We just wanted to save others just like you...
It's not that we overestimated our strength. Because the situation was dire, we...
Wow, I never thought the terrain would be so important. But if I want to use it to my advantage, I'll have to be really familiar with the surrounding...
However, it's also very important to adapt on the fly in battle! Cause our enemies are not going to fall for the same trick twice, we have to be able to think on our feet.
Humph!
What happened?
Sorry, Instructor. We shouldn't have come here to rescue Baicang without letting you know first...
*Sighs*... She had trouble with the customer. She wasn't recognized for her hard work, and even received a complaint from him.
How can a rookie put up with it.
That's fine. It's better if Rover takes charge. You'd better let Qinghong give me an answer!
Greetings, Instructor!
Just like the one standing right next to me. *Sigh*... Fine, let him be...
Whenever I see these young folks, it takes me back to my own lost youth. The world was a dangerous yet dazzling place, and our hearts beat so fast with all the excitement... *Sigh* But now, I...
The world doesn't change. It's me who's changed.
Well, but the Pioneer Association never crushes young people's dreams. It's about teaching them how to survive in this world.
Fly like the wind, and strike as lightning.
For a better world!
So, can I entrust it to you?
To me?
Yes, I want someone like you, with all your experience, to be their instructor and teach them how to survive in the wild.
I've never taught anyone before though...
Experience comes from danger. It's not something that's easy to learn.
No worries. I'll set up the courses for you. Let me see... How about you teach them how to take down MOs today?
I trust you'll keep them safe out there. These rookies do need some hardcore training. 'Devil Instructor', not a bad nickname, eh?
But it's also important to take it step by step. Let's start with an easy field training first.
We're holding the training at Qichi Village. I already sent the course details to the rookies. Instructor Rover, please go teach them as soon as possible.
Greet-greetings, Instructor!
Wow, the Pioneer Association indeed invited Rover to be the instructor for the rookies!
You are?
We're the rookies you'll be training today. I'm Qinghong, and this dude here is Luoze.
Th-thank you for taking the time to deal with... to teach us!
On behalf of every member in the Pioneer Association, we're very proud and honored to have you as our instructor!
We'll listen to you with all our hearts and work hard for an early graduation, over!
What's this?
Well, he just doesn't know how to express himself, but all his words come from the bottom of his heart. He's definitely not mocking you.
Qinghong, Qinghong, can I request to shake hands with Instructor Rover?
Eh... and he's a bit fanatical? After all, we all came for you. Please forgive him for this little issue.
I remember we have [Learn to Fight against MOs] today.
Can't wait to take your course!
Let's get started.
Instructor, you're fantastic! Look at this... Ouch! What's with the punching?
Shut up. Be serious.
You ended the battle so quickly! That's Instructor Rover!
Just aim at their weak points.
Instructor! I have a question!
Go on.
How can we find their 'weak points'?
The weak points vary based on their kinds. I'll teach you in the future.
How great, Qinghong! We share the same future with Instructor! *Chuckles*
I'm also looking forward to it.
I still can't believe that we can learn lots of things from Rover...
You should really wipe that dreamy look off your face. It's time for the course!
What! You know, after knowing the Pioneer Association has set up Rover's courses for us, I rushed to the location at a speed that was even faster than that of a Sabyr Boar.
You can take your time.
Yeah, it's not like Rover's gonna disappear or something.
But when I arrived, I saw you were already there...
*Clears throat* I also want to learn the knowledge as soon as possible, and prove that I'm fully competent as a 'Pioneer', so that I can explore the wild at will...
Ha! You're just as eager as me.
Of course! The wild world is waiting for me to explore!
You're both proactive.
Shall we start the course right away! Today you're going to teach them [Take Advantage of the Terrain to Attack], right?
Thanks for reminding me.
That's why we have the prior survey.
To be able to attack flexibly, you need to know your enemies well.
I still have much to learn from you!
I'll pour a little oil on troubled waters.
Qinghong, follow Rover. Communication is very important. Whether you're talking to a customer or a friend, sometimes simple words can end a relationship. *Sighs*
Sounds like there's a story there.
Haha, water under the bridge. Let's talk about it later.
So today's course will focus on teaching this kid how to communicate with others.
I asked her to investigate the movement of the Fractisidus and give me the results within a week, but it's been almost a month and I haven't heard back from her. Isn't she ashamed?
It's not an easy task to investigate the Fractisidus.
That's not my concern! I spent a fortune and I require reliable results.
Okay, I will follow up the work.
Well, it does seem a bit promising if you can get involved.
Could you please withdraw your complaint?
No way!
How about I apply for a discount on your next commission?

You think it's just about the money? Of course that matters, but what's really bothering me is that she hasn't given me an explanation. Why has it taken so long? Does she have any idea how much I was looking forward to hearing about the results?
I'll go ask her.
Instructor... I heard it all.
Can you tell me the reason?
I... I found out from a source that there have been signs of Fractisidus activity near the Industrial Area. So, I've been keeping watch there...
But I found out afterward that the Fractisidus had already left before I got there. So I spent a whole month doing useless work!
Ahhhh! That's too embarrassing! If it weren't for you, I couldn't have said it!
I see. Acting accordingly does matter.
Oh please! Stop teasing me...
You told Qixian the reason for the delay.
What?! So the Fractisidus has already been to the Industrial Area before!
Darn. I was so close to them, but I missed...
Thank you. This is already quite useful information I have obtained in recent years!
Your complaint?
I'll withdraw it.
But remember to keep the discount for me! I'll entrust her again the next time!
*Sighs* Well, well, don't cry, don't cry...
How's that?
I'm too embarrassed to say that it's done by Rover's student...
*Sobbing*
He accepted the easiest commission to help deliver the goods, but not long after receiving them, they went missing. He's too embarrassed to face his client, so he came back and started crying.
So we just need to find the goods. What are them?
Roseshroom core required by the Academy. He said they were snatched by a Blue Crown Pigeon all of a sudden.
Lost to a pigeon...
Waaaaah!
*Sighs* Instead of crying, you need to learn Rover's never-giving-up spirit and how to do the follow-up work, understood?
Is it on the roof? Let's go up and see.
This shining appearance is probably the reason why the pigeon snatched the core.
It seems that you've pulled yourself together.
Yes! I've carefully considered that as a student of Rover, my every move represents you, Instructor. So, I will never embarrass you!
That's a bit of an exaggeration... Here's the core.
I am handing it to the client! Thank you again for your help!
What's today's course?
Ah! It's you, Rover. That's right. I need to set up the course for you...
What happened?
Baicang hasn't come back. Alas, I shouldn't have left such a dangerous task to him alone.
Oh, he's also a rookie. He was very eager to help others, saying that he hoped to help others like the hero who saved him...

I happened to receive a rescue mission to help a miner who was trapped in a cave while prospecting for mineral resources in the Hukou Mine. Since it was close to Tiancheng, I thought it wouldn't be too dangerous and sent Baicang there to assist with the rescue...
And I failed to contact him again since then.
What's the situation now?
Luoze and Qinghong just came back from missions. Upon knowing it, they went there immediately, hoping to help Baicang. *Sighs* I'm just worried that they can't handle it either...
Newcomers in the Pioneer Association are always full of ideals and ambitions, which may only push them to danger...
They still don't know how important life is...
It seems that the content of this course has been decided.
I found them. They're all over there.
It's Instructor! Qinghong, Qinghong! Instructor came to help us! We're here!
Let me take down these MOs first.
If I had been late, you should have been...
Commission isn't something to be taken lightly. You have to give it careful consideration.
Rover, it's not their fault. I'm the one who caused this. But if it happens again, I'll be there to save whoever needs help.
I joined the Pioneer Association because I wanted to lend a helping hand to anyone who needs it. Even if... even if it's beyond my abilities... Even if it means risking my life!
Pioneers are always willing to risk their lives!
I'm not asking you not to help others.
As miners, everyone wants to operate that big mining truck. However, it's not possible for you to drive that machine if you don't even know how to get into the truck, right?
That's right. Even Instructor doesn't know how to drive that mining truck outside... You don't know, right?
*Clears throat* So you'll definitely get yourself into trouble cause you don't even master the basic skills, right?
No matter it's driving the truck or rescuing someone, you have to improve your abilities. The more you comprehend, the more situations you can handle.
Don't you wanna be an experienced and mature Pioneer just like Rover?
Of course, I want! I want to save everyone I can.
Then come attend the course with them from now on.
Understood, Ro... Instructor!
You are the one who accepted my quest... mister stranger, judging from your dressing, I presume you are not a Huanglongese, right?
Good judgement.
Haha, that's for sure. Since the port was completed, I have been stationed here for more than twenty years.
I was also on the front line of the port defense battle when the largest Wave of Beasts occurred.
What is the Wave of Beast?
It is a disaster for Huanglong. Overwhelming TD waves broke out at the same time, and the pressure placed on the forces across the realm was really great.
Yes, that battle was hard to fight, because the TDs came fiercely, the frontline frequently collapsed...
Fortunately, we Mornguards bought a lot of time until the front line warriors suppressed the TDs. We did not let the port suffer!
Safe to say, the port is my pride. I dedicated my first half of life to it.
Your persistence was meaningful.
Unfortunately... among the guard squad that fought side by side at that time, only I stand now. I am lucky that I can still tell you this story today.
Mister stranger, can you help me lay a bouquet of flowers? For those comrades who didn't come back.... They are greater than me, but not as lucky as I was.
No, no. I've picked all the flowers, I just want you to deliver them to the Memorial Cemetery for me.
Have things gone well? You're back so fast...
Great, when they smell this flower, they know they are still being missed.
I often observe passersby when on duty... so I can tell at a glance if you are from Huanglong or an outsider.
Nice, nice to meet you?
Wait, you don't remember me?
Don't play with me. The two things I'm the most confident in my life, one is I land every shot on the battleground, the second is I never forget a face I've met!
Can I ask you to help me lay a bouquet of flowers? For those comrades who didn't return.... They are greater than me, but not as lucky as I was.
Su, sure... How did you know? I've picked the flowers, just wondering if you can lay them down before the Memorial Cemetery for me.
Honestly, I visit Lee and Yao almost every day... but I wish there can be more people who remember them.
As long as different people go to lay flowers for them every day, they will know that there are still many people who have not forgotten them.
Have things gone well? You're back so fast...
Great, when they smell this flower, they know they are still being missed.
Mister stranger... I stand here every day, but how come I've never seen you around?
Actually we've met a lot of times.
Wh, what? Don't try to fool me. The two things I'm most confident for my life...
One, land every shot. Two, never forget faces.
How, how is that possible? You know everything!
Wait... although I don't remember you, there is an extraordinarily familiar sense... does seem to ring a bell, but I just can't recall.
No wonder, Yu told me to keep a journal this morning, and I was angry with her, asked her what journals had to offer.
And Chuan, I told him the jokes I learned, and he laughed reluctantly, as if he had heard it many times!
My memory has become muddy. Why don't they tell me!
Maybe they have.
Right. Maybe they have told me many times, but I remember none of that...
I can't go on like this, I need to treat this sooner.
But... this bouquet of flowers in memory of my comrades. Probably I still have to trouble you.
You've found the flowers? So it was left at Yu's place... then, please help for the flowers.
Thank you for letting me know about my bad memory. Don't keep that in mind. I'll treat it properly.
Here you come. Long time no see.
You remember me now, finally?
You are Li, living next door to me. How will I forget? I held you in my arms when you were a baby, and you always tried to touch my gun then.
Oh? Wait, it's not right... come closer, let me look at you carefully!
I almost got it wrong. I see clearly now. You're Yao, you shoulder cargo at the port.
Remember that time when you were plundered by the exiles? If I wasn't accidentally there, you were already tied up and thrown in the water!
How's that? Was I right? Tell me.
I'm Li. I live next door.
Li, it's you... I heard you joined Mornguard some time ago. Well done.
Dear me... how could I possibly mistake a face.
Have things gone well? You're back so fast...
Great, when they smell this flower, they know they are still being missed.
You were in the battle of Wave of Beast?
I'll go pick the flowers now.
Why don't you go yourself?
Honestly, I visit Lee and Yao almost every day... but I wish there can be more people who remember them.
As long as different people go to lay flowers for them every day, they will know that there are still many people who have not forgotten.
Oops, this is the last bunch for today?... Then this bunch is for you, I will pick some more later.
Have you picked the flowers yet?
Why don't you go yourself?
Oops, this is the last bunch for today?... Then this bunch is for you, I will pick some more later.
Hm? That bouquet of flowers, how come I can't find it after talking to Yu in the morning.
Let me find it for you.
Hmm? You came to ask about Uncle Bin's flowers? He left the flowers here this morning after he had a fight with me.
I heard of it.
Uncle Bin's so stubborn. I just told me to keep a journal, and he began to yell at me.
Are you Yu?
Yes. No. I am, but not completely...
Yu was his apprentice for years, who sacrificed when he was defending the port three years ago.
I joined the Mornguard later, and when Uncle Bin met me for the first time, he called me Yu, Yu like we were so familiar with each other. And I just couldn't reject him...
The thing is my name is Yuzan, with a Yu in it, so I went on to pretend I was his late apprentice Yu ever since.
If he has caused for the loss of memory, I'd like to apologize to you on his behalf.
Nothing. No trouble caused.
Thank you. Somebody said things could be troublesome since Uncle Bin became that way, but I've been his apprentice for so long and I've grown used to it.
A little trouble some, but fine.
I'm so sorry. I'll tell Uncle Bin to treat that. And I hope he could get better soon.
Then this bouquet of flowers of his. I'll count on you for delivering them.
I'm Yao. I shoulder cargo at the port.
I am {PlayerName}.
Hm? Neither? You're not Li, nor Yao...
Sigh, it's been so many years, and you still look so young.
Are you here for missions? If you have time, Uncle Bin would like to ask you to put down a flower at the Memorial Cemetery.
I can recall when you argued that you wanted to ship the supplies for us when we were defending the port from TDs.
You know what? You are playing with your life on the battleground, cuz you can't even beat the exiles. Don't be like that again.
Don't accuse me of talking nonsense so much. You look so young... it's like you're not growing.
If you're free today, I'd like you to do me a favor. Lay down a flower at the Memorial Cemetery for me.
I had a condition recently, I forget things... thought it was getting better. Turns out not true.

Yes, yes, this is exactly what we wanted. The captain will be most pleased!

We met before?

That's great! Thanks Fairy Crane and Rover!

It smells so good. I really like this scent, but why my nose becomes sore...

Every time my daddy and mommy went back, they always smelt like this, but that was a long, long time ago...

You're back, Rover... Is Hanxiang alright?

I used to worry that she might have tooth decay, so I didn't allow her to eat much... But after I left, no one would make this for her, I guess.
The ingredients can be purchased in Tiancheng. It's not convenient for me to cook this dish in the camp... I'm done if I let the leader know.
So if you are willing to help... How about I give you the recipe of Dragon Whisker Crisp? You can easily go in Tiancheng to buy the ingredients, and you can drop by and send it to Hanxiang.
Leave it to me.
*Stomach growls* I'm so hungry... My tummy keeps growling.
I bring you Fairy Crane's gift.
It smells so good... Hurray! It's Dragon Whisker Crisp!
But... I can only eat a little and leave the rest here.
Why is that?
*Stomach growls* I'm so hungry... My tummy keeps growling.
I bring you Fairy Crane's Dragon Whisker Crisp.
I'm a good girl! I finished them all this time!
There you are. Does Hanxiang... still like Dragon Whisker Crisp?
[You tell Zhaowan what Hanxiang says. She remains silent for a while, pondering.]
I really miss her, but I hope she doesn't miss me that much.
I really appreciate your help. Here are your rewards.
[Hanxiang seems to be bothered by something. When you're about to leave, she stops you.]
I have another question...
What?
Does Fairy Crane... really exist?
Yes, of course.
Actually, she is someone that loves you so much.
But... only my aunt told me something about Fairy Crane.
I asked my classmates and friends. They all said I was boasting.
Only someone who believes she exists can meet her.
But where is she?
She's waiting for you to find her yourself.
I see. So one day I can definitely find her, right?
OK
Thank you so much! I know my aunt didn't lie to me. Fairy Crane does exist!
She is my aunt, right? I already guessed it...
Only my aunty told me about Fairy Crane and only my aunty knows what I like.
But why doesn't she come back?
You'll know.
Um... Why would you say that!
Fine. I'll grow up very, very fast and find my aunty back.
I can't really think of what to give her...
Thinking gifts for Hanxiang?
Rover, you're right on time. Can you ask what Hanxiang wants for me this time?
I decided all the gifts before. But this time... I want to know what Hanxiang thinkx.
I'll be there.
You're here, Rover!
What do you want as a gift?
Eh? Can I make a wish to Fairy Crane? Well, I want to see the picture of the Snow Crane.
Aunty told me that she met Fairy Crane near the nest of the Snow Crane... So I've decided that I want to be a zoologist when I grow up!
I want to be friends with animals and they'll help me find Fairy Crane.
Sure, they will.
Rover, did you manage to find Snow Cranes?
We did.
Were they dancing? Their white wings are so beautiful...
Please tell Fairy Crane that I'll keep this picture well.
I will.
Rover, does Hanxiang have any new likes?
[You tell Zhaowan what Hanxiang says. She remains silent for a while, pondering.]
Hanxiang is really clever. She can definitely make it to the Academy.
Thank you for keeping Fairy Crane's secret. Thank you for giving a chance for Hanxiang's dream to grow.
It's a bit embarrasing to say these words... Anyway, thank you so much and please take these rewards.
I can't really think of what to give her...
Thinking gifts for Hanxiang?
Rover, you're right on time. Can you ask what Hanxiang wants for me this time?
I decided all the gifts before. But this time... I want to know what Hanxiang thinkx.
I'll be there.
Zhiguang is an idiot! Idiot!
Coward Hanxiang! You cry cause I'm right! Hahaha!
You even want to be a Mornguard? You can't even beat a Gulpuff!
I've been practicing hard and I can definitely protect everyone.
You see that old wooden stick? Hahaha, stop boasting!
Then come spar with me!
No, I don't want to compete against a girl with super strength! Come chase me!
(I'll report to Zhaowan later.)
Rover, how are things going?
[You tell Zhaowan what Hanxiang says. She remains silent for a while, pondering.]
This is a wooden sword with no edge and it's lighter than the normal one. Please take it to Hanxiang.
What's this?
Actually, I used to be a Mornguard. This is the weapon I used in training.
Back then, the people around me that joined Huanglong army, including my brother and sister-in-law, that is, Hanxiang's parents all died one after another.
At last, I was also dispatched to resist the TD Wave. On the day before the battle... I thought I would not be afraid.
But I fled away, wandering and abandoning myself. At last, I was part of the Exiles.
I won't defend myself and I don't regret either.
I just hope Hanxiang can be braver than me... Even if that means we will be enemies one day.
I'll hand it to her.
Rover, great! I was just going to find you!
How's that?
I heard that you're really strong! Even the giant monsters outside Tiancheng are no match for you.
Can you teach me? I've saved a lot of pocket money... I can give you all!
We can talk about it later. I have a gift for you.
Is this... really for me? I can use a real sword to practice!
But you need to practice it under a teacher's guidance. Be careful.
Of course! I will drive away all bad people and monsters just like you when I grow up...
Well, this way, aunty will come back!
Hanxiang is definitely gonna love to eat this...
Which one?
Rover, here you are! I want to give Hanxiang some Dragon Whisker Crisp. She loves that.
I used to worry that she might have tooth decay, so I didn't allow her to eat much... But after I left, no one would make this for her, I guess.
The ingredients can be purchased in Tiancheng. It's not convenient for me to cook this dish in the camp... I'm done if I let the leader know.
Could you make some Dragon Whisker Crisp? You know, you can easily go purchase ingredients in Tiancheng, and give it to Hanxiang on the way.
Leave it to me.
But now I'll keep my aunty's secret. Aunty is Fairy Crane and Fairy Crane is aunty.
In this way, when I miss my aunty, I can say it out loud...
Dragon Whisker Crisp is my aunt's specialty. She used to cook it for me... I really miss her, but I can only hide it in my heart.
Why is that?
Cause every time I talk about my aunt, they will be very angry, but they never tell me the reason... They always say that I'll figure it out one day when I grow up.
If I'll hate my aunt just like my family does when I grow up, I would rather never grow up...
Rover! I've been waiting for you.
A big shot is indeed different. The word 'commission' makes this simple errand more formal. That's so classy.
That's Rover. You completed the 'commission' so perfectly!
Rover! It's our happy 'commission' time.
I still want to increase my sense of secruity, but I want it to double this time.
It's so reassuring to entrust Rover to do the work. Lemme check the goods...
Through the grapevine. Our boss wants a batch of... Tacetite weapons.
Darn! Who are you? How dare you rob our stuff!
Don't let him go. Let's take him down together!
He's so strong... We can't let the goods fall into his hands. Destroy the goods if we have to!
Rover! It's our happy 'commission' time.
I still want to increase my sense of secruity, but I want it to double this time.
Why there's someone interfering again? I'm not even allowed to do a small business...
Take him down!
I'm sorry. As long as you can spare my life, I can do whatever you want...
Who..
Yo, isn't this the famous arms dealer? Don't you always turn your nose up at our shabby place? I remember you keep rejecting our request for transaction.
Wow, what a day! Why is there someone actively giving us weapons today?
Rover, here you are.
That brat has gained weight recently, so I sent him to do some work that can make him lose weight.
It's not safe in the mine recently. Be more careful when patrolling!
And about today's work... I only feel assured to hand it to you on my own.
What's the commission this time?
Spit it out...
Okay, okay. Let me explain the 'COMMISSION' to you.
You know, the Piggy just went through a big fight not long ago, right? Thanks to your help, we defeated our enemies and finally got our own territory.
As you know, our boss will never be satisfied. He believes that we not only need to protect our territory well, but also keep expanding.
And the priority is to make sure that we have enough supplies, right?
Supplies, do you mean money?
Supplies, do you mean weapons?
Money? That's something only big shots like you need. The one we use more here is this - our fist.
Exactly. Nothing is more important and can make people feel more secure than weapons.
So we want you to help us bring back a batch of weapons.
I just need to take them back?
Yes, that's right. We've already 'reserved' them. When you arrive, as long as you show our signal 'fist', they'll give you the weapons.
It seems that I have to take them back by force.
I sent you the location. I'll be waiting here for your good news.
As we're so close, no need to do the formality.
They're all here. Go check them.
Even if you 'damage some accidentally', the Piggy will not come for you for sure.
I never 'damage stuff accidentally'.
Yep, yep. I know we can absolutely count on you. But you know, the weapons may not be able to survive the great distances themselves...
Rest assured. I won't take many. How about there is only one 'damaged' in these ten?
So you want to appropriate it...
You know, Exiles live in danger. We have to have our own 'supply' in case of emergencies. It would make us feel secure.
What do you want this time?
Oh?
That's not something Exiles should have.
It's because we don't usually have the way to obtain it. So we all swarm in when we smell the chance.
The Piggy has a stable relationship with the renown Rover, so I guess it's not appropriate for us to fall behind, huh?
So, this time we're counting on you too. I sent you the position of the weapons.
Got it.
One, two... Okay, all here, all of them!
Don't keep some for yourself this time?
Hey... It's Tacetite weapon. Our boss keeps a close eye on it. I don't have the guts to lay my hands on it.
The last one who laid his hands on it was already tied upside down by the boss, hanging on the tall building over there to fish for Gulpuffs...
Okay, I'll let you go. Besides, I have to send them to the boss for further check.

Besides, we've even got a freebie this time!
A freebie?

That mysterious merchant who has been trading weapons with Exiles is said to be on the scene this time. I guess, that's because he's been waylaid by Rover many times before, and now he can't sit still anymore.
Bring back the weapons as usual. But this time we're also desperate for the freebie. That's why we can only count on you, Rover.
So I need to?
Follow me.
Let me guess... Um, it must be because you've made a great fortune by reselling, and now you're in a great mood, so you wanna do something good to benefit the society?
Then I think we need to thank you for your kindness!
He seems to be super mad at you.
Hahaha, thank you again, Rover.
I need to take this man back first, and I'll catch up with you later. If you would love to do me the honor, I'd love to treat you with the specialties of Exiles. What do you say?
It seems that you're the one who is in a good mood.
You're right. Our boss has been after that tricky merchant for a long time. Now, he's finally fallen into our hands...
When he pays his price, we can get the benefits from our boss. I'm of course happy!
Not Lil. Mo today?
What work is that important? Even needs to be entrusted directly by the boss.
Send this batch to the designated place. I already sent you the coordinates. Don't ask any questions.
Among the boxes of weapons piled up in disorder, some Tacetite weapons can be vaguely seen hidden inside. That is probably the real purpose of this delivery...
Tacetite weapons again?
I told you don't ask! Humph, I'm not going to answer your question even if you ask.
I can choose not to take on this commission.
It looks like I underestimate your curiosity. Alright, Exiles and Tacetite weapons, when they're put together, people tend to be suspicious. After all, normal people can't use it.
What're you doing with it?
Well, there is always someone who needs it. I'm just doing a favor.
As for the rest, I think you'll soon figure it out when you arrive. Enough for the small talk. Go now.
Following the sound, you find that there is a Mornguard camp near the designated location. Probably these Tacetite weapons will soon be discovered by Mornguards on patrol.
Oh?
You are... Rover! Are you here to carry out any commission?
Is there anything weird nearby?
Um? Weird place...
There is indeed a rumor that a Mornguard picked up various things on patrol.
Picked up things?
Yep, all kings of stuff. Once he even picked up Flower Fungi from Whining Aix's Mire. That's our captain's favorite food.
We're all surprised, cause only captain started to cry after eating, saying that the taste was still the same... But we're not sure whether it's because he got poisoned and couldn't think straight.
We guessed those stuff were actually given by our captain's former friend.
But why bother? If they are friends, just meet and give him.
Maybe there's a reason why they can't meet again.
So complicated.
For me, the chance to see each other is becoming less and less, so I'll definitely seize the chance when we can still meet each other.

Favorable place.

Really!? The very first investigation went so well. What a good start!
What a pity...
Welcome to [Squeaky Express]. We're delighted to be of service!
Oh, it's Rover. I thought we have new guests...
I know. I was going to ask you to run another investigation on the new logistic facility. It's just...
We rose the price recently. Though the increase was tiny... our old customers kept complaining, and we also have a hard time acquiring new customers.
With our irreplaceable service, we don't suffer from customer loss yet, but the pressure is surely growing.
Thank you. Samples received. I'll archive them as soon as possible.
Thank you for choosing Squeak Express, we're happy to serve!
I've accepted your commission.
Great. If it's Rover who takes this quest, I'll be reassured.
Hum hum, so our company stills has a good reputation. Those false rumors about our recession shall be reduced to nothing because of your joining.
What happened?
Now let's set those trivial thing aside. I'll walk you through the details of this quest.
The thing is, we are opening new logistical facilities, and this quest is about that.
You already have a lot of facilities, don't you?
We are a world-class delivery company, so we're always expanding!
One day, our service will be provided around the globe, truly connecting everyone with logistic networks.
Sounds inconceivable and all in my head, does it?
I agree.
Well since it's you guys...
Humph, we'll prove that to everyone that doesn't believe this.
Right, since it's us, we'll definitely make it!
Now what do we do?
Now what do we do?

Yes. We've commissioned the PA to run some advance checks on various candidate locations, so we already have a shortlist now, but since the resurgence of Threnodian, things have become dangerous again in the wild...
I have to make sure the new facility is secure enough, so I filed this commission.
You can start with the investigation of the Tacet Field in Central Plain. If we can clear it, we can have path to there with our campsite.
According to previous reports, TDs there are not strong. But we should still be careful.
OK! I'll sync with you the environmental assessment module developed per our commission now. It will help you analyze the feasibility of building a facility at your location.
This is still a prototype, though, so the final assessment is yours to make. You can give me a contact when you have the decision. Could save you some travel.
TD spotted.
Please fight it for examination of its strength.
Analysis of battle data complete. TDs at this place are far stronger than expected. Squeaky Express does not possess the capability to...
End of report. Please contact Squeaky Express soon.
I'll arrange for a more thorough examination as soon as possible, though you'll still be requested to keep watch of that location.
If the logistic facility can be built here, I'll definitely give you a super big discount for your parcels! Look forward to it!
But good things never come easy. There has to be somewhere favorable.
Thank you anyway for the investigation, though, Rover.
I've accepted your commission.
What happened?
I wonder if it's truly a good plan to expand our business now.
Why did you rise the price, then?

Hm... maybe the boss has his reason, but from my point of view, the work environment in the wild is becoming increasingly dangerous, while the shipping cost is getting even higher due to massive order delays as a result of insufficient capacity.

The establishment of new facilities was meant to solve these problems. As long as we keep creating new nodes of connection, we can ensure the inter-connection of more people. That's the very purpose of transportation.
Then you should hold on.
If only I could be as firm as you are... when I face the questions of the public, I can't help doubting myself, even if I could keep my belief in the boss.
Rover, be my power. I hope your firmness can be our direction mark.
Leave it to me.
I'm gonna ask you to investigate the west entrance at Dim Forest. It was a good place recommanded by the Association.
Your main task will be to measure the water indicators there, and see if the environment there meets the standard for establishing a logistic facility.
The sampling method has been sent to you. Leave the analysis to the environmental assessment module. Just give me your final decision, which will dictate whether a new facility will be build there.
What's the result today?
Great! I'm already seeing the establishment of the new facility. What a beautiful scene...
Favorable place.
Maybe somewhere else.
Thank you for your help, Rover. Please send me the samples and I'll follow up on the future development. I'll let you know when there is good news.
Oh, and please remember to mark the sampling time, location and serial number on the respective samples, so we can properly archive them.
OK... I just knew things wouldn't go so smoothly...

Not at all. I find extra time to do commissions.
Good, good.

We're all veteran couriers, unlike the kid that he is, jumping up and down non-stop. So we're able to ignore him and focus on the delivery of course.
But with all the negativity that's rising from his taunting, and having him following us all the time… Everyone's starting to get a little bit irritated.
Can you help us go have a little chat with him, and ask him to stop annoying us while we work?
I'll go talk to him.
You came straight to me, so I take that your really confident in your speed?
I see how it is, it's those Sloth Express people that sent you to take care of me, isn't it?
Wait…
Let's have a race, then.
Hear…
Hahaha! If your words can match the speed of sound and catch up to me, I might just be able to hear what you're trying to say. Better catch up!

Hahaha! Like the wind!

Come to have a chat with me again? Well, if you want me listening, you better start accelerating!
Show me how many cylinders you got in there. Time to let her rip!
