Don't worry, I won't mind a bit. First place is already taken.
Hold up, listen to what I have to say before you go!
Oh? You managed to a get a sentence off this time. That's a first.
But, did you know that in a race, you can only start after the judge has given the signal? You don't have to wait for a signal from me just to talk.
This is the only time I'm giving you the chance for a few words, so enjoy it while it lasts. Focus more on getting past me!
Hahaha! Better talk sooner next time! And be as quick as the wind, too!
How am I going to talk sense to him, if my words can't even catch up…
Rover, thank you for helping me fend off those Exile thieves… *Cough, I need to clean this mess up, or else I'll be in for some yelling from Linghua again once I go back…
Tiahu and I were testing out a new autonomous drone early this morning. But it immediately went out of control right after we released it into the air…
I followed it all the way here only to find Exiles already had their eyes on it.
No mean to complain, but the drone was made from recycled scrap metal to begin with… Why would they even want to steal that?
I'll just give you these that I'm carrying as payment for you help! Once we develop new products later on, do come and be the first to try them out!
Darn it… So close! The drone was just about to hit the 300m range mark!
If it weren't for those pesky Exiles coming over and shooting it down… Ugh…
You should keep your hopes up.
Is the drone in bad shape?
Thanks for your words of encouragement, Rover… It used to malfunction every time it gets airborne, at least it's now controllable within a certain range.
Let me take a look, it's barely workable, lots of parts fell off too… *Sigh, I wonder if there are any spares back in the warehouse.
I'm heading back to get it fix and continue making improvements! These are your payment for the help. Good thing you were here today!
I thought it was going to be a successful flight this time… Now how am I supposed to explain this to them…
Them?
A big client of ours who often come over for maintenance. He saw our newly developed drone and was very interested in it, so he ordered ten units at one go.
I brought these out here today to run some tests on them… and it's all either mechanical problems, or errors within the system. They're basically unusable at this point.
The amount of this order is really tempting… But us Drakes would never go against our conscience.
I'm heading back to withdraw these orders, and telling our client the truth that these products are not up to marketing standards yet.
It's all thanks to you, Rover. Otherwise, all these ten units would already be taken by the Exiles by now…
I really don't get what they want with these for… Can't imagine how they usually go about with their lives.
Can't find info about it anywhere…
Take a seat. What don't you want to order?
Oh? You want to know what the boss lady wants? Well, you better cough up then if you want me to talk, my belly still needs filling!
Hehe, now that's more like it!
Tch, if you want some of my time, then you have to exchange it with some intel! An intel for an intel, fair trade.
About the TDs in the wilderness…
Huh? You took out those TDs all by yourself?
Haha. So you're interested in Panhua. Settle down, I happened to be delving into popular consumer products outside the Huanglong region myself recently.
I have a question for you. Do you know what are the main ingredients of the molecular drink that's been popular over at the New Federation these days?
Gulpuff, Roseshroom, and Excarat.
Night Jasmine, Moon Lotus, and Coriolus.
Are you sure anything made with these ingredients are edible… You sure have a strange way of thinking.
Hahaha. What you just mentioned aren't specialties in the New Federation, you know.
However, since you can name so much material in one go, it means that you know the wilderness of Huanglong very well, and also a person who often ventures the wilderness.
When I first joined the Pioneer Association back in the day, I'd also often go out to the barren lands for tasks… Oops, sorry, I've taken it too far off the subject.
I've got a tip for you… If you manage to get some of that molecular drinks, expand the restaurant's beverage list a bit, the boss lady will most certainly be delighted.
Borrowing ideas from the New Federation's molecular drink's formula, and come up with a new drink that suits the taste of the people of Huanglong… So this is what she needs!
The gift I left at the restaurant's front door… She did take it, did she…?
Take a seat. What don't you want to order?
There you are, Rover. I need your help urgently!
Take a seat. What don't you want to order?
What should I do… Should I just give up? But I have this feeling I'm almost there!
Take a seat. What don't you want to order?
Loong Beard Crisps? How did you know I was hungry?
Ahem… You, the aura around you is terrifying! Even I was surprisingly completely overshadowed by it…
Relax, I won't hurt you.
Oh… If my eyes aren't deceiving me, you must be Rover! Your legends fill then entire air of Tiancheng, they say that you're invincible and able to do anything!
Jeez, the Cruising Drake Workshop's got some tough competition now with you being around.
That's a bit of an exaggeration.
What's the Cruising Drake Workshop?
Anyhow, now's a great opportunity to see what you're capable of, and I won't be going easy on you!
Huh-huh… Standing before you is the man who's about to lead a new generation of energy trend, the world's greatest industrial inventor, if I do say so myself!
Well, for now, he's still in his beginning stages of his career…
And the Cruising Drake Workshop would be his base of operations for the accumulation of fame and popularity.
If you ever have any mechanical equipments that need repairing, or have interest in our industrial inventions, feel free to come to the Cruising Drake Workshop at any time!
Now that we're done introducing ourselves… Now's a great opportunity to see what you're capable of, and I won't be going easy on you!
I'm sure something as simple as "sending a gift" wouldn't be too hard for you, would it?
I'm very experienced in it.
I have no idea what to do.
Very experienced? No, no, no, gift giving is not just buying something and then shoving it into the person's hands! There's lots to be considered!
Oh, boy. I guess we're fresh out of luck, then! I don't know any tricks about sending presents either!
I've actually done some research, before preparing a gift for someone you should learn about the other party's preferences and needs, then you should pick a suitable time and the right occasion…
Just tell me who you're trying to send presents to.
Err… It's for the owner of Panhua's Kitchen.

I've heard people say, "gifts are good for doing business". The only way I could let her help me with that, is by having her accept my gift first… But she never lets me step into her restaurant, she says I would scare off all the customers.
Please, Rover. Can you help me find out what she needs at the moment? I'll do my best to make necessary arrangements! And also, don't mention it was me who asked!
Ask about her preferred gift…
A gift? Why would I take anyone's gifts out of the blue? I see it now, Tianhu's the one that sent you, isn't it?
The restaurant's busy enough already, I don't have time to fool around. Shoo.
(I'll just have to ask others about this, I guess…)
[Hand over item] Offer a serving of meat.
No thanks.
The boss lady does have something bothering her lately. You've come to right person.

Some customers were complaining about the lack of variety in beverages last time, I could tell they were getting tired of having the same stuff over and over again! I'm afraid the only thing the boss lady can do now is to come up with something new to cope with their tastes.
I heard that there's this molecular drink that's running popular over at the New Federation… If you could get your hands on some of it for her to study on, she'll definitely pay you good for it.
About the pets in Tiancheng…
Not a bad story, but it lacks in a bit of details… You can tell me more about it next time.
What's that? Doudou's adopted another stray dog? How is she fitting that many in her house!
It's not the kind of intel that I really needed… But a promise is a promise.

From what I've heard from the customers' chats, there's this thing that's grown popular in the New Federation… Something called the molecular drink. The boss lady's been scratching her head trying to find ways to get some.
You look like a person with connections. If you could help us get some of that drink, it'll really benefit the business for our restaurant!
Why yes, in order to run a restaurant, its menu must be updated with ideas to constantly give customers a new and fresh feeling… We here at the Cruising Drake Workshop share the same philosophy!
I think there's a little difference between the both…
Darn it! It's so simple, why didn't I think of it earlier!
As for the New Federation's molecular drinks, I know some people over at the harbor who I can ask to buy me some straight away! Thanks a lot, Rover!
Whoa! Rover, you appeared out of nowhere again! I didn't even feel you creeping up on me. Just who are you exactly?
I've been here for quite a while actually.
Oh, snap! I embarrassed myself in front you yet again!
But… since it's you, my destined opponent… Then there's no point in putting up my disguise.

Not long ago, I bought a batch of those New Federation molecular drinks as fast as I could. Later, when it was late at night, and no one was around, I quietly left them at the front door of the restaurant…
And you know what! The drinks were gone in the morning! She definitely liked them, that's for sure!
Don't worry, she most definitely have felt my sincerity.
Try not to send gifts this way next time.
Now's not the time to make any stop, I should take advantage of this momentum and achieve my goals in one go!
Rover, go ask around what her needs are these days. I'll be counting on you.
Hold up, you were the one that told Tianhu to put that box of drinks at my front door last time?
Ask about her preferred gift…
People's opinion on that last batch of molecular drinks weren't too great. I did my own research and decided I don't need them anymore.
Please tell Tianhu to stop wasting his efforts. I'm busy and really don't have time for this…
(It seems I'll just have to ask around for information…)
Hmm? You again? Here to ask about the boss lady's needs? But I'm already done with my food, what should I order for takeout…
[Hand over item] Offer a serving of meat.
No thanks.
Quick to the point as usual, that's what I like about people like you!
As for what the boss lady wants… Actually, during the last opening when there weren't many customers yet, I heard her complain under her breath.
She's been wanting to change up the decor of the restaurant for while, but just doesn't have the time to come up with a blueprint.
If you can get her some antique patterns, she'll happy as a clam!
Tch, if you want some of my time, then you have to exchange it with some intel! An intel for an intel, fair trade.
About Exiles...
About Tacetite refinement…
Oh? So you've heard rumors of Exiles sneaking into Tiancheng?
Haha, then someone must be paranoid, there's no way those Exiles would find enough courage to break into Tiancheng!
"Contaminated wastewater yielded from Tacetite refinement must be treated through the ion exchange process before it is to be safely discharged…"
Err… This is some serious intel a lot different from what I expected.
In exchange, I'll tell you what's troubling the boss lady these days.
She needs some antique patterns as a reference for designing the restaurant's new interior decor… But she's got her hands full with managing the place and couldn't find the time to do it.
If you can help her get some… It's no exaggeration, but you'll become the restaurant's greated savior!
Haha. So you're interested in Panhua. Settle down, I happened to have heard a few gossips recently and need to find someone to talk about it.

You came at the perfect time. What I've heard is that… Every antique newly unearthed within the borders of Huanglong, would always have a batch of top quality ones disappear for no reason. Do you know why?
They got eaten by hungry TDs?
They got stolen by naughty children.
I've also heard of item-eating TDs… But it's a bit different from what I'm trying to imply.
You sure like to make a wild guess. You aren't teasing me on purpose, are you! Alright, I'll get straight to it then…

What the rumors really suggest is that… There's a hidden group secretly collecting the best antiques of humanity, seems to be planning something big. Plus, they are not only operating in Huanglong, but even other regions as well…
I still haven't figured out if this is a conspiracy theory or if it's real… Oops, I seem to have gone too far again.

As for the subject in concern, Panhua usually likes to turn to antique patterns when designing decorations, if you can provide her some for inspiration, it'll definitely help her save half of the trouble.
What's that? Antique patterns and redesigning the restaurant's decor! So this's what she needs!
Yeah, running a restaurant, the inside is just as important as the outside… A good impression at first glance is a must-have, just like the spirit of service of us Cruising Drakes!
There might be a little difference…
I saw that the Academy is holding a cultural relic exhibit lately! I'm heading over and the hand tracing all of them!
Oh, right! Pictures woud have a much clearer depiction… Curses! You're always first to come up with thes great ideas!
Or you could also take pictures.
You've helped me a ton again, these are our earnings from the workshop, take it as your as payment!
I'm off to the Academy's exhibit! I'm sure they'll let me in, right…?
No, no, no! I already have that part covered this time.
What are we poking our noses in this time?
Panghua's developing a new tea and needs Saxifrage as a primer to stimulate the aroma.
But this Saxifrage is no ordinary Saxifrage! Instead, it's the kind that has three buds in one, and growson the side of a cliff face.
On top of that, it's said to bloom only for a few days during the year… It must be picked while it's fresh!
I wanted to go pick them myself! But truth be told, our fully-automatic square-wheeled walker vehicle that we just developed had a bit of a breakdown…
A bit of a breakdown?
I confess… During our first run test, it smashed into a Sabyr Boar that came out of nowhere. It's completed busted!
You should leave the unsafe areas to me.
I hate to admit it, but the way how you said those words like a breeze… Is just too charming, absolutely charming!
Hmm? Its fragrance, color, and dew coated pedals… That's some fine Saxifrage you got there, perfect for developing a new kind of tea… How much are you willing to sell them to me?
That right? He hasn't given up, has he?
Tianhu asked me to give them to you.
You got me beat… I'm not supposed to take anything from him to be honest…
Why is he always trying to send you gifts?
Here's what happened. There's this one time, I happened to see a few customers and a group of… rather strangely dressed young fellows at each other's throats right outside the restaurant.
Well, it was a squabble, but those kids had smiles on their faces the whole time, I think they were promoting an idea or some kind.
I didn't get what they were promoting to be exact, but one thing's for sure, they didn't deserve to be laughed at like that!
I got all riled up, gave those customers a good yellin', and told 'em to never come back!
You did the right thing.
Way to let off some steam!
I've had this restaurant for so many years, at the very least I can tell which kind of customers are welcomed and which aren't.
Hahaha, it just got to me. Seeing bullies always annoys me!
It was later that I learned that those kids were promoting this Cruising Drake Workshop of theirs.
And the fella Tianhu, thought that I really bought into their idea of "machinery inventions", kept begging me to agree to use the restaurant as his "publicity front".
I have no problems with him personally, but you know, his request may cause trouble for the customers dining in the restaurant.
Who would've expected that he would keep on giving me things for all this time, and they happen to be stuff that I actually need, too. Now it's making me kinda embarrassed for saying no for so long…
I think that's enough chit-chat for today, I still have customers that need their orders taken. We'll chat again next time.
You hold on to these, now… Thank you, and Tianhu.
What's worrying you?
Rover… I've been sending gifts for so long, and there's still no change in the situation, but I just don't want to give up now.
Plus, with business in the restaurant getting better and better lately, there would be even less time for the boss lady to pay attention to me.
So for today… I'd have to ask you to go get wind of what Panhua needs again!
Ask about her preferred gift…
I don't really need anything for now. Thanks to you and Tianhu, I managed to improve the restaurant's interior, and also introduced a new tea.
Business have been booming lately… I really need to slow down a bit and ease up.
Take this box of Loong Beard Crisps and give them to Tianhu for me. If it wasn't for him, I'm afraid I couldn't have done all of this we see today…
And thank you, Rover. You offered a great deal of help as well.
Wow, that means sending all those gifts really paid off! It seems that if you act according to plan, you'll bound to get twice the results with half the effort.
Panhua wanted me to give them to you.
Actually, your persistence was more important.
Huh? You mean, with a sincere attitude and persistent effort, everything will fall into place. Is that right?
Not again… How dare you say something so wonderful. You're out-competing me in almost everything…
That's it, I'm going to ask her if she'll let me hold a "Cruising Drake Machinery Recycled Product Exhibit" in her restaurant. Three times a week will do.
You might be progressing a bit too fast…
Err? Am I? If you say so… Then I'll just start by posting an introduction of the Workshop in a corner nearby. That would be acceptable, right?
Good! It's decided then! Next time I'll talk with her about this idea!
With the Panhua's Kitchen as our front, the Cruising Drakes Workshop's services will soon be accepted by everyone in no time!
The gift I left at the restaurant's front door… She did take it, did she…?
Whoa! Rover, you appeared out of nowhere again! I didn't even feel you creeping up on me. Just who are you exactly?
I've been here for quite a while actually.
Oh, snap! I embarrassed myself in front you yet again!
But… since it's you, my destined opponent… Then there's no point in putting up my disguise.

I'm off to the Academy's exhibit! I'm sure they'll let me in, right…?
You're finally here, Rover.
*Sigh… Our boss, he, uh…
Our boss' gone more and more gloomy lately. Sure it makes him seem more mature and successful…
Thanks a lot, Rover! I'll bring it to the boss right away.
And I'll get him to work on his apology lines a bit. Gotta move quick, this kind of Juncus aren't easy to come by.
Rover, you're the only person I could think of that can take care of this.
Thanks again, Rover. Now, I need to rethink these lines, then I'm off to give this apology speech with your present and the boss.
Exactly. We're still not sure if the boss really gave an apology or not that other day.
The boss has gone into that "deep inner world" of his again, and tucked himself alone in the corner…
Did something happen to him?
But with all the moaning going on, to be honest… it's getting a bit on our nerves.
So, we're asking you to help us out, to get some sunshine back into him.
Well a psychiatrist is nowhere handier than the almighty Rover!
Ahem. Back to the topic. We're not asking you do psychiatry on the boss. We're asking you take care the root of the cause.
Wouldn't a psychiatrist be a better candidate for this…
What's really bothering him is that, the residents of Tiancheng haven't been too nice to us lately.

With our boss being like this, what would become of us Cruising Drakes in Tiancheng. So what we'd like you to do is help us get hold of some small presents to please the citizens, without the need to pay for them of course.
I've heard Juncus are pretty popular with the city these days. Almighty Rover, can you go help us find a more special kind of Juncus for us?
How special?
Hmm… Juncus usually bloom during the night. If you could find one that blooms during the day, that would be special enough.
As long as it's in a shady environment, like the depths of the cave or something, it should still be able to bloom during the day, right?
Rover, you're back.

You wouldn't believe what happened while you were away getting that present. Sanyuan blocked off a delivery truck from coming in for making a speech at the crossroad, and ticked off quite a group of people because of it.
The present, did you get it?
I have it right here.
Let me see it!
That'll be all for today. See you next time, Rover.
What is it this time?
He pulled a couple of all-nighters a few days back, we thought something was wrong with the String Carrier, and were worried sick.
Little did we know, he's having issues with the residents again.
Well… The boss did say he went and gave an apology. But from what we can see from the people's attitude towards us Drakes, it probably didn't do much.
Did he not apologize last time?
Could it be we didn't give the right present? Rover, help us prepare a new one.
I heard the researcher Qidui offended last time is collecting Tacecrux of TDs. How about you go get one of those?
Leave it to me.
Did you find the present, Rover. Before that, take a look at these lines from the apology letter the boss wrote.
"We, the Cruising Drakes, although yet small, through our self-developed state of the art "String Carrier", will have our name known worldwide soon enough. Thus, I hope you all can…"
Umm… Was that a yawn I just saw from you? I need to change it up more it seems…
Let's take a loot at what you brought back.
The two of you?
It's for the boss' well-being, for our peace and quiet, and for a better future of the Cruising Drakes…
Wait, that's a great line. I'll add it into the letter later.
Ahem. In any case, the apology must be put into place this time, no matter what!
Rover, you have to listen to me! This really pissed me off!
It's been so long until we finally got a few orders, and we worked so hard to make the requested goods.
We were thinking about sending them out with Squeaky Express, but to our surprise we were rejected!
Why did they reject you?
Cough, cough. We had some history before, but they were only minor displeasure!
Really, we really were just promoting our String Carrier to them.
So we used Yise's slogans, which said that one is bound to be given up by the era if the equipment isn't updated. That wasn't very problematic, was it?
Hmm...
We had to work together to be the top, right?
However, they not only failed to appreciate us, but even refused to do business with us.

I sensed an anomalous disturbance in the chaotic airflow.

Over there.
Just a few more steps and we'll be out of the Gorges of Spirits.
I gotta tell ya, you're in for some big trouble.
This is weird. Something's definitely not right here!
Since when did these MOs get so frantic?
We need to hurry. Yangyang... She needs treatment urgently.
Bailian's an expert on investigating stuff! If you're holding out on something, it's best that you talk sooner than later! Or else, when she finds something is off... Hmph!
Keepin' it tight, huh? Fine. You'd better not be lying. I'm not too kind to liars!
There it comes! That's a Tacet Discord!
The glider module was installed successfully. I also uploaded the coordinates of our destination to your Terminal.
Check if there are any problems. If not, then let us ride the flowing stream.
Keep going that way, and we'll get out of the gorge.
Tiancheng is just up ahead. Quick, we're almost there.
Ugh! We don't have time for this…
Yangyang's in bad shape!
Continuous earthquakes, along with the appearance of high rank TDs… It's already surpassed the danger levels we had initially evaluated.
I've proposed a rendezvous with the rest of my team on the outside. We should move quickly.
Nice moves you got back there! I don't think I've seen you before. Where'd you come from? Let's go a few rounds!

Apologies, but I believe now isn't a good time for sparring.
With all due respect.
May I know your name? Why are you with Yangyang?
Also, do you have anything to do with the anomalous disturbances?
No, Bailian. You've taken it the wrong way. I was in the Gorges of Spirits and met…
Rover.

Tsk, we don't have time for this.

It's called a "Choral Beacon". The Beacon can detect and record fluctuations within its surroundings. Setting itself as a guide for travelers.
Practice is better than words. Why don't you give it a try?

Did you forget what Bailian asked you to do?

We are part of the same team conducting a survey mission. The previous anomalous disturbances and earthquake have forced us to be separated.
As for the disturbances... I assume it's caused by the accumulation of Wutherons. The space below the gorge is narrow with sides mostly surrounded by sheer rock.
That's a Roseshroom, a kind of Mutant Organism. It's hostile but rooted to the ground.
I'm Yang Yang, member of the Midnight Rangers
Hmmm... Never heard of the Midnight Rangers... Maybe you're not from Huanglong
Anyway, let's get to safety first
I believe one day, we will have it completed.
Over there... That statue was originally intended for celebrations and commemoration. It's a pity we have to leave it unfinished due to frequent TD attacks.

No.

Nothing, professional habits flashing back.
Just checking your current physical status.
Though not so obvious, your muscular strength and pupillary response are lower than average level.
Am I unwell somehow?
Let me feel your pulse, hmm, abrupt pulse...
As expected, your frequency is turbulent and abrupt. It is possible that you fail to suppress the power and overclock.

In light of the fact that all these unhealthy indications came only after you absorbed the Threnodians' powers.... Yangyang gave the alert in time, and I share the opinion that you should suspend absorbing them.
I can keep on.
I respect your will, and to be honest I might be more impatient than you are. But listen, the result of a resonator's overclocking could be disastrous. You... do know what they are like, don't you?
Memory loss... fine.
Indeed, resonators have strong Forte, but if they are exposed to Wutherium inappropriately, or use their power too much, it is likely to court a phenomenon we call "overclock".

You will lose your senses and consciousness in a very short course of time, then you are lost in madness or explode, and finally, you are reduced to only a few pieces of information traces, made up of almost pure energy.
Shriek Sphere?
One who devour monsters must stay constantly alert of being devoured by monsters. Don't get into a more thorough loss just because of an urgent cause.
I will take note of that.
Sorry, essentially this is my fault.
Worrying about things like this, I reached out to Murtefi as soon as you set off for a solution. It turns out in a bit of haste at that stage, though.
Yes, the converter that can channel power out from human body.
As for your meeting with the Hierarch, don't worry.
I have sent the request to her. I will contact you at once when the response comes.
Rover, do you feel better?
You just suddenly fell to the ground and didn't move... I, I thought...
I must take to the Academy, now! As long as the power of Threnodians are taken out, your frequency will return stable. And physically... you will become immediately better!
What, what are you talking about... How can that be trouble.
Sorry I'm taking you into another trouble.
Calm down. It's not that bad.
I don't know what kind of past you have, maybe... you are long familiar with keeping to yourself and not relying on anyone. But from now on, you won't be fighting alone again.
Don't forget that I was part of the operation too, I am your partner! Isn't it all too natural to be solving problems together?
No no no, you always say that, every one of you.
Commander Jiyan just told us how terrible overclocking could be. You have to have the Threnodian power taken out sooner.
Besides, the one we are about to meet... is that Chief Researcher...
Don't worry, I'll be with you. It will be OK with me present.
The situation I have been worrying about... has come true? Can I see your hand?
Commander, are you talking about that thing the Chief Researcher mentioned we contacted...
Anyway, why don't you find Murtefi at the Academy. He should have some methods to relieve your symptoms.
Ooh, see that fish over there, it's not even giving a flinch with all this bell ringing.
It is requested that you maintain calmed footsteps during the sound of bell.
Forgive me, I'm new here and don't know my way around yet...
Continue this along path forward and you will reach the Knell Square. You should see it for yourself.
Be gentle with your footsteps. And keep it down.
It is my duty and honor to stand guard for my fallen comrades today.
Probably just like an old-timer such as myself, after hearing it for so many times, gotten used to it by now.
As soldiers of Huanglong, what's there to gather about and get all teary-eyed for. Get your acts together.
Battle's not over yet, the folks' are counting on us.
What is it? I'm in the middle of something.
Can you tell me where the bell's sounding from?
You're heading there? You don't seem to be from around here.
Well, you should go after her then. Once the ceremony begins, the Rangers' Commander will announce the names of the fallen...
Did you notice it as well, Rover?
It's extended all the way to the other side of the river... Don't worry, Rover, we won't have to swim across. Let's activate the "Grapple Cord" module, the one we installed earlier.
The Wutheron Ripples in the air feels as though ocean waves in the night, constantly changing their direction of flow. I've never seen anything like this. Chixia and the others…
The sense of the stream matches the scanner's bearings, we must hurry!
We did it! Let's go inside quick!
A friend of mine ran towards it as soon as she heard the bell rang.
Oh, the agony, every time, I just can't bear it. But... *Sigh*...
