Are you coming, or not? Hop to it!
Err... It's that way, Knell Square.
Hello again, Rover. Now then, what do you have in mind? I'll try to answer your questions with the best of my knowledge.
Hmm... Where should I start... Well right now, we're standing on the land of Huanglong.
About Huanglong...
About Tacet Discords (TDs)...
About the current date and time...
About Resonators...
[Mission]Nothing else, it was this terminal.

As one of the greatest nations in the world of today, the people of Huanglong takes great pride in the nation's preservation of countless historical and cultural relics. Even when faced with devastating catastrophes and prolonged warfare, the continuity of civilization never ceased.
In the decades after the war, we've not only rebuilt the war-torn city of Tiancheng, but also achieved the rebirth of Huanglong to her former glory through Tacetite energy industries.

Towards the northern part of Tiancheng there's a large industrial complex, and on the southern coast is a seaport used for conducting ocean trades with other nations. All of which are the essence of endeavor of many generations.
You're very familiar with combat, yet you don't know anything about your adversaries?
Or, what you mean is, the monsters you've encountered before are similar but different in many ways, they might be named differently for you as well.
I agree, the TDs' biggest attribute is the speed of which they evolve and adapt, how often new forms appear. One cannot rely too much on past experiences when dealing with them.
Perhaps... They are unaware of their actions, only mindlessly searching for the vibration's origin, to devour and to destroy.
Surely you haven't forgotten about this, have you? Or rather...
The current year is the New Era 160. Fifty years has passed since the end of the "Threnodian War", a war between the human alliance and the army of Tacet Discords.
No matter what we may face, we shall protect our homeland till the end. A goal not only I, but also the Rangers, the Mornguards, and the people of Huanglong all share.
Since the Lament, it became known to humanity for first time, that every entity in this world has their own unique "frequency". It is the origin of existence, as well as the core of beginning.
As for individuals like us, being able to resonate with "frequencies" of all kinds, we acquired special abilities, hence given the name "Resonator".
The common belief is that this was a result of genetic mutation of humans caused by Wutherons, seen as a form of evolution. Some also consider this to be the process of an "awakening".
I've gone too far. So, to identify a Resonator is rather simple, as a result of a resonance, their body will bear a marking in the shape of a star.
You have a marking as well, correct? That's why I immediately knew you were one of us when we first met at the bottom of the valley.
Just as I suspected, the Tacet Field has been fully formed! Chixia and the unit must be nearby.
Why go through the hassle of registering at the C.C.C., all we have to do is get you verified at the Ministry... I don't know what Taoqi's thinking…
What purpose? We're keeping secrets now I guess...
Here we are. Make it snappy, once you're done we can go check on Yangyang.
I couldn't get hold of anyone at the infirmary last night. Something feels off.
Huh? You're asking me...? Oh right, you've probably forgotten it all.

I guess... Just put your Terminal onto it and the Choral Network will start its recording. Umm, with a little this and a little that, you get in, and get access to all kinds of features... There! Easy!
Hey! I only do escort duty in the Ministry. I don't do tech!
She probably has her own purpose in mind.
How does this work?
I'm more confused now than when we started.
Thank you, your instructions were very clear.
Hmph. So much for giving you advice... Just go through your Terminal's records, and get your memories back so we can get this over with.
That's for sure! I work for the Ministry!
Well, go on, take a look at your Terminal's records, see if you can remember anything!
Pleasure to meet you, Rover. I am Jiyan, the Commander of the Huanglong Midnight Rangers Regiment.
There's been a no shortage of your stories within the city. The city of Tiancheng welcomes all walks of life, although...
I can't help to ponder upon the thought of whether our guest from afar can treat us with sincerity.
I don't quite follow, Commander.
However, my question remains unanswered.
I will not fail your trust.
Chixia! Unit 5!
All personnel, whether Ranger, Mornguard, or Ministry staff, should have their Terminals on them at all times, unless if under special circumstances. How...
Got it! The abnormality... It's caused by a Tacet Field resurgence at the Qi'chi village!
What about us... There's too many TDs. Now we're never going to make it home...
Is anyone gonna save us... I, I don't want to die here...
Yangyang, are you alright?
Sorry I had you worried there again. Now's not the time to feel sad.
Our comrades are still waiting for assistance. They must be... Still holding on!
Judging from this recording, they've decided to split into two teams to further investigate the surroundings after the beacon maintenance. It was by then... They encountered a Tacet Field resurgence.
And the location is...
Qi'chi Village, a long abandoned village! That's where we're heading!
There's too much interference, I can't get an accurate reading of their location... However, the stream is sensing an even stronger disturbance!
If they're really here... Then we don't have much time to spare!
Please, Rover. We must bring them home safely!
Your request is very much anticipated.
When I first laid eyes on your Terminal, I envisioned of such a conversation between the two of us.
So this is why... It felt so familiar all along?
Sui'guang is a secrecy of our nation. An entity not easily granted to be seen.
If our noble guest should have any inquiries, I'll can have them passed on to Lady Loong on your behalf.
However, I cannot vouch for any replies or audiences.
Are the markings really the same?
You knew from the start, but chose not to say a word.
Thank you. A response from the Commander is more than enough.
Wait a minute, Rover. There must be some other way, or maybe... There are clues which we may have missed...
Before arriving in Tiancheng, you've encountered a high level TD.

The Academy conducted a comparison of the Wutheron vibrational frequencies during your engagement. Their reports indicate a 100% match in frequencies with the Threnodian, Crownless. The one which made a previous appearance in the past.
The Crownless? But, but it... It was defeated years ago...
According to the Academy's analysis, the one you've fought is its copy.
Which now means that, the resurrection of the Crownless no longer remains a matter of speculations, rather a crisis all of Huanglong shall face in the not too distant future.
Rover, are you aware of how we defeated the Crownless in the past?

Threnodians are beings possessing powers far surpassing that of any TD. To be honest, Huanglong's current military capabilities... Do require further improvements.
further improvements.
I believe I understand the Commander's concerns.
But thank the heavens now that you're here.
On a side note, you may have not heard of your little incident with the Calculus Center, I presume?
After your departure from Tiancheng, the Ministry and the Academy sent staffs to perform a check on the C.C.C. Which they were lead to a few burnt circuits inside.
I was unable to register.
I inquired Taoqi and Bailian about this, and their conclusion was... Rather than your Terminal, you yourself may be the root of the cause.
You assimilated the copy's powers, and was able to convert it as your own.

Allow me to finish. Recently, there has been a rise in activities of MOs and High-level Devourers within Huanlong's borders. From their bodies, we also detected frequencies similar to that of the Crownless.
Does this have anything to do with my request?
It is likely that these creatures have absorbed powers from the Crownless, fusing it inside their core organ, which we refer to it as the "Tacecrux".
I'd like to make a request, that you assist us in defeating such monsters, collect their part of the Crownless' powers, and pass them on to me.
I am aware of this. Yes.

But frankly speaking, I admit I don't have much to put on the table in terms of seeking your cooperation, yet the amount of time left for Huanglong isn't sufficient either. Thankfully, you have something to ask of Huanglong as well.
I shall give you my word, regardless of your reply, that I'll have your request personally delivered to Lady Loong.
I hope that you can accept Huanglong's sincerity.
As Commander of the Midnight Rangers, on behalf of every soldier, living and fallen, I am grateful for your assistance during this critical time, Rover.
Your "request" may be too much to ask.
I'm willing to assist, but what can I get in return?
Co-Commander! Permission to accompany Rover in completing this assignment, sir!
I fear that it will be too high of a risk for Rover to face TDs and MOs with Threnodian powers all alone.
This time, I will always be at your side.
The following information concerns Threnodians' capabilities and the safety of Huanglong. Let us move to a more private area to further discuss, shall we?
What's wrong? Too much to read?
What do you mean it's all blank? Didn't it activate already?
You sure there's nothing?

In this day and age, a Resonator can't go anywhere without being connected to the Choral Network. Even if you're not from Huanglong, you at least should've used a connection from somewhere else before…
I see now, there's only one explanation to this... Your Terminal is busted.
Pfft, you wish! If something went wrong with the system we'll all be living in chaos by now.
The system is the very foundation of the livelihood for every Resonator, no wait, for Tiancheng, no, for the entirety of Huanglong!
How should I know where your Terminals from, never seen a model like this before.
But didn't it fail to absorb that big guy from earlier? Maybe it was already broken by then?
Things never been easy since we met you, now you can't even get registered right…
Umm, it's all blank.
Are you sure... There's nothing wrong with the system?
Could it be you're really familiar with my... Terminal?
The Choral Beacon up north is acting up, I need to go escort a couple of engineers to give it a look.
It's outta my control. They say an abnormal energy interference put the beacon out of service, and it's affecting travel in that entire area. Needs to be fixed ASAP.
Huh, why am I telling you all this... You sure love to stick your nose in things.
Now, Chixa, Rover is just concerned about you.
Hmph, everyone in this world must've all got a heart of gold to you, I guess?
That being said... Make, make sure you look after Yangyang for me, ya hear me?
You're leaving... Right after the ceremony?
She's just recovered and needs plenty of rest, so don't let her go rushing off to work.
She might usually be gentle and all, but wait till you see when she's stubborn as a Limox.
Double check yourselves. Are the routes correct? And your Terminals, communications, logistics, demolitions, are they functioning?
Err, uhm… This should be fine, right?
That's Commander Jiyan, the Rangers' senior officer.
It seems he would like a word with you.
Your Terminal? Is something wrong with it?
Sounds like, it might have an issue with data transfers or a connection problem... But it showed no problems, not to mention very smooth, when loading in the Paraglider Module previously.
Aside from the Paraglider, it's still lacking in other basic exploration modules... Let me see if I can share the installations with you.
Odd, they've all been successfully installed... In this case, there shouldn't be any problems with your Terminal.
Your Terminal is rather unusual. Perhaps it's just incompatible with Huanglong's Choral Network? Fortunately it functions normally most of the time.
These markings on the exterior, it's like I've seen them from somewhere, it gives off a familiar, even reassuring feeling...
TDs, they're everywhere... It's not normal! Somebody help us!
Rangers copy all, assistance will be dispatched immediately. What is your current location?
We're at... No, please no! Chixia!
The Calculus Center wasn't able to get a reading of its data.
Can you help me check what's wrong with it?
It failed to show anything at the Center earlier.
Hello? Can you hear me? The coordinates' transmission has been cut off!
Can anyone hear me! Please respond!
Communications failure, accompanied by abnormal energy interference... It's just like when that horrifying TD appeared... Please excuse me, Rover, I must leave at once!
You're a guest of Tiancheng, I'd much rather you...
This is exactly why I don't want to...
But from the look of your eyes, I reckon you wouldn't stay here and wait either way.
A friend... Well, of course!
Taoqi has just provided me with the coordinates to Unit 5's location of operation. It's the beacon north of the plateau. Chixa and the unit must be there.
I'm coming with you.
Chixia trusted me to look after you, didn't she?
Chixia is my friend as well.
We're in the location now, I tried sending out communication signal, but got no responds.
The flow here is chaotic, and I cannot sense the presents of Chixia's party.
We should scan nearby area.
The source of the interference is just up ahead. Chixia... I hope we're not too late...
The river is a bit wide, be careful.
Let's see, there should be some around here... There! Over there, that should be a good grapple point we can use to swing over.
Making use of the terrain can save you plenty of time.
"Blake Bearer". An information broker that would show up in Tiancheng from time to time.
You can keep silent if you don't wish disclose anything. But they're usually truthful to their words.
The group he mentioned, it must be Chixia and the Unit.
These fallen rocks has the cave completely sealed tight, there's also numerous traces of combat surrounding it. If this is where they sent the distress call...
Chixia, everyone... Hang in there. Rover and I will surely...
They're most likely trapped inside!
Phew, I almost thought we were goners... Lucky for us, you came in time. Thank you, thank the heavens for your rescue.
Chixia... I, if it wasn't for us, you wouldn't have had such a hard time.
Ahem, don't worry about it! Just like I told ya, I will bring everyone home in one piece!
Indeed. In the midst of hardship, we are the consolation of one another.
Are you hurt?
Ha, who do you think I am? A couple extra of those monsters is no match for this girl!
On the other hand, these TDs are much stronger than the ones before, could it be... It has something to do with the abnormal interferences?
Now, now. Then I take that it wouldn't hurt for the vibrant girl of ours to take a moment of rest, would it?
We managed to accomplish our original assignment by repairing the malfunctioned beacon. However, the unexpected events that occurred must be reported to Acting Chief Officer Taoqi in a timely manner.
Well, ahem, I guess I owe you one this time!
I, umm... I was a teeny bit harsh on you before!
So from today onward, I'll have you covered! You get into any trouble in Tiancheng, Chixia's got your back!
Got it.
I knew Rover would receive everyone's approval.
Irrelevant of your memories, nor your identity. What matters most is yourself.
You have so much faith in me?
Does that mean, I can trust you as well, Yangyang?
The stream never tell lies. I have trust in you.
Without a doubt!
Do you know anything about "Sui'guang"?
You must be referring to the Divinity. A name known to everyone in Huanglong. Our guardian, our savior.
Fifty years ago, we owe our victory against the Threnodian, Crownless, to its aid in battle.
But to be honest, my knowledge of Sui'guang is rather limited...
Many mysteries still surrounds Sui'guang, most of the related information is considered to be confidential. Us commoners don't really know much about it.
Why the sudden interest?
What if I were to say I wish to meet it in person?
If it is of great importance to you, then I shall do my best to help.
Hmm... We can start by consulting Commander Jiyan at the Regiment Building. He is surely to know more about Sui'guang than I do.
The sound mourning bells. For the warriors fighting for mankind until their final moments!
2nd Company, Vanguard Battalion, Huanglong Midnight Rangers Regiment. Qiuyang, Chuqi...
Yangyi...
1st Company, Support Battalion, Huanglong Midnight Rangers Regiment. Hui'jun, Zhao...
We're here, the residential area of Tiancheng.
Well, now... If it isn't our Ms. Xiaofang, you're looking chipper today aren't you.
Umm... That's Uncle Chen Pi, a renowned antique collector and merchant. Come, let's go say hi!
Over there is the Academy's synthesizer, aka the Synthesis Printer.
Finally, a message from Taoqi, and... It's not about Yangyang. She's reminding me to take you to the C.C.C. and get you registered.
If there's nothing else to do, you should get some early rest today. We've been wandering around for so long, I take that you've familiarized yourself of the place enough by now.
Meet me at the Calculus Center first thing in the morning tomorrow, alright?
Oh? It's nothing, really, I'm perfectly fine, see? I presume what happened back there... Must've given you quite a startle.
How are you feeling...?
No need to worry too much, the wounds weren't nearly as bad as it looked.
It's just that my frequencies needed to be stabilized in time, as my body absorbed large amounts Wutherons. That's what made it seem urgent.
Chixia has told me everything, how you managed to escort me back to Tiancheng all this way. Because of you, I am safe and sound able to stand here once again. Thank you, Rover.
Identification complete. It's Chixia's Terminal!
If you can hear me, please respond! Are you in here?
A... Terminal?
... I promise.
Correct. Low temperature mist lurks inside the cave, and Tacetite abundance there is low as well. We had it left unattended as it didn't cause any troubles up until recently.
But mist began to flow out of the cave, along with some... strange phenomenons.
It may have something to do with that existence inside. I've notified the Academy to have a team analyze the danger levels.
We can go as far as to say that we cannot confirm whether if it's a life form or not.
Is the target of an unknown life form?
The spectrograms relayed back to us showed patterns unlike anything we've ever seen before.
What do you say? Do you still wish to work with us after listening to all this information, Rover?
Forgive me, I should have never doubted a warrior's sincerity.
You could've left us with all the danger ahead. Please, do not hesitate to ask for our help, Midnight Rangers are in your debt.
I may have been undervalued.
Rover, Yangyang. May victory prevail the lasting night.

After receiving Jiyan's approval, you formally settle in the city of Tiancheng. After a night's rest, your exhaustion from battle is relieved, but many neglected questions spring up in your mind... You reach out to Yangyang, hoping she will help you find the answers.
Huh? Rover? It's nothing... I just didn't expect to receive a contact from you that's all.

No mean to brag, but ease of life in Tiancheng is known far and wide! Food, clothing, housing etc., as long as it's not something as ridiculous as acquiring a live TD, you can pretty much get anything you need.
I say, this friend of yours truly bears an unfamiliar face. For a brief moment, even I couldn't distinguish the nation of origin for your dressing style. I wonder where our noble guest is from?
I don't know either.
I've lost part of my memory.
With the right amount of materials and the correct formula, you can make things like medicine, equipments, gears etc., you name it.
What's the trick behind it, you ask? Umm, you'd be better off asking an Academy staff…
Whatever you want to make, just press a few buttons, give it a few taps. Follow the operations manual and you're all set.
Everything I've encountered so far, has left me very confused.
Judging by how you're putting it, this doesn't seem to be something we can resolve in just a few words.
What's the matter? Or rather, you want to have a chat with me?
I understand how you feel, your memories are not fully recovered, and now you're in a place where you've never been before.
Just like how we feel you're filled with mysteries. To you, this world before you is also completely unfamiliar to you.
How about... I come pay you a visit, let's meet in the residential area. Anything you want to learn about, you can ask me. It's better when explained face to face.
The Synthesis Printer. Let science do the magic!
Well, if you want to get yourself familiarized, let's start from the residential area.
The Exiles! Could it be... They're the ones behind the interference?
Whaddya think? Uncle Chen Pi's a fun guy, right? When we're off duty, Yangyang and I often come chat with him. Yangyang calls him the "Walking Encyclopedia".
Never mind, no point in worrying, I still have a job to finish.
Don't just stand there, come on!
Well, well. If it isn't our noble city dwellers? Rangers, might I add. But... How come there's only two of you?
Don't blame us for bumpin' in!
Fellas, let's show them what we've got! It's time we teach them a thing or two!
Judging by how they're putting it, it doesn't seem like they've met anyone else from Huanglong.
Plus... The interference shows no sign of stopping, it's even getting worse by the minute!
I can't believe Yangyang haven't recovered yet after so long. The Wutheron interference must be really bad this time it looks like!
The amount of times I've told her not to overwork herself, she's always... What if, what if she breached her Criticality...
Don't be late! After we get you registered I'm going to go check on Yangyang!
I'll come with you.
Speaking of Yangyang... I wonder how she's doing, haven't heard a word from Taoqi yet. I, I just...
Come on, after we're through here I'll take you to some other places. The quicker we're done the better.

As for their origins, they were first sighted in the aftermath of the catastrophe known as the "Lament". They're known to be extremely sensitive towards Wuthering Field's oscillation, particularly... Showing some form of natural desire towards "sound".
They are drawn towards humans, they mimic our speech, yet they will not hesitate to slaughter us on sight.
Although large scale wars has become a scarcity these days, but as you can see, the threats of which TDs pose onto humans has not yet been fully eliminated.
In between these fifty years, there were numerous instances of "TD Waves" breaking out across Huanglong.
Swarms of TDs spontaneously emerged from nowhere, irritating and mixing MOs into their packs wherever they go. Like a thundering landslide, devastating everything in its path.
Yet, to me, regardless of how it is defined, we are all an outcome of the Lament nonetheless... A reality that will never change.
We haven't heard of the worst yet, at least for now.
It's almost time for the meetup with Chixia, I should get going.
Uncle Chen Pi! Not when there's someone around! Just... Only use that name when it's just the two of us, pretty pleeeease?
I see, I see. It's "Chixia", amiright?
No need to rush. You're still young, it will take you a considerable amount of time before you can discover who you truly are and where you may end up.
Hmph, I knew you were gonna say that! But... For someone as wise as Uncle Chen Pi, I didn't expect you to not able to tell either.
Only through the sedimentation of time, does meaning of entities ensue. The same applies to antiques as well.

I digress. Chixia must've already introduced me, I am an antique merchant. If you happen to come across any old and interesting trinkets in the future, do stop by any time, I'm willing to pay high price.
I've come to the conclusion that the area was deliberately sabotaged.
Someone wishes to keep your past a secret.
Although we don't have further ways to prove what Rover remembers. But it was thanks to the Rover that we were able to make it out alive nonetheless.
Most importantly... Rover frequency and the trails don't match.
For the safety of Huanglong, it's better that we be more cautious.
What I meant to say is, you have no ways of making assurances, am I correct?
No one can...
No one can guarantee "assurances" won't change.
Yet there is no deception in the face between life and death. I believe in the guidance of the stream, and I believe in you. Therefore…
Should the Rover bring harm to Huanglong in any way, as the one who awakened Rover, I'm willing to bear all the consequences.
They've made themselves quite clear.
The Rangers' duties are to protect Huanglong, receiving guests is a rarity to us. Please pardon our lack of hospitality.
You likely require some accommodations, I suggest you stay in Tiancheng for the time being.
I investigated the valley which Rover claimed to have fell into. It's a complete mess, there's also energy trails of unknown origin.
Alrighty, let's go then!
Safe travels.
The Infernal Rider of Forsaken Abundance, Feilian Beringal of Dim Forest, Mourning Aix of Whining Aix's Mire, and another unknown existence down in the bottom of Hukou.

Threnodians are of no novelty to the Midnight Rangers. According to the most recent data collected by the Choral Network, we have identified targets that acquired Crownless' powers, along with a rough estimate of their locations.
Now, continuing where we left off.
Bottom of Hukou... Do you mean the cavern below the mines currently restricted to access?
As the ceremony concludes, people began to leave the square. Chixia received a message in her Terminal, and wore a serious expression after reading it. She says goodbye to me and Yangyang.
These must be the traces left by Chixia and the others. The Blake Bearer was right, they went eastwards.
I remember there's a beacon not far from there that requires repairing… We should go give a check.
As for the other 3, some of them were defeated before yet they returned. And some of them are the enemies yet defeated. I will tell you more in the right time.
Considering it bears unpredictable dangers, I hope you and Yangyang head to Hukou first, and complete absorbing of powers there.
Just keeps getting better and better.
Welp, no need to sweat it! Uncle Chen Pi used to say… Luck would always favor the ones in need. It'll come to you soon enough!
We meet again, {PlayerName}.
As we have come to a consensus, I shall share with your more of our knowledge.
Indeed. With Yangyang as company, I would feel more assured as well
And right now, our friend is waiting for us!
Rover, was everything all right. I heard there was another explosion, and I can sense the streams become even more disturbed...
Going forward... Hm? You already reached an agreement with the Hierarch? Great, it is really calming to know the plan is progressing.
Then I think I should quicken my pace a little. Let's meet in front of the choral calculus center.
Don't keep in your mind what they just said. I think... they didn't mean to doubt you.
The TD waves three years ago took so much. Family, friends, everything we cherish, just disappeared in a flash.
I mean really, many people saw that. Just before the explosion, that, that Rover who came from outside happened to be there!
You mean... that noise from the Hierarch's residence has something to do with Rover?

That's not what I said! But you see, the Tacet Field resurging at Qichi Village, the Midnight Rangers frequently going out, and even the number of Mornguards patrolling in town being several times it was...
These all happened after Rover came. How can all those be a coincidence. I just can't help wondering.
And... I heard that Rover had a terminal that's different from everyone else's. Even Chen Pi hasn't seen it. It seems the Rangers have had Rover watched. I think they know something.
Looks like you've made yourself famous while I'm not around!
Miss Chixia, do you know... Rover? Is Rover so famous?
This "Rover" is a great great hero who can beat a HUGE TD and defend Tiancheng quietly! Impressive, isn't it?
Oh...! So Rover is not a villain, but a hero?
Impressive, impressive...
Fine. The tech team is waiting for me to go on a quest. The Choral Beacons to the north of Tiancheng are breaking down so frequently these days. I don't know what's going on with them.
I was going to have another duel with you, but there's no time obviously. Next time we'll find a chance and I'll show you my new tricks!
Yeah! We will not!
That is the spirit of our favorite hero and her sidekick. Take care and don't push yourself too hard.
Little Nine also has to work hard! For our next duel, we will definitely lose to Rover!
Deal.
I'll look forward.
The Threnodian powers inside of you pass through your palms then to the device... They were conducted out.
Though it's not the first time seeing you like this... I was still shocked.
I've grown used to it.
You always worry too much.
Seeing a companion fall before my eyes, this kind of thing... I can't get used, and I won't get used.
Listen to me this time: let's hurry back to the Academy and get the rest Threnodian power channelled out.
I don't think it is too much worry. If it takes everyone back safe and sound, I don't mind worrying more.
Before the rest of Threnodian power leaves your body, can I worry just a bit longer?
Humph, I thought it was only typical of him to ask for things to be done in three days. Didn't expect you to be so efficient.
A familiar voice came. When you turn back, Chixia walked close lively and got into the crowd to your side.
As the conversation paused, Kangjiu found that Yangyang and you were walking towards him. He rushed close and started asking.
Yangyang! You came at right the moment! A loud noise just went across from the Hierarch's residence, and we saw Mornguards being dispatched. What's the matter exactly?
Oh and by the way, that Rover that came from outside the city. We heard you Rangers sent someone to watch overRover. Do you think Rover has something to do with all these?...
Hey, wait. The one at your side looks unfamiliar. And the terminal of Rover... looks special?
This is Rover from outside the city. Lately it has been Rover who went on missions with our people and took down Overlord Class TDs.
As for the noise, it was an explosion at the industrial Area. Rest assured though, it will be taken care of by our peers at the Midnight Rangers. And the reason of the explosion...
With the assistance of Rover, the investigation should soon find something.
Hey, we saw again, Rover! Why, everyone's here, is this some welcoming ceremony?
Even Little Nine doesn't know yet? I thought the word had been well circulated!
So the rumors are really not credible.
Then, shall we bring that rumor to an end? You started guessing before seeing the facts. That wasn't a good thing to do.
What rumor? Why are there so many rumors in one city?
People keep inspecting those around and about Tiancheng nervously, precisely because they are afraid the peaceful days we have now might be broken again.
When they become more familiar with you, they will understand how reliable you are as a companion.
Let's begin. Channel the two powers out of your body, and we will call it a day for both of us.
All right. Words of gratitude shouldn't come from my lips, though it is for sure that your cooperation has been a relief of my workload to some degree.
The commander asked me to let you know that, you could use some good rest after all the powers are settled. He will reach out to you later.
And of course, thank you for the trust and help.
Sanhua, I've never seen her so emotional... She is a few years younger than the Hierarch, and yet she always treats her like a young daughter.
She's the Hierarch's Guard, and always cares for her with all her heart. It's part of her duty.
Hmm... somebody just comes and goes so easily at the Hierarch residence, what if they should do things even more extraordinary...
Sanhua, maybe she thought of some unacceptable consequences, so she resisted so much.
We have two targets left. Yangyang should let you know already.
Both sound tough.
Hm. Feilian Beringal at Dim Forest and Mourning Aix at Whining Aix's Mire.
As of now we don't have means to approach Mourning Aix, though for Feilian Beringal...
More than ten years ago, we paid a huge price to have it locked in the deep of the forest with a special device.
We will be able to approach it and retrieve the Threnodian power as long as we undo the lock. Though it might be risky, we still have a better chance than dealing with Mourning Aix.
You can go to Bailian for the details of the device. A proud work of the Academy.
Understood.
Rover, only few know our plan of retrieving the Threnodian powers. Please forgive me for the rumors arisen from misunderstandings, or any other instances where we are not courteous enough.
This battle will soon end. Let's celebrate by then.
Phew... this finally ends. How do you feel? Any strange feeling?
The Chief Researcher has just sent a message that the Converter has been reset. Whenever you're ready, we can go to see him any time.
Maybe so. But anyway, the Threnodians are the most immediate crisis. The fight has begun, and it won't stop.
No Shriek Sphere for the process, please go to the location where the Shriek Sphere first appeared.
Awu has ordered the Mornguards to strengthen security within the city. The intruder shouldn't have gone far, we should track him down in separate directions.
He is a Resonator, using your scanner perhaps can capture some of his remaining Ripples.
How is your investigation? Yes, likewise, I've lost track of the Ripples on my end as well.
If you're referring to safety helmets, I mean, it's the industrial area, there's plenty of people wearing one around here. As for someone with a cloak... Haven't seen one.
Anything unusual... Perhaps?
Unusual? We have strict standards for every procedure in the Tacetite factory, there's no way we can run into problems.
You see that right there? That giant contraption is called a Refinery Tower, it's loaded with all kinds of advanced technology inside.
I don't want to show off or anything, but Huanglong is way ahead in the Tacetite energy industry among the Six Nations!
I... Wasn't asking about Tacetite.
It's fascinating how such industrialized facilities can be built.
Well, why didn't you say so! We workers put all our hearts and soul in these facilities you know.
Of course, it was quite some work putting everything together back in the day. But that's how us people of Huanglong are, we've never been afraid of hardship.
Oh, my shift's almost over. And for anything unusual or whatever you mentioned, try asking the Mornguards.
I've been informed by my superiors, if you run into any troubles in Tiancheng, you can come to us anytime.
Tacetite energy is the lifeline of Huanglong, this area maintains tight security. You're referring to...?
See anything unusual recently?
Now that you've mentioned it... The worker I just saw earlier does look unfamiliar.
You remember everyone's faces around here?
As a Mornguard stationed at the factory, it is expected of me.
You seem very proud of it.
Why, most certainly! This is the heart of Huanglong.
I digress. I'll notify you if I catch sight of that unfamiliar face again.
Halt. This is a military restricted area.
Pardon me. What is this area for?
That information is classified.
(Security is tight around here it.)
(Everything seems to be normal here.)
(Hard to imagine Tiancheng with a fully developed Industrial Area.)
(Since everyone here is quite peace with hope.)
(So it's just as Yangyang said, Tiancheng is the hope for regaining the land of Huanglong)
Then we shall trouble Rover in searching for clues together with us.
The intruder left behind quite a few traces, if you manage to find anything from them, do let me know right away.
What did he look like?
Sanhua, there is no harm in speaking your mind.
My Lady and I were getting prepared to head toward the parlor. On our way in the outer corridor we heard strange noises coming from the Hierarch's Quarters.
I came inside to investigate and found the intruder rummaging the room. I intended to apprehend him on the spot, yet...
The person was exceptionally skilled. Sanhua is not at fault.
My Lady...
Hmm, wait. Little Snowflake did mention he was wearing a cloak that covered his face.
Oh, I'm sorry, force of habit. It's Sanhua, Hierarch Guard.
Little Snowflake?
That scoundrel must've snuck into the rear mountains.
It's true, I smelled it right as we entered this room!
I inquired Sanhua of the communications interference.
The intruder likely carried some form of device that's able to block communications.
She's been attempting to make contact with the other guards, but was unable to hear even static, let alone a reply.
As though... The signals were completely absorbed.
The Central Console requires custom-made Melody Capsules to activate, which I believe to be shaped like disks with wings. Different melodies are stored inside them.
Oh, I remember! It's those little flying disks, right?
TDs? Here? And our Terminals didn't even go off!
I just checked my Resonance Terminal, a few of its functions has gone offline, no signal for communications either. There must be some form of interference.
Argh! To hell with it! Let's just take 'em out!
Wait, these TDs feel more like the result of a trap set by Echo ability.
The intruder is most likely a Resonator. Be on your guards.
A curtain screen projecting the image of a loong, seems like it can be used for communications. Signs of damage can be clearly seeing.
A shattered decoration. A fight occurred here.
A case with loong engravings, showing signs of forced entry. The intruder seemed to be searching for something.
A red card, burned halfway, with some energy fluctuations still left on it. Must've been left by the intruder during the fight.
Why is the Command Center... I can't get hold of the guards either!
Something's not right, the signals are being disrupted.
Commander Jiyan, Awu, and... Rover?
What's up with the long face?
I can't make contact with Hierarch Loong.
There's something I need to report, but little Snowflake won't answer my calls. The guard who went to pass my message hasn't returned as well.
I've never encountered something like this before.
Lady Loong ought to have a grasp of the issue. Yet the current situation is unusual nevertheless.
I shall go inside to investigate further. The two of you, escort Rover back to resting place for now.
I wish to join you.
Very well, let us investigate together.
Hierarch Loong was still present in the inner ward when we last spoke. Besides, "she" is there as well.
I presume they are in no immediate danger.
Disturbence happened, you were one your way to check on the situation and ran into Taoqi on the way.
Have you come to a conclusion?
The intruder was searching for something.
In addition, we found this.
A red card, burned halfway... And this figure, sheep horns?
Does this look familiar to you, Commander Jiyan?
This figure, and the card's quality in particular, evokes of a certain person. Yet, I shall reserve judgment until further evidence is found.
During Commander Xuguan's assassination case a year ago...
Shreds of red paper were discovered on the scene, very similar to that of this card.
You mean the one that hurt Grandpa Xuguan? Huh? Are they the same one?
Awu, calm down.
The intruder's identity aside, I suspect his aim was...
Fascinating...
Something more important than Hierarch Loong herself.
You guys know the answer right? Quit playing with words! Just tell me already!
Oh, silly. What else can there be considered more important than Hierarch Loong, none other than the Divinity itself?
From what I can tell, the intruder must've mistaken that the Divinity was within Choral Command, the center point of Tiancheng, and was left empty-handed in the end.
It's no sheer coincidence that this incident occurred right at the height of the Threnodians' resurgence.
A dark tide is about to make its surface. We should make haste, Hierarch Loong.
Then I shall entrust you with leading everyone here in tracking down the intruder, Commander Jiyan.
The suspect is sure to have headed towards the rear mountains. His methods of movement... Feels as though he can alternate dimensions.
I've just been informed by the Tiancheng Defense that they have every entrance of the city sealed tight.
He's going nowhere!
Excellent work!
It seems we'd have to trouble you further, Rover.
After this matter is resolved, I shall most certainly repay you with satisfactory.
The intruder failed to find what he was looking for and is likely to not give up so easily.
Being of great importance to Huanglong, the industrial area may be his next target.
The intruder's true abilities are unknown. If you encounter him, notify me first hand and refrain from making any engagements.
Can you manage?
A red Terminal, identical to the ones carried by the group that's seen frequent recently.
Yes, I'm fine. That Terminal...

We've had an ongoing investigation, but as of now, what is certain is that their members lurk within all regions of Huanglong, possesses an established intelligence network, and are proficient in disguises.
Does ring a bell.
From these cases, the Rangers were ultimately able to trace and pinpoint a suspect by the name "Scar".
By assessing the information we have, particularly the method of explosions, the individual we encountered is none other than the culprit, Scar.
Thus, he is able to slip away.
His movements are indeed unusual.
His Terminal absorbed my powers.
Interference with the communications may be its doing as well.
I attempted a call for assistance, but was met with no reply.
Uh-huh...
Sanhua experienced the same.
Rover, you should return to Choral Command. We'll take care of the scene from here.
It appears our speculations were correct. He indeed was the one responsible for all of this.
Well, after all, Jiyan never easily reveals his thoughts without conclusive evidence.
So you've known of him all this time.
Now, how about we discuss some matters concerning yourself?
Previously in my quarters, I had sensed a special kind of intimacy from you. As though... Sui'guang.
Exactly. The reports mentioned that the markings on your Terminal bears strong resemblance to the Divine Loong's skin patterns.
Sui'guang? The... Divine Loong?
Exactly. The reports mentioned that the markings on your Terminal bears strong resemblance to the Divine Loong's skin patterns.
You and Sui'guang may both traveled from the same place?
Do you know of the Cortem Veritatis Institute?
Where did it come from?
It can absorb those powers as well?
I may have heard about it a few times.
After being discovered at the Chenbing Mountain, the Institute conducted... Some work on him.
The discoveries made from his body should unravel a great deal of your mysteries.

Yet, it's a shame the Institute's formal research sites were all long devastated, along with the many data contained within them. Not to mention with Sui'guang's troublesome temperament, he refuses to reveal anything related to himself.
Thus, the only thing I can provide you...
Are the information stored inside this data chip.
Are you sure you can trust me with this?
Somehow, I feel a bit nervous about this.
I intended to pass this on to you during our initial meeting earlier, it's merely delayed.
It is normal to hesitate in the face of unknown. However, are you not curious?
Are you alright? Shall I arrange some rest for you?
I was in a laboratory.
Judging from your look, Were you... Able to remember something?
Was it referring to the past... Or rather a future soon to be grasped?
A turnabout, shifting the balance...
A laboratory... The Institute?
A lengthened creature? Could it be Sui'guang? He does appear to be a being not of natural incubation.
I couldn't tell, but they...
It looked like they were incubating a lengthened creature.
I wish to pay Sui'guang a visit.
Forgive me, but I'm afraid I cannot grant you your request for the time being.
Although, you can have my word, when the time comes I will bring you to meet him.
Now then, on behalf of Huanglong, I hereby formally request for your assistance in our battle against the coming storm of resurgence.
Sui'guang tends to regard our efforts as futile, but I would like to think that, being fully aware of one smallness yet still rising up to challenges, is what defines Huanglong and its people.
No need to reply to my request at this time.
The determination of Huanglong is not easily swayed, but should you join us, our chances of victory would surely grow.
I believe, I accept your request.
Start investigating the industrial area, I'll be joining you shortly.
Yep, count me in as well. I can smell there's something fishy going on inside.
If anything were to happen, Awu and I will be around, we should all go.
Please trust me.
Aww man, it's just a passage way. I thought some monster was about to show up.
Over here, we can take this elevator.
That should be all of them. Time to restart the Central Console.
At last... I hope everything is well inside.
The situation is still unclear, stay sharp.
Hahaha... That was a piece of cake! On to the next ones.
No need to rush. Let us find a way to lower the water level and restore the pathway first.
Oh... Was the elevator always this slow? We gotta get these little disks back to where they were!
Every time I come visit Choral Command it gives off a fancy vibe. Hmm... But this time, something feels really strange.
Finally, help has arrived! It's Commander Jiyan, we're so glad you're here!
Hurry! Someone broke into the Hierarch Quarters!
I wanted to stop him with the other Mornguards, but he was just too quick for us. We couldn't predict his movements.
Not only that, all of us got beaten down.
Please go check on Hierarch Loong. There were noises of fighting inside just a moment ago, now it's all calm and quiet. I have a bad feeling about this.
Ouch...
Don't worry about me, you must check inside quickly! I fear... I fear for the Hierarch Loong's safety!
I've never seen anything like it... He was so fast it made me feel so powerless.
I've failed you, Hierarch Loong. Please forgive me.
Are you alright?
Get, get away from me!
Oh... It's Commander Jiyan, Commander Awu, and Taoqi. I thought it's that card freak again.
He was wearing a cloak and broke in, just like that. None of the alarms went off, and we couldn't even get a signal out...
He, he went straight into the Hierarch's Quarters. You must hurry, Hierarch Loong is still inside.
Easy now.
Ever since Commander Xuguan's assassination a year ago, the number of bombing cases within Huanglong has risen considerably.
Sheesh, it's the ingredients that they've eaten, but all everyone cares about are the seasoning, heat control and knife skills.
Nope, that's not enough, it's still missing a touch...
Phew, this new recipe for therapy seems to be more difficult to do than I thought.
Yeah, I've been working on how to improve the Caltrop Soup.
However, if you want to balance the medicinal properties and taste, heat control it is always difficult to grasp.
Or maybe, I should visit Panhua's Kitchen for more inspiration...
What's the point in putting so much seasoning? It's just going to overpower the ingredients' true flavors.
I'd much rather boil the food in plain water myself than go eat at that restaurant.
I'm talking about that Pan... Ahem, nothing. Now, don't you go around gossiping behind my back.
Which restaurant?
I'm not scared of her, I just don't think there's a point in bickering with each other all the time, you hear me?
Trying out a new recipe?
You got that right. Heard a customer's chitchat the other day, thought I might as well make some improvements to the Four-Great Tofu.
Only having numbingly hot, spicy, fresh and fragrant these four flavors is not enough, every piece of tofu must have a complete gamut of all five flavors!
I heard the dish was meant to honor the four great heroes.
Oh, my. So you know its story, but that was years go.
Huanglong is full of heroes and heroines, who knows, you might become one of them some day as well.
And when the time comes, I'll be sure to put this dish on your celebration feast!
Greetings, welcome to the Pioneer Association.
Would you like to issue or take on a commission?
Of course, if you wish to inquire about our businesses, we will always be at your service.
Nothing for now.
Fly like the wind, and strike as lightning. For a better world!
If you want something made, just leave the stuff over there.
You don't seem to be in the mood.
How can anyone be happy working this job?
Watching all those youngsters leaving off with weapons from my shop, heading towards the battlefields, towards TDs.
Yet, those weapons I made couldn't protect them well enough, there's perished souls each day...
Even my own boy didn't make it home at the end.
I am sorry for your loss.
*Sigh. If there's nothing else, then please let me be.
Welcome. Are you looking for anything in particular today?
If not, would you like me to offer you a few suggestions?
Sure, please do.
Behold! An ornament made based off of the lion sculptures of Tiancheng, it can even fit in your palm.
Oops, I almost forgot to mention that it's made from the ice shell of Frostbite Tertoises, if you hold it directly with your hands it may get frozen up a bit.
Hmm... You don't seem to be too thrilled about it.
Don't worry, one day I will come up with a creative gift that will put you on the edge of your seat.
A relic that has lost its civilization is no more than a lonely tombstone.
These handful of tombstones stuck in the ground here and there, marks the graves of civilization themselves.
That is a really sad way of putting it.
Precisely. So if you have the chance to come across any antiques, it may be the best to leave them in my care.
By sweeping off the dust on those tombstones, you may even uncover some of their inscriptions.
If an incense could be lit for time and history, then it shall make this life ever more meaningful.
Don't you know? There are so many people who are scared of taking medicine.
I want to take food therapy forward and change the stereotype that good medicine is bitter.
Last time, I mixed Citratus and Caltrop together to make pancakes, even the children who hate medicine couldn't stop eating them!
Hehe, as the disciple of a medical family, this is a must!
Why all the effort?
Something's bothering you?
Outstanding.
In the past, this watch post alone took two years to build.
Quite so. Big investment, wasn't it?
If those exiles weren't there making this mess, we could have recovered the whole Desorock Highlands without letup.
Doesn't matter. Now that we're back, we are never surrendering this place again.
Keep watching. The new offensive will shake everything.
Is supply sufficient at the far-watch camps?
According to contact records, it's sufficient to last until next drop-off.
We have to avoid accidents. It's remote and underdeveloped here. There could well be accidents.
Just in case, shall we arrange a few men to look out?
We shall. But we have to be very cautious and avoid engagement.
Count on me. I've walked over the supply line a few times. Familiar.
The contact obstructions are too severe. Couldn't we solve it?
There is a way. We fire a shell to the XXX with the Resonance Fission Cannon to neutralize the electrically charged Wutherons.
The only thing is, you have to move that cannon here from the edge of Incineranur.
Is that even a solution? I'd propose we build a few more Choral Beacons.
I was joking, but you cannot be serious...
You can place Choral Beacons anywhere you want, can't you?
If they interfere with each other, we will even lose the contact quality now.
Have you seen Thunder Squama? I heard that it's a strange looking one among TDs.
Last time when I went to back up at Norfall Barrens, I saw from afar.
It was fighting with a flock of Herons, it appeared. I didn't see it clearly, but it did feel fierce.
Didn't know it was bellicose. A flock of Herons could be deadly.
We have to thank their conflict, or our trasport fleet could not find the chance to pass.
If they were caught in the open, the staff might be able to make it out alive, the goods could be lost.
The exiles at the lost shores seem to behave themselves these days.
Do they? I have no interest in those hiding cowards.
They are not like other exiles. They have evil ideas.
They mislead passing-by ships with lights and raid the wrecked ones.
This kind of villainy is not something ordinary exlies do.
Are you worrying that their recent silence is a harbinger of other wicked plans?
Can't rule that out.
Then I have to pay more attention. We can't let them have their way!
I thought things could be more welcoming when I was moved here from Norfall Barrens.
But the conditions here seem more tough...
Of course. Norfall Barrens is frontline, whose supplies are prioritized.
Our post is less dangerous, so the materials are only of basic level.
Sigh. Not easy for anyone.
There are updates for the guys we followed.
They seem organized.
Organized? Humph, what organization is so bold to come here? They are not trying to take the Crownless, are they?
If I'm going to take them, none will make it out alive.
Hey, hey. I know you're capable, but don't be rash.
Calm. I know the bigger picture. I won't take actions without commands or permission.
But, if they bump into my fire range one day, they're gonna have only bad luck to blame.
How I wish to see XXX before its color changed.
What difference does it make? It'd still be simply a lake.
Look at the water sample we get now. Many components are unfound before. This is a great discovery.
Why are you so isolated to romance? This was a famous scenery area. Imagine how beautiful the lake should have been.
If you only focus on the quests and don't look at the surrounding scenes. Your brain will rust.
Despite that, I still don't understand what is really so nice in the scenes you talk about...
I heard Heron, as a kind of MO, is very cruel to their offsprings.
Right, they drive their thin nestlings out of the nest, or even prey on them.
You shouldn't consider MOs simply in the lens of human values.
Some of the cruel behaviors in our eyes could be key to the survival of their kind.
The fact that they survived such a hostile environment as Desorock Highlands is a sufficient proof of their adaptability.
It's so hard to find the opencast mineral sample that the client asks for.
If there weren't this detailed documentation they provided, I'd fail to recognize it even if it's before my eyes.
The client must be an expert. Otherwise, who will pay for such a high price for a few stones?
You earn money as well as gain knowledge when you work with this kind of guy. So fine.
The exiles near Tacetite Cliff are easy to deal with.
But what if we come across "Lizard men" and "Trihead birds"?
Oh, you didn't read some intel beforehand, though you look like an explorer?
I tell you what. Stay away from the dragon's tear, and avoid mutated herons to your best.
If you encounter their leader, it's big problem!
Hm? I hear precious metals. The sound comes from this way...
Rover. Please stay!
Hey, I see you travel alone. Sometimes things must be inconvenient. Do you need some help?
I can fight and I can tough, I can tell jokes and I can cook. Really I'm a necessary companion for travelling.
Hire me for only 2 million Tacetite Coins or... a 9-1 split of the treasures found!
P.S., I get 9, you get 1.
Tacetite is new every day. People cannot pick the same Tacetite twice...
Hmm? Very few people are interested in my thoughts, so it seems you and I have a good rapport.
Let's put it this way, time cannot be reversed or changed, so everything is changing from moment to moment.
There is only past and future in the world, and no present.
What I am last second is not the same as what I am the next, either.
Can you understand that?
If you can't... I recommend that you read the poems by Xieyang, which has a lot of philosophical ideas worth savoring.
Desorock Highlands are dangerous. Please take a detour!
If an ordinary person enters this place by mistake, please go to the Huanglong Post for help.
If a Resonator wants to pass, they also have to go to the camp and apply for permission.
If there is nothing else, please do not disturb me on duty.
Lately there are always people slipping into Desorock Highlands, and even children... really treating life as a child's play!
I hope today's duty goes smoothly and peacefully... God blesses.
Ah! Scared me... I almost hit you. Are you all right?
No no, the instant reaction just now was just my Forte...
This feeling of the body making a counterattack spontaneously is quite disturbing.
Always reminds me of my brother when he practiced Side Sprint, those moments close to death.
Though, fortunately with this power, I could catch him every time...
The wind is so noisy tonight. Is that you have something to say...
An old friend. Stayed here for decades.
I was afraid he would be lonely, so I come to keep him company every night, just like before.
If you meet Uncle Ming back in Tiancheng, remember to say hello to him for me.
And, keep the secret for me.
One, two, three... these Green Hares should make for a week's food.
As you can see, processing the ingredients. When I peel off the Tacetite part and wash it a little, it's ready for cooking.
Desorock Highlands is far away from Tiancheng, so it is not convenient to transport supplies over.
It'd be good if we can find some rations for ourselves and relieve the pressure of transportation.
That said, gathering supplies is something that should be a piece of cake for you, Rover, right?
If you have extra supplies, you can bring them to support us. Our pay is generous.
What's that?
What is it?
Why is that?
I'm a Resonator.
That one was impressive.
Who?
What are you doing?
The three of us has been working together for how long now?
Can't really remember, I believe... I was transferred over into the team just when you two joined in.
Time sure has its way of passing by, the youngsters back then are now all full-grown men.
*Sigh, I can still remember that time, if you haven't lent a hand, it would've been a major accident 'cause of my mistake.
Tell me about it, I was a noob, too, all I did was make it even worse.
Hahaha, you two were still new to the job, mistakes can happen. Plus, that's what us seniors are here for.
Nevertheless, the baton's been passed onto you now.
Hey, when's the new batch of materials gonna arrive? We're running low on stock.
I mean, it's not your first day on the job, you 𝘥𝘰 𝘬𝘯𝘰𝘸 how hard it is to get here, right?
And so I've heard, they blasted this here hole when Tianguang was fighting that Threnodian!
But there's no Threnodians anymore, so what's keeping them for so long?
Hold your horses, I've already contacted them, said they ran into a few Exiles, got delayed for a bit.
Now you've jinxed them!
Hey, how should I know... Ahem, so what's their situation, is anyone hurt?
Nothing serious, just some overconfident Exiles, the Mornguards on escort took care of 'em in no time.
Even better, they also managed to confiscate some old equipment they stole from us in the past.
Awesome! If I'd known earlier, they can take as much time as they want!
Check your equipments again before going down the mine, make sure you don't forget anything.
Righto, if you miss anything by the time you're down there... Ha, they're gonna mark you for absence from work for it.
Yep, I'll make perfect sure that I'll have everything... Wait a sec, sounds to me like you been through it before?
Me? Not, not a chance...
Well, you never forget to take things down with you, but you always forget when the other way around.
If it weren't for you, I wouldn't have to carry a double set of tools every so often while trying to catch the elevators!
How's everyone prepared for the skills assessment that's coming up?
What do you expect? You know me, I'm alright with the hands-on stuff but, the written exam I can just hope for the best.
They say the written part only takes up a small percentage this time, you'll be fine.
For real? You said the same thing last time, but you ended up scoring the highest in all of us!
I just got lucky last time... Happened to review the part where the exam was.
You're not fooling me, everyone knows you're an egghead. How 'bout you show me some of your notes this time?
Can I tag along as well? If I was even capable of remembering all those manuals, I'd be a researcher in the Academy by now.
This is your second violation of regulations for trespassing the mining site. Care to explain yourself?
I don't intend to go inside the Hazy Depths, I just wanted to get closer, and, and listen to the voices...
You've seen the proclamation, this is a restricted area.
You wouldn't want your family to get worried if something were to happen to you!
I no longer have a family, but, if I get closer, I can still hear their voices.
I'm telling you the truth! I really heard their voices!
*Sigh... I understand your feelings, but rules are rules, we'd appreciate your cooperation.
I'll have your situation reported to my superiors, but, in the meantime, please refrain from making any actions on your own.
How much further do you reckon we can still go down with this mine?
Each time I look at these mountains, I can't help but worry it might collapse and bury us alive one day...
Pfft, you worry too much, the mountain structure is as stable as it gets.
On top of that, check out at those custom-built stabilizer and support layers, all of them have been tested for earthquake resistances.
You didn't think we'd just start mining on a randomly placed scaffolding, did you?
Geez, it's been a while since I've done a workout, my instructor's gonna kill me if he found out how out of shape I am now.
Hey, didn't you volunteer to be stationed at the mine to begin with, starting to regret it already?
I don't regret it, it's just a bit different from what I expected.
I mean, at first I thought, it's the Tiger's Maw, for such a crucial place, there can't be a shortage of opportunities and challenges, right?
And now all we have is this bizarre fog-thing on our hands, let alone a challenge.
Oh, you don't think this is an opportunity? You haven't even shown off all your talents yet.
Well, the instructor never taught me anything about dealing with some weird fogs...
Having to do maintenance on our weapons after each patrol is such a pain in the butt.
I wish I was a Resonator, so all I need is some special abilities to fight.
As if Resonators don't use weapons.
I shouldn't have to remind you that every soldier, no matter who and when, is obligated to have their firearms maintained in optimal condition at all times.
A single jammed cartridge in the chamber can make the difference between victory and defeat, you hear me?
I know, I know, it was just a little rant.
Rest assured, I take care of this bad boy just like my own baby.
Be extra careful once you're in the mines. If you encounter any troubles, don't overestimate yourselves and call for help when needed...
Relax, I'm not some amateur fresh out of training course, I've been through it all, you know?
If something does happen, with my skills, it'll be a piece of cake.
Nothing wrong with being careful, there's been plenty of cases that's taught us not to rely too much on past experiences.
We want everyone to work safely in the mines and return home in one piece.
You here that? This isn't a place for you to play hero.
Ugh, I can't take this place anymore, the humidity's high, same goes for the temperature difference, and the weather changes right in the middle of day.
That's what happens when you open a big hole in the middle of the mountain, it is what it is.
There's been a few times when after I got back to the surface, I take my protective mask off, and I could feel the sweat draining from top to bottom.
I understand how you feel...
Impressive, you're first in the group for output again, a full 30% higher than the runner-up.
Mind sharing me your secrets?
What's there to share, we work different categories...
Hey, just hear me out. You know what they say, "When he does a good job in doing one job, then he does a job in doing every job."
You sure know your puns... They should award you with the name "Pun Master" if you ever perform at the Tiancheng Theater.
I heard that there used to be a weapon that could wipe out an entire city from a long distance away.
People had to dig really deep into the ground, just to build cover to be safe from it's after blast.
By the looks of it, it's more than just a city that was wiped clean...
Which makes me wonder if the Threnodians ever return, can they even withstand a shot like that?
According to stories from the old days, the Hukou's also the result of a crater blasted by a Threnodian.
The odds of two cannon shells landing in a single spot... Is pretty low, right?
Any news about my mission colleague?
We've searched everywhere, expect that one place...
We should be prepared for the worst, it seems...
*Sigh, You've done your best, there's nothing more you can do.
But I just don't understand, how someone would just...
Our joint exercise with the Tiancheng Guards is about to start, I'm getting a little nervous...
What's there to be nervous about, their average performance is better in the past, but we're not too bad either.
Take last time, I single-handedly threw down one of their guys trying to sneak up on our outpost.
Woah, no way!
Hell yeah, we brothers and sisters of the 1103s are no slouch.
I noticed you went poppy picking on your last leave?
Yeah, I wanted to make some porridge while the caltrops are still fresh.
Didn't know you knew how to make those. It takes some serious skills, especially when handling the heat.
My mother would start simmering porridge early in the morning all the time when I was little, it smelled so irresistibly good that it made my mouth water.
After I joined up, I barely get any chance to enjoy it so I began recreating her recipe. Not quite there yet, but still...
If you want, I could bring you a bowl next time.
Mailed home half of my salary from last month, another new piece of clothing for my baby brother.
Oh, that reminds me, my niece is about to be a grade schooler, I should save up now.
In that case, the amount of living expenses left for me would be... Wait, it won't cost that much.
Yep, if I take overtime into account, I should be able to make it til the next payday.
That's quite a big difference in compound between these two mineral batches, when were they both extracted?
About a week in between them. If I recall correctly, we had a change in equipments during that time.
Yep, we've reached a critical point in depth, so the old stuffs' not working well anymore.
I see, perhaps the mineral compounds are mixed due to strain partitioning...
Please take me to the warehouse to collect some samples, I wish to make a further analysis on the correlation between ore variation and the mine's depth.
Sir, please calm down. The Saurian's eyes won't turn you into Tacetite.
You're right, they're nothing but a bunch of mutated reptiles, no need to be scared of them.
Reptiles you say? Rock-chewing reptiles if I might add!
It's best you take my advice, wear glasses, avoid direct eye contact with them, and you won't get turned into rocks!
How about this, sir. Next time we go hunting, I'll bring you back some samples.
After you've taken a good look of them, you'll know they don't do that.
Strange, there's no visible damage to the pipes, then why's the pressure so low?
It didn't clog up even when running at full capacity the last time, so what's wrong with it now?
No time for an overall disassembly. Should we start by checking for problems section by section?
If I exclude the obvious ones, the inlet and outlet are definitely normal, otherwise it would be clogged even before entering the pipeline.
Very well, let's split sections, find the problem, and resolve accordingly.
Anything going in and out of the warehouse must be verified with multiple written records accordingly.
If you find missing signatures during any process, you're obligated to reject its respective items.
We always confirm and check everything before releasing, we wouldn't dare neglect any rules and regulations.
That's for sure. What's wrong, something happen again?
Yes, we went through this quarter's data, and found there are numerous irregularities, surpassing our expectations.
Transportation of Tacetite products is our lifeline, it allows no room for errors.
We can take on those Exiles easy, why can't we just go out there and bust 'em all?
Easier said than done. They're born and raised in the wilds, you know how much it would take to catch them one by one?
Besides, if we dispatch the entire garrison, who's gonna defend the miners and the facilities? It's not worth it.
But we can't just let them run rampant and get away with whatever they want.
From what I've heard from the commanding officer, we strike where it hurts the most, meaning completely cutting off their supply chain.
Alright! That'll show 'em!
Those new recruits were a bit nervous on their last target practice.
Probably didn't get to shoot live ammunition much in the past, haven't gotten used to it yet.
Oh, really? I remember how trigger-happy you were at the range on your first time, lettin' her rip like crazy.
Aaand, I missed all of those shots. I can still remember the captain's hollering after that...
Hahaha. Hey, that's what bullets are for, aren't they? Look at you, you're our prestige marksman now!
These goods are always hot on demand, I really appreciate the two of you for the escorts all this time.
Please, you're too kind. We're just doing our job.
That's right, I'm already used to it anyway, can't think of anything better to do.
Impeccable work from you without any doubt. Just like before, once we reach our destination, the finest Maw's Tofu is on me!
I'm swamped, can't even get a chance to have a sip of water.
Let me guess, it's the relief valves again?
What else could it be? The thing's a more pain in the neck than anything.
Once you've started you have to keep an eye on it at all times. Running a marathon around Tiancheng doesn't even come close to this.
Fortunately, it'll be awhile before it's you shift again after this is over.
I don't get it, we are using the same batch of raw data, so how are we getting the exact opposite conclusions?
Since you've asked for it, then I'll be frank.
You always take the mathematical model into account, but neglect the actual application scenarios.
You have higher mathematical skills, but relying too much on the numbers may be your downfall.
I see your point, I do realize this problem of mine... Numbers should be a tool, not the end goal.
Thank you, I'll be more considerate in the future.
Each time I send off a transport, I would always get a sense of calmness in my heart...
Same for me as well, it feels as if sending off an old friend home.
I did the numbers and, if we don't get transferred until retirement, we can send off 6,100 cargos.
Now that you've mentioned it... It doesn't feel that much anymore.
Shooting isn't difficult. It's a matter of personal talent.
I've told these freshmen so many times, that working hard without a purpose is a waste of time.
Look at me and my apprentice. We do this easily.
Qianbu, of course. She's a well-known genius, especially talented for shooting.
No, not only shooting. She learns fast for anything. Very impressive.
Almost like me.
Do you know? There have been a lot of strange sounds in the camp at night...
They are very regular, tat, tat, tat, tat... they would keep going for over half of night.
According to the rules, the shooting range is only open at daytime... then that sound...
Tsk, tsk. If I look back now, I feel a shiver through my spine.
Huh? You react indifferent. Fine, I'll quit scaring you. It's not fun.
Actually it's Yonglu... I knew that all along. He always gets up at nights and practices shooting.
Though he looks indolent, he works harder than anyone behind everyone's back.
As for the reason... maybe he wants to keep his "reputation as a senior".
I actually admire him. Thanks to his efforts... my life can be easier.
Have you heard of the TD Hunter? He hid himself among the people, while saving them all time after time.
It's also said that he could defeat many TDs all on his own, and even the Inferno Rider.
Hum hum, right in front of you. To be honest...
The TD hunter is me. Listen close as I make myself know. I'm Dreal, eal like you spell real, drea like you spell dream.
Sigh. What a pity the great TD hunter is made to be on duty at the distribution hub.
By when could Qifan see my capabilities!
To gain the seniors' recognition, the TD hunter has to work much much harder!
Dreal is really vigorous lately. I hope he can keep up.
He told you about that? Ha ha, still the old way.
You must be thinking "how can such an odd freshman be a Mournguard"?
No matter it's out of killer instinct, manning up, or even self-indulgence...
As long as it becomes the drive to progress, it's a good thing.
Oh? Dreal sent a message... Looks like the exiles have been too much active lately.
Nope. I have other ways to make them remember. Humph...
I'm neither a Resonator, nor strong enough...
I couldn't investigate the Hazy Depths before, and I'm neither qualified to be sent to Whining Aix's Mire.
Not really, Hazy Depths is one of my obsessions...
If loved ones disappear there without a trace, anyone would be eager to find out the truth, right?
Though the Depths is officially locked-down, and average people are not allowed in there.
During such an extraordinary time, I choose to believe in the authority. They will give me a proper answer.
Another obsession of mine is Whining Aix's Mire. Uncle Bin is my master, and the last loved one of mine.
He's unwell, with a degraded memory, but he stands fast at the Mire.
I'm really worried about him... sigh...
Let me get Baichuan out for some sunbath during the lunch break.
You'd break down if you get too tense...
Ha ha, maybe because I enjoy the job as a Mournguard so much.
If you enjoy what you, you'd become more and more relaxed and focused...
It's not what they call talent. It's just a matter of mentality, you see.
I hope people can be less strict on themselves... relax more, and work harder.
We'll all become capable!
Industrial area. No trespassing for unauthorized personnel. Tacetite minerals are stored here.
Tacetite minerals radiate with Wutherons, which has a different spin from normal particles...
You didn't follow? Aren't you a Resonator?
That sounds good. Normal people shouldn't come close to Tacetite minerals. That exposes them to mutation.
Looks like you don't know much about Wutherlogy and Tacetite industry. I thought you were a normal person.
Though it's not a bad thing to know something about Wutherlogy, even if you're a Resonator.
I'm an expert of this field. Ask me whenever you have questions.
What is this... On the index to evaluate the danger at key areas: Tacetite part?
Author is Jifeng? I can hardly agree with what's implied in this paper...
Merely an amateur. Far from professional.
I don't know who sent this paper over, despite all the academic disagreements between him and me...
Though if you look close, there are parts of it that deserve appreciation.
Forget it, I'll visit him some time to discuss. Things are just that I have recently been reading this subject too...
Guys are going the wrong way again...
Right. Some time earlier I was wondering if we could streamline our procedures to help us exploit.
Guy all went to the library in the end. Alas, I'm not trying to say it's not good to dig in the theoretical part...
But practice is always more important!
I'll just go to ask them one after one.
I really can't even read one of those obscure, silly papers!
I've already published three editions of schemes to raise exploitation effeciency...
I'll show that to Song after I put some finishing touches today to it.
Song is our foreman, though he doesn't act so bureaucractic...
We are more like partners. He's very open-minded, talks about every problem with us when he comes across it.
He invests a lot in the mines. The mine is his... and our pride.
Exploitation efficiency... exploitation efficiency. Though this report collects all of our practice experiences...

As though defending himself against a horrible foe, the Mornguard continues to ramble instinctively, weapon raised and aimed at the group. Not liking how the situation is going, Chixia quickly rushes forward and throws Xingyun onto the ground.
More black mist shrouded into Chixia's body, you wish to help her, yet another strange sound awoke you, and you found you're surrounded by TDs.

Awesome! Thanks!

Don't tell me you're getting nervous? Relax, relax!

It's alright, no need to worry.

From now on, I'll be a good girl. Once it becomes safe outside, we can start our classes again!
Phew…
About what you said earlier…
Huh? You mean the painting… It just came to my mind. But come to think of it, it felt great!
Ugh, it's complicated. We're running short on time, I'll tell you as we investigate!
Where it happened, number of casualties. I don't know anything about it.

The Huanglong Academy, for its part, opposed this approach claiming that further research on it may save more people in the future.

Does that seem a bit odd to you?
I won't go too far, as soon as I get hold of something I'll let Taoqi know right away… After being 100% sure, that is.
For someone everyone thought was a hero, to have fled at the most critical time, just like that!

I'll come with you.

Everybody get back, don't get close to him!

…You sure love to keep secrets.
How is Chixia?

Do you still remember your first time here at Tiancheng? When I asked Chixia to have you get familiarized with the place.

After we got back, Taoqi said I should take some time off, so I finally had the time to give the kids some lessons.

With Xingyun going acting weird, and the kids being put in danger. There's no way I'm letting this slide... Not on my watch!
Rover, would you mind taking little Firecracker for a walk, for a change of mood?
I don't think she'll leave that easily.
