But this time it's different! It happened right in front of my eyes!
Fine, if I can't get anything from you, then I'll just find it myself!
Very well, I'm willing to believe you've matured enough that it may not be completely unbearable to you.
There's no trick to grappling. Only practice makes progress in speed.
Everything will be back to normal in just a few days!
That's it, Rover. I'm not gonna sit this one out!
You still wish to protect them, right?
Well, you saw how I made a fool of myself... Hey, you keep you mouth shut about this, got it?
Now, with that out of the way, we should come up with a strategy!
There's no way Taoqi's gonna have me on the investigation, that's for sure. But I still want to do something.
It is my dad's painting, after all...
Now that you've asked…
Three years ago, year 157, the TD Tide invaded Tiancheng. My dad was part of the Tiancheng Defense at the time.
He… Gave his life during that battle.
What's wrong with it?
Don't mind, he died protecting the people, I'm proud of him.
I found a painting when I was sorting out his belongings.
I'm... Sorry to hear that.
And what surprised me the most was that... It showed a clear scene of his passing.
I couldn't believe my eyes. Did someone foresee his death in advance?
So I continued searching, and found some old letters he wrote. The painting was given to him from a friend of hi. A friend he refers to as "Mr. Painter".
Later I brought the painting to the Academy, and the people there were equally shocked...
They detected a very high concentration of Wutheron inside the painting, and placed it under special treatment to study it further.
Since then, it caused quite a lot of problems, I don't understand the reason behind it… But, basically it can affect people's emotions.
Like what happened to Xingyun?
I know someone who might give us a hand. We can start by gathering some more information… Let's go pay him a visit!
Wait. Why are we talking about Yi all of a sudden?
The accident two years ago?
Yet, influenced by that painting, some members of the team grew emotionally unstable, and my brother was hit amongst the chaos… In the end, he died of his wounds.
I want to apologize again for failing to save him, even though I made it there in time…
An accident occurred during research on the painting. My elder brother, also a Mornguard at the time, was one of the first responders that arrived to provide support.
Plus, only the Academy holds the critical tech needed in destroying the painting.
You mean…
You mean the wall we're standing on right now?
This time, I'll make a grand example myself for all of them to see!
As their Ally of Justice, I can't just talk big and be no show, after all!
Oh, and don't forget your promise!
We've all been deceived?
As for the painting, it has always been in my care, lying quietly inside this isolation case from the Academy.
Please believe me. I'm telling you the truth…
It has something to do with you? Are you insane?
How?
Every time I think of my father's figure in the painting, it would bring me back to myself at that time.
I'll prove it to you.
But, what if you fail?
If I'm to be devoured by my fears, stop me no matter what.
Then, my hero's journey might end today forever…
It doesn't belong to her?
If you think about it, when she faced the painting, it was the "bravery" of one person against the "fear" of many others.
The Academy conducted a reexamination, and found that it's now almost the same as an ordinary painting. Aside for one minuscule area, where it has been "blurred".
It blends in so well with the black areas of the painting that it wasn't even noticed before.
But now it seems that it lies the key to understanding the painting.
That pretty much sums up the research so far, nothing more could be found… I've already had little Firecracker up to speed on the matter.
Whatever became of the painting?
What she did was indeed dangerous, but she made the proper judgment nonetheless... If the concentration of emotional fears was to burst, it will certainly cause irreversible consequences.
At that time, I was a little worried that you two wouldn't get along.
Now it seems that you've already recognized each other as partners within your hearts.
No need to worry, Chixia's in good spirits. She's starting to fuss about that Hero 101 of hers again...
Why don't you wait a few days and go visit her for yourself?
Haha, that's right! Never thought you knew me so well!
As dad has said before, "So long as he stands before Tiancheng, he will never live to let any TD go past him!"
No, it can't be! Everyone in the Mornguards are virtuous people!
I remember the moment very well.
Until… Two years ago, that accident with the painting.
They thought I was also affected by the painting, but, I don't know… I've always wondered, could it be that I was just plain scared?
I was the first to arrive at the scene, and then... I ran away.
Yes, that's right!

Xiaofang, you are a brave child, but having courage doesn't mean you can't have fears. You have to remember that bravery only becomes meaningful when you are afraid. Without fear, there is no true courage.
One day, Xiaofang. You'll become the bravest hero ever…
The emotions contained within snowballed.
Give me a moment, let me see if Taoqi know anything.
Can you hear me!
Chixia, are you alright?
Hmm, she's not answering my call!

Ms. Bailian, is this the correct way to fill out the "Equipment Application Form"? When I tried to apply for a survey equipment from the warehouse earlier, the staffs there told me they never heard of this model before, so I have to send in another form.
Nice to see you, Rover.
The matter arose abruptly, so I'll get straight to the point. Bailian previously conducted an investigation at the Gorges of Spirit. Does it have anything to do with you?
Eek! Ro-Rover? What a coincidence meeting you here.
Ms. Bailian, forgive me… I didn't expect that coming early would cause you troubles…
By taking care of yourself and doing the part that is yours, is being responsible to your peers.
Here's the setting location, yet there's no detail instructions in the manual.
Zhizhi, can you help sep up the device with Rover?
Strange... It's still not activating. I followed the instructions manual step-by-step!
Looks like their just the typical ground-based drones. All we have to do is hit them one by one, and we're good to go!
See? In order to have Resonators better adapt to the Condensation Devices, the C.V. Institute set up many of these Automatons for training purposes. They react to any form of direct impact.

Sta-Status report! The Automatons at survey points 0311-21 and 22 have all been successfully activated! Ma'am!
Very well. The two types of Automatons are highly identical in appearance to differentiate. It appears you have done your research well in advance.
They're after the device. Zhizhi, deactivate the device, we will hold them off.

Hold it. Your leg is wounded. It was those Exiles…
Done and dusted, we worked together like a charm! Let's get back to Ms. Bailian!

Get your hands off me!
You'tan.

"Handle" is a peculiar way of putting it. I merely asked the Mornguards to look after her. At the moment, her personal safety is more vital than attending to her wounds.

As a new staff member to the Academy, she is only permitted to participate in survey missions at the lowest danger level. Which means that there should be no concentration of Exile presence around the survey site.
If they really came prepared, then there should be some traces left behind. We split up our search and prioritize efficiency.
A silver medal with engravings of a glacier under a starry sky, tied to a dark blue ribbon. This should be the "Order of Honor: Glaicier" that Zhizhi had showed you earlier.
I should return this to Zhizhi…
I've searched the other survey point. Both Induction Stations are gone, with no signs of scattered parts nor combat in the vicinity.
It's likely that the Exiles were after those devices.
The Transmitter is still functional, try scanning it for the signals nearby.
So, we meet again! Here for another delivery?
Pleeease, have mercy! Your greatness! Let's just talk this out!
Here's my question, this Transmitter, have you seen it before?
Then explain why the signal was able to trace back to this location?
It's gone… It's not here…
…What's the point.
Rover, let's find somewhere where we can talk.
I realize you're filled with confusion at the moment, but this is not the appropriate place to have this conversation.
I will always be here to clear my mind.
Thank you for your hard work, Rover. How did the mission go?
Is it, now? I was informed that something unusual happened to Zhizhi.
Yes, I was informed of the situation.
Bailian leaves in a hurry, leaving you and young lady behind in place.
If only I could become Ms. Bailian's apprentice... A duo with her will definitely become a focal point within the Academy. We will be set as role models for the hundred years to come!
And also, can you help me double check if I'm missing anything? I included some extra items myself, like medicine, Retainers, and mineral water!

Refer to the "Survey Mission Operations Manual", Page 4, Section 1.2, "List of Essential Supplies". Verify your items line by line. Anything outside of the list is not needed. Inquire dedicated staff members for the lending of special equipments.
Then, Ms. Bailian. Can you give me a few extra pointers? It's my first time on a survey mission…
The answers to your questions can all be found within the manual. Also, I am not your mentor, so refrain from addressing me in such way.
You're here. Just in time, you can help with the exloration teaching.
I still have matters to attend to. If you will excuse me.

Hello there, Rover. My name is Zhizhi! Oh, not to be confused with the Express, I'm a member of the Academy's Research Team. Although I've just been admitted not long ago, but I'm a true researcher nonetheless!
Do you know Ms. Bailian? It seems the two of you are rather acquainted!
More or less.
We've known each other for a some time.
Wow… I'm so jealous of you! Actually, I wish to become her student, that's why I was trying to make more conversations with her…
But she's always in a hurry lately, so I can't even have a few words with her... Can you take me with you to see her? Just having me listen in on your conversations is ok with me!
Sorry, I'm here to see someone else.
I'm a bit busy at the moment. Please excuse me.
That's unfortunate… Well, I'll see you next time!
I would like to have the two of you to take part in a survey mission together.
Bailian and I?
A survey mission?
The mission is intended for surveying and mapping of geographical information at a designated location. However, you're tasked with something else.
Besides you and Bailian, another person will be joining you.
She may be new to the Academy, but holds great enthusiasm to her work. Most importantly, she has enthusiasm towards Bailian.
With Bailian' abilities and experience, she should have begun taking students a long time ago. Yet, she was unwilling to do so, and is not suited in working alongside others.
To have them on a mission together now will most likely cause some friction. I also don't wish to see our newcomer get scared off, which'll be a great loss for the Academy.
I wish they can finish the mission safely.
The legacy passed from master to disciple, is the legacy of knowledge. When one takes on the path of research, they cannot escape from one's duty, regardless of their personal wills.
Yes, ma'am! Absolutely! Rover, shall we?
You and Zhizhi completed setting up the Auxiliary Locator. \nZhizhi begins operating the device, but failed to receive any feedback from the machine.
We should fall back to the nearest Tacetite Transfer Station. Zhizhi, are you able to run?
…Of course, Ms. Bailian.
We'll handle the Locator. Zhizhi, just a little more.
Uh-huh...
Bailian summons You'tan to apply healing for Zhizhi.
Ugh… Enough with your acting…
Does it hurt? You'tan can only slow your injuries, once the Logistics Company arrives…
Return… Together? You have the audacity to mention that…!
Do you still remember what happened during the Glacier Research Operation?
My father and the rest of the team were trapped inside the ruins…
In the end… Only you walked out alive…
Bailian… You had the abilities… You had You'tan… Why didn't you save them…
Why don't you save father!
You traitor!
Zhizhi pushes You'tan away. With her remaining bit of strength, she struggles a lunge at Bailian.\nFollowed by a short "Thud", Zhizhi falls to the ground before reaching Bailian.
She's likely just exhausted. Her wound is deep, but the bleeding's already stopped.
*Remain silent.
What do we do now…?
Is she still alive?
I've already made contact with the Logistics Company. No need to worry, they'll have people arrive here shortly.
After a brief moment of waiting, members of the Logistics Company arrived and applied temporary bandaging to Zhizhi's wound.
How is Zhizhi's condition?
She's the one that's always been chasing after Bailian to be her mentor. Even the President's caught wind of it.
Err… I don't know what's going on for sure. Bailian only asked us to keep an eye on her once we get back to the city.
But, you know how Bailian is, right? Always by herself. There's no way she'd take students.
Now look what she's gotten herself into. Bailian even called the Mornguards on her, let alone check on her… Was it worth asking for all that trouble?
Just a second. Did any of you find anything on the ground just now?
Zhizhi seems to have lost something. Did you find anything?
Yet we were able to encounter Exiles. Not only at the perfect timing, they also seemed to have known that we would show up at that location.
This was no ordinary accident. I need to go back and look into this further.
Yes. It is decided, then we should go right away.
So will I.
As for their methods… Rover, were you able to find anything?
Removed from an Automaton? This is not of the Institute's origin, more like a... Transmitter.
I found this module.
Very well, we'll have them lead the way this time.
Someone?
T-that girl with the white lab coat. She told us, once we get the signal, w-we just need to, come over and t-teach you a lesson…
Yes, Yes, sort of, like the one, that was with you…
I would like you to be more explicit.
It's the person that was with you… Maybe.
Since you recognized the person you were having a deal with, why did you harm her?
Well… She caught herself in, by mistake…
Is that so. That concludes my questions.
Thank you, thank you! Your greatness!
Rover, what say you? Do you think they attacked Zhizhi on purpose?
It's unlikely, since they're…
It's possible, so that their plans wouldn't fall apart.
You're trying to say, there's a deal between them? These people are known to be backstabbers to begin with, it's not surprising that they would go against their words halfway.
It goes in line with their usual practices. Although they don't usually seek troubles with Tiancheng directly, but it does not rule out other possibilities.
Now that we have all the clues we need, it's time that we pay the person in question a visit.
I need to make some preparations, why don't you go ahead and find Zhizhi at the Academy. She seems to be very close to you, it may be better if you are present.
Did you leak information of our mission to the Exiles?
What happened in the ruins?
What do you mean traitor?
…Someone knows.
…Ha…Haha…
Yes…No… What's the point…
It's all… Buried… No one knows… No one knows!!!
Bailian arrived just in time to see Zhizhi in disarray. She did not say a word, only handed a silver medal into her hands.\nZhizhi gave the medal a brief glimpse before throwing it aside.
Why would you throw it away?
I don't deserve it... Having it with me will only bring shame to my father. And neither do you deserve it, all of you!
You monster who live by yourself! Always with that stinky face of yours, as if it has nothing to do with you...
Tell me! Tell me what really happened inside the ruins!
Hugh, what are you insinuating? Are you trying to say that I'm a pitiful wretch under betrayal? That I had it coming?
And what about you! As you witnessed those beneath the glacier draw their final breaths, did you ever think about that one day in the future, that you would fall victim to betrayal as well!?
No, I have never betrayed anyone.
It was a successful mission.
There was a bit of a turnaround.
No need to be anxious, this has nothing to do with you. It was my responsibility for not informing you of Zhizhi's identity. I apologize.
As Bailian was the sole survivor of the operation.
As President of the Academy, every bit of information within the Academy will eventually reach my ears. However, as for Bailian…
The tragedy of the operation and the death of her mentor devastated her enough as it is. I do not wish her to go through that same experience once more...
Regardless, I shall personally handle Zhizhi's punishment, so let's all have this incident...
*Remain silent.
So you know everything?
President, I'm here to report on our mission.
The survey mission concluded in success. Data input of C.V. Automatons in survey locations 0311-21 and 22 completed. I have uploaded the specific data into the system.
During our mission we encountered incursion from an Exile group. However, Rover ensured the safety of the team, while Zhizhi preserved our research equipments to the best of her abilities.
Upon our return, Zhizhi showed signs of overwhelming shock. Thus, it is in my judgement that she may be unsuitable for the position of a researcher.
Are you implying that we ask her to leave the Academy?
In contrary, due to her demonstration of exceptional operational capabilities, I would suggest that she try out other positions in the Academy…
Yet, as you just mentioned, she is not suited for research related work, having her continue to work here will only be of torment to her.
Rover, do you have anything to add?
*Remain silent.
No.
I do.
Then, that'll be all. Rover, I am grateful for your help. Your remuneration will be issued shortly.
*Remain silent.
Zhizhi's very considerate.
Well, I did all the physical work.
Hehe, whatever necessary to make the mission go smoother.
I felt really safe with Rover at my side!
Err… Fair point, all I did was provide a bit of information, it was Rover who did the activating work…
The Automatons of survey point 21… We should investigate them as well.
Rover, you're finally back! Where's Bailian?
Zhizhi, I've successfully activated the two Induction Stations in their respective survey points. Is the device set on your end?
Ms-Ms. Bailian, forgive me! I've encountered some problems, it's not activated yet!
Stay where you are, I'm coming back to have a look.
It's… It's because she's a talented genius! People as smart as her would never care about others!
Stand back.
Well then, we should start up the Locator. Just follow the same procedures as before.
Zhizhi begins operating the Auxiliary Locator in perfect order, as it gains connection with the Induction Stations, and begins to record data from the Automatons' locations.
The timer's started! Quick, activate the rest!
A device capable of sensing and scanning the conditions of nearby C.V. Automations. Connected to the Auxiliary Locator. Its has been activated by Bailian.
Bailian appears in front of you. She's arrived exactly on time for the scheduled assembly.

I was so excited last night that I couldn't fall asleep, so I got up in the middle of the night and went over the equipments and supplies again. I decided to come early after noticing the time, it's so...
It's acceptable for Rover, but you, on the other hand, shouldn't have arrived here on your own.
Huh…?
While the location chosen for this survey mission is relatively safe, we still cannot exclude the potential threat from Exiles and MOs.
You are here alone without the means to protect yourself. Taking actions on your own desire will only cause trouble for others.
Survey of the assembly point was not mentioned in the mission briefing. There is no need for unnecessary activities.
*Remain silent.
Her intentions were good.
Are we all set to go?
Oh! Could it be… You're here to assist us? Ms. Bailian would always refuse to go on the mission together with me…
Good day, Rover. I am Lushen, President of the Huanglong Academy.
Pardon my sudden call, as I have a special matter that I wish to discuss with you. Please come see me in the Academy at your nearest convenience.
Right as Zhizhi finished her sentence, you see Bailian rush in front of you to check on the device.
Zhizhi.
Yes! I'm so sorry! I…
Why are you always apologizing? Resolving the issue is of more important matter.
There seems to be an issue with the sensors inside the Locator, I'll take care of it. In the meantime, to save time, you and Rover proceed with activating the Automatons.
Yes, ma'am! Absolutely! Wait… Consider it done!
Ms. Bailian seems to have no intention of criticizing me? I have no clue what's going on in her mind...
Anyway, no more mistakes from here on out. Rover, come help me out again!
I'll take care of this issue. Rover, I wish to leave Zhizhi in your care. She may run into unnecessary problems activating the Automatons by herself.
Oh, no. What should we do… She told me to keep an eye on Zhizhi, but she didn't mention how!
How should I put it… Her wound is definitely fine, but she's acting kind of weird. You should go see it for yourself.
She has business to attend to and will be here later.
Did something happen to Zhizhi?
In a sense, yes.
Indeed.
Very well, since the both of you are acquainted, than it makes the matter much easier. I called you here today for a request.
Precisely. Your name was proposed to me. You and Bailian are familiar with each other, and is capable of handling yourself out in the wilderness. The perfect candidate.
Once the mission has concluded, the Academy will arrange some funds as a gratitude for your efforts. Thus, I shall leave them in your care.
That's because I came looking for you.
I'm here to attend the mission with you.
Thank you so much! I've been waiting for this day for a long time…
Wait! It's already time for the scheduled assembly, why is she not here yet? She's not bailing on us, is she?
I apologize for the delay.
Ms. Bailian! You're right on time!

We should verify our tasks once more. Coordinates of the survey sites are 0311-21 and 22 respectively, requiring two Induction Stations in total. An Auxiliary Locator must be deployed 80 meters due west of a straight line between the two sites.
Not a problem! That location is right next to the waterfall, we can see the entire Tiancheng from there.
So you've visited that location as well.
I, I…
If you're all prepared, we'll be on our way.
Why don't we ask Bailian to give it a look.
No. I already promised her I could do it, if I ask for her help now…
"Did you not study the manual fully before we departed? Your negligence brings inconvenience to us all"… Uuughhh, this is definitely how she'll respond!
I believe that she's willing to help.
Bailian isn't that kind of person.
But she is! You've heard what she said, doing your part is how you be responsible to your peers.
If I ask for help now, all she's going to think is how incompetent I am. She wouldn't care about me…
…Beep.
*Remain silent.
See, she didn't criticize you.
She's probably thinking its faster having it done herself than to teach me…
Ultimately, it's impossible to ask for her help.
Do you know about the Glacier Research Operation? Organized by the Huanglong Academy that sent their best researchers and archaeological explorers for the task.
Ms. Bailian was their youngest member at the time.
Here… This medal was granted by the Academy to my father who was part of the operation as well.

The day he learned he had been selected for the team, he made a rare trip home and kept telling us how the glacier is filled with mysterious, and how high the academic values of the ruins that lay under it...
Why would you think that?
He also mentioned that there was a very capable girl about the same age as me in their team who's, and when he comes back, he wants to have a chance for use to get to know each other...
I didn't pay much attention to what he said at the time and kept rolling my eyes.
After that meal, he went back to the Academy. He left with the team a week later for the... Ah, more on that later!
Y-You want me to do it? Wouldn't it be faster for Ms. Bailian to activate it…?
In order for you to master the processes of a survey mission, it's necessary that you complete the final step with your own hands.
Ms. Bailian's always very clear in differentiating matters.
What are you referring to? I hold no grievance should you prefer to have me assist you with the procedure. I merely consider it unbeneficial to either of us in doing so.
Then, what sort of assistance you think is beneficial? Or rather, you wouldn't help if there are no rewards involved?
You misinterpret my meaning. You and I hold no relationship of interest. If I am to intervene, you will gain no experience, and neither will I will gain anything.
Thus, I choose not to provide you with assistance.
I get it now. I'll be responsible for myself.
What's the matter? Did I do something wrong? I did everything what the manual said…
Let me take a look… Strange, there seems to be some interference frequency...
Ms. Bailian, the Auxiliary Locator is running in stable condition.
A small wound like this… What do you care…
You never… Intended on saving me, were you?
Why would you say that? We're engaged on a mission as a team, it is logical that we return safely together.
No.
Keep an eye on her? What's with… Whatever. Since Rover and Bailian are fine, then we'll be on our way back with Zhizhi.
Well… I believe Zhizhi had lost something of hers. Do help me ask Bailian about it later, will ya?
Hmm… Not that I am aware of. We should search for it later on.
How do you plan to handle Zhizhi's situation?
I remember the Locator experienced a strange jamming frequency before the Exiles appeared.
What use can they make of them?
Do they even know how to operate professional equipments like these?
Since someone had lent them a hand, then their boldness is understandable.
Interesting. Just taking interest in the devices alone, is indeed not enough to decipher their provocative behavior.
They have no formal means of access to industrial materials. But in order to fabricate weapons, or some of their "small inventions", they require raw materials.
Meaning, equipments from the Academy dismantled into various parts, are considered valuable items to them.
No, never seen it!
Someone gave us a synchronized signal... To receive messages. We're only in charge of receiving messages.
Do you still remember her looks?
Zhizhi?
Not so fast, we're not done with you yet. We're missing two Induction Stations...
For sure, for sure. We've got 'em all prepped up and waiting for you!
I found that group of Exiles. From their words, it seems you've been planning this for a while.
However, they had a temporary change of heart and failed to carry out your request.
Then, who was the traitor… The traitor that killed my father!
I'm asking you! WHO… WHO WAS THE TRAITOR…
…*Sigh.
No matter what answer I give you, I can offer no physical evidence, thus I cannot convince you into believing me.
If you also intend on becoming an archaeological explorer, you should seek the truths from a more objective being.
What is certain, is that this medal already bears the most sincere answer. Professor Zhiyan, is worthy of this honor.
Father…

During our breaks, he would often speak to me about you. He said you have the talents that of an explorer, able to act and thing proactively, a daughter who will most definitely surpass him in the future.
Take it with you. One day, you too shall set foot on that very glacier, and unearth the truth with your own hands.
I… I… I don't deserve it… *Whimpers… *Weeps…
*Weeps… *Weeps…
We should leave.
*Weeps… Father… *Weeps…
Three years ago, we departed from the Count's Nest Harbor, heading north towards the glacier for a scientific research operation.
And in the end, just as Zhizhi revealed, I was the only one that returned.
What happened in the ruins?

At the time the... The research team was trapped within the ruins beneath the glacier. We were running short on supplies. It soon became apparent, that it was impossible for all us to make it out alive.
Some rebel members decided to act in a separate group, plundering other's equipments and supplies...
Ironically, they soon began to fight amongst themselves. In the end, no one gained anything.
Why were you the sole survivor?
How was Zhizhi's father killed?
I understand…
I haven't become a Resonator yet when the strife began. My mentor confronted the group head-on in order to protect me… And to no surprise, he failed doing so.
At the moments of his passing, he handed me these rings and a Tacetite Fragment he had discovered.
I had no methods of safekeeping these artifacts, so I had the contents of the Fragment marked onto my body before destroying it.
In the end... The marking inexplicably turned into a Star, with it, You'tan was born and assisted me out of the ruins.
Professor Zhiyan... I apologize in advance. In the beginning, I considered him to be a rather unreliable person, as he always engages in unnecessary conversations with me.
So when the strife first started, I was cautious of him as well. Yet, he was still exploring around as if he hadn't grasped the situation.
I cannot disclose further details of how it unfolded, and there is no need in doing so. All is buried under that glacier, even should you know, what can you possibly do?
Even so, just as I told Zhizhi, Professor Zhiyan is a man truly worthy of the honor. This is the only thing that is worth remembering.

Upon my return, I submitted a detailed report of the operation. But since the participants were all celebrated within the archaeological field, the Academy eventually chose to overshadow the incident with honors.
In the end, only a medal and an obituary awaited their families and friends.
This medal… I see, so this is the item Zhizhi has lost.
Is this the one?
It appears that giving her the medal from my end was rather coincidental.
I have two medals in my possession. One of which I accepted on behalf of my mentor. The Academy did not engrave names onto the medals. It's difficult to differentiate which one belongs to who now.
I saw her from a distance when she came to accept her father's medal. She wept the hardest amongst the crowd.
If Professor Zhiyan is still alive, he would have not allowed her to go down this path of wrongdoing. By showing her the medal, I was hoping she would come to her senses.
You gave her your own medal?
Why did you think of giving her the medal?
But that medal belongs to you…
But that medal belongs to you…
I no longer have need for such formalities, Zhizhi on the other hand, needs an answer.
Without this medal, what would her father be referred to as? A traitor? Or an honorary archaeological explorer?
She has already done something such as colluding with the Exiles. With no answer, she may not escape the word "traitor" for the rest of her life...
I can't say for certain. Perhaps… There's another way.
Her medal… Can I leave it in your care? Now that you've heard of this inglorious story, I will have to ask you to remain silent with me in the coming days.
Thank you. Also, please do not mention Zhizhi and the Exiles to President Lushen.
My mentor was also his student, and such story isn't suited for him to hear.
Will she be exiled?
I shall take good care of it.
I won't mention a word of it.
Now it seems that this lack of information, has instead led to her misunderstanding… From the results alone, she indeed had reasons to suspect Bailian.
Her father lost his life during a scientific research operation. For reasons that I cannot disclose, the Academy has never made details of the operation public.
I intended for this to be of some ease to her pasts, yet I was too clever for my own good.
For the sake of reason, she should leave the Academy.
After spending time with her, I could sense that there was a goal she wished to pursue on this path.
I hope that she can keep going down this path as well.
Although what she's currently pursuing is merely a vague shadow, yet she already possesses the determination and courage to pay everything for it.
Just as what my mentor had been persisting on.
If this is what you are willing to believe... It is most certainly the better outcome. I shall leave this matter to you.
Let's head further towards the cliff. The view is better there and we may even be able to see "the place".
Ooh, so close. Let's go over their placements and try again.
*Weeps… Father… *Weeps…
A piece of the Automaton's outer cover seems disjointed, showing signs of previous removal and reassembly.
It appears the person was very rough in dismantling the cover. You removed the cover without resistance, exposing an elongated module inside.
This medal. You should take it back.
Here you go. If there's nothing else, we'll be taking our leave!
Fellas, looks like we hit the jackpot!
Hurrah, Boss! We're gonna be rich!
It seems… We're having unexpected guests.
Rover? So... you are the special help Taoqi talked about?
Oh, you came sooner than I expected, Rover.
So sorry to have called you in a sudden, but after I thought over, there's a matter that I can only count on you.
Don't be so nervous, you are not a member of the Ministry of Development. Surely I won't assign you some arduous tasks? Just a little help you can provide with Yangyang and support her.
What am I needed to do?
She should be busy investigating some strange assaults that happened in the wild recently... She only just got rid of risks of overclocking, but now she's indulged her in work.
Resonators are not all-mighty.
Once a Resonator goes beyond the threshold, there is no turning back. To truly stay at the side of our loved ones, we have to be very, very careful.
So, instead of leaving our little lark to face the strong wind by herself, you will accompany her while she looks for the right direction, right?
Don't worry, this is Commander Jiyan's will, too, despite his reluctance to say such considerate words because he's too solemn.
Why ask for me to help?
Is there other candidate for this role?
Oh? Isn't this a rather proper arrangement?
You worked well with Yangyang when you two tried to save Chixia, didn't you?

What's more, Rover's capability speaks for itself. If there were to be unforeseen problems, you won't allow Yangyang to drag herself too far, right? Even if you can't persuade her, you could still be a considerable help.

It wouldn't be too hard for myself to be a backup, but it's just that I got a lot of work to handle at the Ministry, whereas Chixia, other members of the Rangers or the Mornguards are occupied with other tasks.
On the contrary, Rover seems... free?
Currently, you are a special help of ours, and also a secret weapon.
All right, all right. That's the deal. I will tell Yangyang to wait for you at the living quarter. As there are loads of works waiting for me at the Ministry, I got to go now.
Actually, my wound has almost recovered. I could conduct the investigation on my own.
As a Midnight Ranger, it is my due responsibility to find out the truth and eliminate risks for everyone. If that should cause trouble to you, that's cart before the horse.
I'm free, and I have no other work to hand now.
I can understand more about this world following you.
Let's listen to Taoqi. Two is safer than one.
Er, if you put it that way... that leaves me unable to answer.

Are you... treating me as a guide? I have heard this notion that people who suffer from memory loss should overcome the strangeness of the circumstances as soon as possible and try to contact more with a variety of things. By that they can be more possible to recover from the trauma.
Er. safer? According to the primary assessment, this assault isn't as threatening as that Avatar from the previous case. But with you present... sure we can reach to the truth faster.
If you insist so firmly, it looks like I'm at no ground for resisting anymore?
Then, welcome on board, my special backup.
May we find the truth behind the strange assaults sooner and avoid more injuries.
Yes. Suffering from unexpected assaults from TDs has long become a constant that people must adapt to.

Swarms of TDs often arise along with the generation of Tacet Fields and increased density of Wutherons. The Choral System gives alerts based on those signals so travelers can retreat in advance, and Midnight Rangers and other bodies can respond in time.
Assaults that call for the Midnight Rangers must be extraordinary.
However, these few cases of assaults at the northern fields didn't raise the Choral System's alerts.
Besides, strange contacts came from the victims of these assaults.
There were chaotic pants, heavy objects dropping and deep, hoarse singing voices. These were all that came from the contact channel.
Though it was the victims who initiated the contacts, they did not respond to whatever we asked.
Why? Did they not want to be rescued?
That's the weird part, and the part where we have to investigate.

The incomprehensible contacts were once perceived as mischiefs, until the day before yesterday... when I was on duty around the spot. With the guidance of the streams, I was eventually led to a victim encircled by a swarm of TD.
The medical staff at the clinic told me that this victim just woke up two hours ago. He is the only one that woke up among the four victims.
I think we can only have a clearer understanding after consulting him.
Yangyang and you go to the clinic to visit the victim named Qiaoran. You informed him of the abnormal contents of the contact, to which he reacts with astonishment.\n
What? So I yelled so hard yet you heard nothing?
Yes. All who received your contact reported they didn't hear anything from you.
That's very absurd. I was obviously yelling, save me, I am right below the mountain and encircled by a lot of TDs... how could you hear nothing?
Don't worry, it's fine now. I'm right here. We are all by your side.
Phew... Thank you. I was just feeling tense when you mentioned it.
It's all right. Let's keep on. It's just I don't know what can be helpful for you.
Rover is right. The process, the parts you found strange, and even the tickling that occurred to you, you can feel free to tell us.
Hm... actually I didn't know how the TDs gathered. Just all of a sudden the terminal started to sound alert. There was no time for escape.

The place was kind of remote, so I turned up the choral signal and sent emergency messages to any terminals I could reach. I thought there should be at least one or two to respond to me, but now it turns out nothing was sent? It was all in my head?
Then let's just talk about anything you remember.
No, some did receive those strange contacts.
Contacts... Wait, you just said hoarse singing voice could be heard in the contacts, didn't you? I think I heard that too!
The song wasn't sung loudly, but it was depressing, like choked. Made one feel breathless.

So the singing voice in the contact came from the spot, and the panting and heavy object sounds were those you made when you were assaulted... Everything can be explained, except that your voice disappeared.
Do you remember how the singing came about?
Hm, I have no memory of this. I just knew that the TDs were all around me in a short while, and nothing more.
The song could have something to do with the TDs.
Nobody sings when TDs strike.

That's why all this doesn't make sense. We have to check at the northern field where the assaults happened. I was in a hurry for the rescue last time and didn't have the time for further investigations.
Thank you, Qiaoran, for telling us these. Please have some good rest from now on.
Rover and I will get everything clear for the rest of this issue.
You are welcome. How do you say that... Only when you can talk about them, those terrible and unfortunate matters are truly let go of. I feel much better now after this conversation.
Yes, they will pass. I promise I will prevent later assaults from being staged. I don't want any more people to get hurt for them.
This is where I found Qiaoran.
Yes. No matter how violent the confrontations here might have been. It has all returned to calm now.
Abnormalities and crises are like tides surging. They are waves after waves and hardly ending.
Everything looks normal around.
No matter it's the ambush before outbreak, or the survival after hostility. Calm always buys time for investigation.
Rover should remember the scanning module I installed on your terminal?
How should we unfold the investigation?

The contemporary technology already allows for sensing Wuthering Wave fluctuation to a certain degree. If you should find no thread to start with, pay attention to scanning results and you might find unexpected fruit.
As for me, I have my way.
Yes. Trickling wind will send messages only I can sense.
I will have a vague feeling of everything from the inharmonies in the surroundings to the emotions and contact history of the persons or things I meet.
Stream sensing?
For example, when I met you, I could sense you were never a bad guy.
So you know literally anything?
Then do you know I'm thinking now?
No no no. Omniscience is too much for me. The reason why I refer to it as a sense is I don't have exact answers, only tendencies.
I can't... read minds. Besides, rather than read your mind, I hope more to be a listener when you feel like relating. Or I'll lose your true confidence.
Sorry... this power isn't as impressive as you expect. Undetected messages will be gone into nowhere if ranged too far.
But at some moments, this power does capture some intangible... mm, feelings.
Rover, you can look for clues with scanning while I do my part. If you are concerned about missing anything, try also to follow my senses.
Hm... a lot of discoveries. Let's start from here.
Maybe belonged to a passing-by traveler. The XXX inside the bottle is drained. Looks like someone already used this nutrition.
Nothing to do with the assaults. Let's look somewhere else.
If we look at the records of the three latest days, no Tacet Fields arose, though two occasions of sudden Wutheron density increase followed by sudden decrease occurred.
But the increase and decrease were too close to each other in time. They didn't even reach the threshold for alerts.
It matches Qiaoran's report. Though there were a lot of TDs, they showed up very abruptly.
A material part that fell off due to overuse. Before scrapping its full value was played.
Nothing to do with the assaults. Let's look somewhere else.
Some traces left by intensive energy fluctuations. Source is unknown, despite a certain mechanical regularity. Elementally predicted as result of manual activities.

That's it! I just checked this against the existing records in Rangers' database. Such traces were also seen at some actions by a scarlet dressed organization, but that organization is rarely known...
Could this assault be related to them?

Yangyang walks to the front of you and extends her arms around. Sounds start to arise and merge, and you feel invisible airflow springing towards you. Feels like something flits across you, but you can't grasp.
There might be clues in there. We should look further.
A mass of traces indicating TDs gathering this way from other directions. Left 2 or 3 days ago. Variegated.
These traces are likely to be made by the TDs that attacked Qiaoran, but TDs shouldn't be acting in such a collective and organized way.
Same time, same position... what would be the bait that draws them here?
Traces of multiple TDs moving in the same direction. Left not long before. Distinct.
Only moving... without energy fluctuation marks made by fights, nor bloodstains.
What are they after with this trudge?
Questions become even more.
Something just feels not right, but either scanning or stream sensing capture signals that are... peaceful.
Wait, there is some intermittent sounds... have you heard it, Rover?
It's a song. Someone is singing.
Yes. This should be singing voice that appeared in Qiaoran's contact.
The TDs... are coming at us. They not only show no aggressiveness against that person just now, but follow her commands and stop us for her.
We must eliminate them quickly, so we can catch her and get the answers.
We can't see that singer already. She's out of the reach of stream sensing.
TD attacked us under her instructions. Could she be... the culprit behind all these assaults?
It's surely a good thing the investigation has seen progress. But I just feel... it's hard to describe in terms of happy or unhappy.

Because I have always thought that certain abnormality caused the assaults, or maybe the scarlet dressed organization I just talked about? But as you saw, that singer is apparently a Huanglongese, judging from her costume.
It's... one of us.
Besides, though it wasn't very clear, I recognized the song she was singing, Song of Empty Dawn.
It is a song filled of comfort and hope. It means a lot to me. However, in her show, the emotion was mere pain.
What must she have gone through to have become so hopeless? I don't know why, but I feel... there must be something behind this.
No, no. That is just my instinct, kind of, but I will try to proof if that instinct is accurate.
We are one step closer to the truth. Is Yangyang not happy?
Is that what the streams told you?
Let's go. We'll return to the Rangers HQ first. I'll report to Commander Jiyan about the progresses of the investigation.
... Possesses the power to manipulate TDs, and drove them to attack you.
Though her identity still needs to be determined, the threat she presents is already beyond expectations. Midnight Rangers will immediately deploy more forces to arrest her.
However... we cannot one hundred make sure she caused the...
Setting the sentiments aside, that is the conclusion of objective analysis based on what we have now.
And you know the rules.
It is not allowed in Huanglong for Resonators to hurt others with Forte. If she is convicted, she'll be exiled.
Don't try to understand things in terms of the motives. Make decisions on what to do based on the result.
I understand. I don't mean to vindicate her by any means. No matter what, people must be responsible for their own mistakes.
But I think why and how are equally important.
I'd like to apply for invoking the special procedure...

An offender may be treated leniently with minimal punishment if he or she is guaranteed by a Midnight Ranger with the latter's job as surety and if he or she surrenders him- or herself and makes up to the damage he or she has done.
I will be her guarantor.
Are you sure? We can support this in terms of the procedure, but correspondingly, you risk paying the price.
I must remind you of the purpose you started with.
Precisely because I remember my purpose, I decided to do this. Like I said, I don't want anyone to get hurt anymore due to this issue. That counts her in.
What about Rover. You should have met that strange singer since you were with Yangyang in the investigation. I'd like to hear your view.
I believe in Yangyang, just like the way she believed in me.
Whatever the result may be, I am her backup.
You are always in tacit agreement with each other on issues like this, aren't you?
No. Not all results are acceptable. I hope you get well-prepared mentally.
Fine. If you have decided for yourself, as Commander of the Midnight Rangers, I respect your will.
Go on with the investigation into the assaults. Arrest her or deal with her your way, I hope this is settled soon.
Rover, thank you for supporting my choice before Commander Jiyan.
It was merely a vague feeling, a guess, but I was still looking for a perfect solution that harms no one. Would you join them and think I'm... too naive?
That is Yangyang's way. Just be yourself.
Right. Even if all this effort goes in vain, or I might have to pay a price, I still want to give a try.
Oh... I have an idea now. This might clear the mist over the singer's identity.
As long as I'm exposed in the winds, surging streams keep occurring to me.
To avoid overclocking, I always take with myself a phono-recorder specially made by the Academy. It stores the streams I cannot process at the moment.
When we were in the fields, I have been recording things. If we have enough samples, maybe we can extract the singer's standard voice from the streams with transcription.
Let's not waste time. To the Huanglong Academy we go now.
That is it. I have placed the phono-recorder in place. Next we just need to activate it.
Phew, that is the singer's frequency.
Luckily we have enough samples, and equally luckily, she's a Huanglongese.
In Huanglong, all Resonators must register their frequencies in the database of Choral System. This is the cornerstone of the harmony between Resonators and others.
Of course, only the Hierarch, the Four Great and necessary Midnight Rangers with certain works have access to that data. Commander Jiyan has granted us access after the contact.
We can log into the database at Calculus Center. Let's go there and check this frequency against it.

The data source shows that the frequency comes from a singer named Leedhart. She sang at the Tiancheng Theater as Prima Donna. After that her Forte awakened, allowing her to comfort minds with songs and reinforce others.
Oh right. She was singing Song of Empty Dawn. I should have known.
No. We don't know each other. We hadn't even met.
When my Forte was just awakened, I... I don't understand well what exactly the streams were to tell me, and I always got lost in sensing overload.
You know this person named Leedhart?
And when I was about to pass out yet another time due to overload, she was around for medical care to treat her injury.

She heard me moaning painfully at the other side of a wall, so she sang the Song of Empty Dawn for me time after time, even though she was exhausted. My disturbed emotions finally calmed down thanks to her.
Maybe she doesn't even remember this, and I was merely one of the many she supported with her songs.
But I'm quite sure, that person who would use her voice to comfort and help others is bound to be a gentle, kind one.

Yes. She became unaccounted since the vocal cord damage, then involved in an event about manipulating TDs to hurt people when she showed again. The victims' vocal attempts to call for help disappeared like they were taken away.
However if that's true, if she should become the lost one this time, it makes reasons for me to stop her committing greater damage.
Even the gentle people could be deceived by loss and hatred.
Let's do it, I believe you can.
It's a long shot, but we can still try.
Well, based on the data records, it seems that the support operation two years ago was the beginning of the shift in everything.
Yichou, Erfu... they were members of the team mentioned in the records. They should have been involved together in the operation back then. Perhaps we can find them to ask for information.

I'm not sure about the former, but Erfu is a theater employee, responsible for the procurement of all items, and generally active near the theater. She was approached by my mother when my family was negotiating sound solidifying business before.
Let's try with her first.
Excuse me, I noticed that you just kept looking at us. Is there something you want to tell us?
Ah? No, no... cough...
I just saw that you guys seemed to be looking for something and wanted to say if I could help.
We are looking for Erfu, but it seems she's not here.
Oh, you are looking for her. Is there... any issue?
She's picking up goods for the theater today and should be in the business quarter right now. If you go straight there, she should still be there.
Oh, I'm just covering for someone else. Come on, you guys, go find her there.
An investigation by Midnight Rangers. We'd like to ask her about something.
At this time, Erfu should be nearby. But it seems that she was not here?
This guy looks more anxious than we do.
Oh, you want to inquire about Leedhart... she was the prima donna of the theater, singing joyfully and melodiously, as beautiful as a robin!

At that time the TD waves broke out, we ordinary people spontaneously formed a civil team to support the supplies. She joined the team and originally she just wanted to use her singing Forte to save and help more people.
But later... from the time when everyone took her contribution for granted, her song began to be just a tool to help us fight.
But songs should reflect the heart of the singers. They are their personal expression.
Yes, but who cared about that at that time? Attacks were always sudden, and support and transportation always came with a certain amount of danger, so who remembered her? Who remembered her songs?
We were not able to complete that operation, but it was Leedhart who made us last until the rescue came. But the attrition was excessive, her own voice was wasted.
I heard... she tried many ways to recover her voice, but none worked.
It's all past, and it makes one regret to bring it up. If you want to know more, you can ask Yichou, he was the team leader at the time, should be around Squeaky Express.
Hello, you are Yichou, right? My name is Yangyang, a member of Midnight Rangers. I would like to ask you about the team support operation at Sky Ray two years ago.
Two years ago? Support operations? Why bring this about... I know, you guys came because of Leedhart.
Yes, yes. You used to be teammates and formed a support team together, right? Are you still in touch now?
No we aren't, and I don't care to. Teammates? Hmph, history.

A complete and utter failure, that's all. The power disparity was too great, and in the face of a mass of TD, a spontaneously organized civilian team like us could never get the supplies to the destination.
To resist the TDs and for the sake of supplies, we had to let Leedhart keep singing until she could no longer sing.
So what did happen then?
But, but that way...
But that way, she could never sing again, right?
I know what you mean. But at a moment like that, who could promise a safe retreat?
She volunteered to help everyone with her song and joined the team. From the very beginning, she should have had the consciousness to sacrifice for people. I didn't force her.
But what you say now is forcing, isn't it?
The consciousness to sacrifice for people... I can't agree with your idea at all!
And you see what we ended up with. We failed. Some of us went disabled, some died.
Reality is always this cruel. In this world as we know it, there are destined to be some tragedies that cannot be avoided.
But, if there should have been other ways...
If there were no ifs, what were you going to do? A meaningful sacrifice is better than losing it all. If you can't even recognize this truth, there's no need for us to continue talking.
If you want to hear a more romantic and emotional version, go ask Erfu or Swalow, they are sure to satisfy you more. Tsk, especially Swalow, he's a coward living in the past.
Swalow? Who is he?
An old journalist at the theater quarter. He was part of the operation, badly injured.
Tsk, calling a coward scholarly. You know how to talk, don't you? So you know him?
We don't... but we've met him. Rover, looks like we have to be back to the theater!
An old male looking a little scholarly?
Well, let me formally introduce myself. My name is Swalow. I was involved in that year's support operation, as were Leedhart, Erfu and the others.
When rumors of incomprehensible contacts appeared from that area of Sky Ray, I had a feeling that sooner or later I would be approached by you guys.
After all, that's where we had the last operation, and where she lost her voice completely.
It's her, she's back. As a participant with the most inside knowledge of the operation, this was my first thought when I inquired about the contacts containing the song.
So I've been waiting for you guys while I'm, at the same time, worried if you can do it or not.
Before answering your question, cough... I'd like to ask you one.
With what you're capable of, you should have known the whole story, right? Who do you think is to blame for all this? Is it us? Or is it her?
How do you know?
What do you wish us to do?
It's not any of you. It's the cruelty of this world.
It means nothing to discuss right or wrong now.
Is it? Looks like what waits for her doesn't change...
Please wait! This question... I cannot answer.
I feel not pungent hatred in her, but rather sorrow and desperation. Because of her goodwill, she was treated in a way that caused her pain, that cost her closest treasure.
So, sorry. You were just asking a question, yet I said so much without giving you attention. I was too serious.
Haha, on the contrary I think that was the best answer I've heard.
A stamp print from the family store. Is this a Rhythmic Syrup that my mother was involved in making?

Well, this is the song that Leedhart sang for herself when she was still singing in the theater. We went to your shop to tailor-make this for her. It is also one of the few remaining voices of herself.
If you really want to resolve that pain in her heart, this will definitely come in handy.
Sky Ray... her own voice... singing... answer. Thank you. I see what to do.

Don't thank me. If it had not been me who persuaded her after her Forte was awakened to do more, greater things, she wouldn't have joined the team without hesitation, and nor would she have lost her voice.
I like to go with you, but I'm too ashamed to meet her, and too weak to leave the city.
Taking her back to the path she should be on. You guys can do that, can't you?
Ok, I promise you. Let's go, Rover, we will bring her back from around Sky Ray.
Leedhart should be here somewhere.
Why here?

In fact, in previous investigations, I had some inductions... attacks were happening in this vicinity, and TDs kept showing around here, which could serve as her "audience", and be manipulated by her.
But what made me finalize this conclusion was Swalow's words. This is the location where the operation was suffocated back then, and where she lost her last voice.
If she wanted to find her voice in some way, perhaps this was the promised land that she has faith in.
But it's still a bit difficult to find someone who hides herself intentionally in such a blurred area.
So I want to send the Rhythmic Syrup to be played further away with the help of the passing streams. Let her own song draw her to us.
Stop! Stop it! You may not play that!
Swalow handed to us. He keeps your songs with care.
What's the use of keeping such things...? I have long since been unable to... humph. Soothing others? This kind of weak and vulnerable voice, I simply do not need!
I shall take back everything I lost from those who turned me into this!
But you never thought of revenging yourself on them.
Shut up. Don't act like you know everything! You think I'm that kind-hearted idiot I was, don't you?
I was hurt, I was hoarse, I had rust taste in my throat. Even with all those, they were grabbing me, looking at me with thirst, and forcing me to open my mouth and keep singing...
I will never forget how they ruined my voice little by little!
But even when you say this, none of the victims you assaulted were your former teammates.
Humph, you think I don't want them? It's they that are hiding in their sweet homes and refusing to face me.
Needless to say, those on the team were either too old or too injured. I spurn their voices.
I need what is truly valuable to me... as long as the power in the voices is given to her, my voice can be restored completely, and I can sing again just like old time.

You've spent a lot of effort to lure me out, but you're not here to listen to this nonsense, are you? Or is it that you didn't get beaten enough last time and want to try the feeling of be silenced just like those people?
I came just for you. I hope you can let go of resentment and paranoia and come back to Tiancheng with me.
To sing just the way you did... you seem in desperate need for other people's voice. Defeat me and I will offer you all of my voice, but if you fail, surrender and come back with me.
Punishment is necessary, plus the people you hurt - you will apologize to them and pay remedies.
Yangyang, you...
Of course, I will keep looking for the solution together with you, until the day your voice is recovered. I will be totally responsible for your plight.
Totally responsible? A spoiled girl who knows nothing of men's suffering, what can you bear for other people's life? What a naive suggestion.
I know it's hard... but I have to try! So, are you taking my suggestion? Or you are afraid? Afraid of losing to a "naive" girl.
Though... don't regret it when you realize how dumb you would have been.
I'll be with you.
There could be deceits.
No... Rover, as soon as this challenge is effective, this is something between me and her.
You have to give trust if you want trust back, don't you?
Don't worry, I'm not as unaware of the sufferings and hiding in the ivory tower as she claims. I have seen the dark realities and have the ability to cope with them.
Naive girl, taste all the pain I went through!
Kindness pains one. You will understand this soon!
Constantly suffering beyond limits, nourishing them with songs... I kept begging them to stop!
Tired? Shaken? If you don't stop, you'll become a second me.
Why? Why don't you give up?
Why on earth would you go such lengths for me? Doesn't it hurt? Won't it injure?
I am answering with my actions. I said, I would sacrifice all of myself for you... there will be someone attending you.
As Yangyang approach herself, Qianxin sang with all her power. The energy made Yangyang tremble, yet she still reach out to Qianxin firmly.
Is that... enough? The pain... that you have been keeping in the back your mind... have you got it off?
Look, I'm right by your side.
The tragedy two years ago won't happen again. You can say whatever's on your mind.
Come with me, you can start over.
Qianxin looked at Yangyang. Tears ran down her cheeks. As you watched she was just about to reach out to Yangyang, and suddenly she just pushed Yangyang away.
No, no no! Would anyone really be willing to do that for... this version of me?
Such a pity. It was so close to seeing the other ending you wove for me. But that won't be my ending!
Wait! Where, where are you heading? Didn't we agree -
It means that I was playing you. The aggravation, the pain. I made them up. How stupid you are to believe a villain who takes away others' voice.
The agreement is invalid. I'm not going back with you.
Your throat... should be hurting much by now, huh? How dare you run around when you obviously received the signal? Don't forget who modified your throat and gave you the possibility to sing again!
Without the ability to create despair again, you are worthless waste. Do you want to be recycled? Or do you want to be completely destroyed?
How about taking the voice of that Midnight Ranger Resonator as nutrition for your throat, like you did before? This way, you can still continue to sing.
It's fun to think of a little bird with its throat choked.
Wait, she can't... she, she just looks good, but in fact, simply unbearable. Give me some more time, I can find a better object.
So much lies you are cheating yourself, aren't you?
Hurt... no, please! The sounder in my throat... is burning.
Since you have already made your decision, our deal ends here! It was supposed to be a spur-of-the-moment experiment by our lord, who gave you the right to say no?
If you can't even a loyal dog, simply go under.
You two! Let go of her!
Why, why are you here?
Are you idiots? I said don't follow me. Why came?
So this is why you left us there?
You don't understand. These people... Their power is not something you can easily handle.
Rest assured. I'm strong too.
Time to let you see my true power.
You... it's not the time to say something like this.
Hm. You never know if you never try. With you, me and Rover, maybe we can make it.
"Thou lovest, yet need'st not know love's sad satiety..."
Power is growing. You are singing. No, you are using Rhythmic Syrup!
Did you help people in this way?
Stop talking. While I can use the power contained in the Rhythmic Syrup, listen close, "When day clears, rises the hope. World at end shall relieve..."
The two people in scarlet should just escape.
Like you said, that is really my song, right? Even if it's a song I used to sing, the Forte energy of the time was left. I only... utilized it.
And... you are a Midnight Ranger. Do you know those people in scarlet?
Did they give you the ability to command the TDs? Scarlet coats... this reminds me of the mysterious organization that caused the destructions earlier.
Yes. They transformed my cord with TDs' parts so now I can wrest others' voice. With my previous forte, I can also command other TDs to attack.
This monstrous power... I, I'm too exhausted. Let's talk things through when we get back.
Back? Back to where?
Isn't it clear? I just lost to Yangyang.
You mean... then, I shall have to ask you to follow.
Can, can I make a request?
I... I want to see the Tiancheng Theater one more time. I won't play tricks, and for what I'm now, I can't play tricks.

Leedhart has already sung her own song, and continuing on with this question is the song I want to sing for myself.

Cough. Yangyang has told me about Leedhart's story.

No need, you should keep it for yourself. It's hard to find a soulmate, and you and Yangyang are the ones who understand her better. With you as her last and forever audience, she must be happy to know, even when she is in heaven.
The Rhythmic Syrup wasn't used up. I'm returning it.

Sure. Cough. Before that I will write a few more pieces of news about her and make more aware of her story.

This is not working. There seems to be traces around that cannot be detected with scanning, but we risk drawing TDs' attention if we take bolder actions... shall we try my stream sensing?
"Through border of clear and even, until thou touchest heaven..."
Human and TD, should be...
"... Weep not for those asleep. Thou lovest, yet need'st not know love's sad satiety..."

About the operation around the Sky Ray...

Being scared when seeing death, wanting to retreat in the face of difficulties, resent, complain, give in, regret the choices taken when losing something precious... they sound ugly, don't they?

I have not only seen those moments full of kindness, on the contrary, I might have seen moments of indifference and hurt perhaps more... but because of this, the gentle kindness is particularly precious.

Her voice?

Your pain, your aggravation, your pent-up exhaustion after relieving the moods for everyone. You are free to be weak, and you are free to refuse.

Yangyang, so cold... I fear... Would you sing for me? Empty Dawn... OK?

I must win big and then go home and knock my old brother to sober him up.
